Question: oop
Answer: aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh (aw aw py) ayk prwghramngh nmwnha hay jo afaal aur mntak 123456 kay bjaiay dayta ، ya ashyaa kay ard ghrd saft wyir dayzaain ka ahatmam krta haay۔aw aw py ayk bnyady prwghramngh pyradaym hay jo apnay kyryir 4 kay kesi mwka par tkryba hr dawylpr kay zaryaha astamal hawta haay۔aw aw py ka bnyady mksad aadad wa shmar aur un kay afaal ko ayk sath bandhna hay jo un par chltay hain takha kwda ka koi dusra hasaha is dayta tak rsaiy haasal nah krskay۔aabjykt ، jo safat aur tarykwn ka ayk mjmwaha byan karty hain js main aabjykt 46. Question: aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main ankypswlyshn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: ankpswlyshn aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh (aw aw py) main ayk bnyady tsawr hay js main aadad wa shmar main haadsaaty trmym ko rwknay aur byrwny dnya 123456 sy pwshydha hony wali safat tak rsaiy ko kntrwl karnay kay liye kesi ayk ywnt jesay ayk ywnt kay andr dayta aur tarykwn ko bndal karna shaml haay۔ksy tabkay kay dayta mmbrwn aur tarykwn ko njy ya mhafwza krar dy kar ankpswlyshn haasal kya jata hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh un tak sirf klas ya is kay sbklass 12. main hi tak rsaiy haasal ki jaskty hay ، ankpswlyshn ko awamy ، mhafwza aur njy astamal krkay nafza kya jaskta haay۔mmbran ، jo mmbr 12 kay nam sy pehlay andar skwr ki adm mwjwdghy ya mwjwdghy sy zaahar hawtay hayn۔awamy mmbrwn tak kahain sy bhi rsaiy haasal ki jaskty hay ، mhafwza mmbrwn tak sirf klas aur is kay zayly tabkat sy hi rsaiy haasal ki jaskty hay ، aur njy mmbrwn ko sirf khud hi klas kay andr hi tak rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔ yahan azaghr main ankpwlyshn ki ayk msaal haay: paiytwnklas bynk aay sy akaؤnt: dayf __init __ (__ __init __ (khwd ، nam ، twazan): sylf ۔_ nam = nam # mhafwza mmbr khud ۔__ bylns = bylns # njy mmbr dayf dapazat (khwd ، rkm): khwd= mkdar: khwdprnts "nakafy bylns" prnt (akaؤnt۔ ghyt_blns ()) # prnts 1500 prnt (akaؤnt۔ nam) # prnts "jan" prnt (akaؤnt .__ bylns) # is msaal ko brahata hay is msaal kay tawr par ، bynk akaؤnt klas main ayk mhafwza mmbr _ nam aur njy haay۔mmbr __ bylns ، js tak sirf klas hi sy hi rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔klas main awamy tarykwn ki jma ، wapsy ، aur get_balance bhi hay ، jo akaؤnt kay twazan main trmym ya bazayaft kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔jma krwanay aur waps lenay kay tarykwn sy njy mmbr __ twazan main trmym ki jati hay ، jabky get_balance tarykha isy bazayaft krta haay۔aakhr main ، akaؤnt ka aabjykt tyar kya jata hay aur akaؤnt kay twazan ko jma karnay ، waps lenay aur bazayaft karnay kay sath sath akaؤnt ka nam aur twazan prnt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: sakht aur wrasat main kya frk haay؟har ayk kay liye ayk msaal dyn۔
Answer: mrkb aur wrasat aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh (OOP) main do braay tsawrat hain jo do tabkwn kay mabyn talkat ko madal bnanay kay liye astamal hawtay hain takha dawylprza kay liye dwbarha astamal kay kabl kwda 123456 lkhna aasan haw۔sakht aur wrasat kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh woh kwda ko dwbarha astamal kesay karty hain aur klaswn ko kis tarah mzubwtay sy jwra diya jata haay۔ yahan sakht aur wrasat kay mabyn klydy akhtlafat hayn: wrasat: wrasat klaswn kay mabyn ayk "IS-A" rshtha hay ، jahan ayk zayly tabkha wrasat main hawta haayas kay spr klas 12346 ki khsawsayat aur tarykay۔wrasat ka astamal klaswn kay ayk drjha bndy kay madal kay liye kya jata hay ، jahan hr zayly tabkay is kay spr klas 12346 ka ayk zayada khsawsay wrzen haay۔wrasat ko mzubwtay sy jwra diya jata hay ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh spr klas main tbdylyan sbklas 12346 kay tarza aml ko mtasar krskty hayn۔sakht ka astamal aasan ashyaa sy pychydha ashyaa bnanay kay liye kya jata hay ، jahan hr shay ki ayk mkhsawsa zamha dary 123456 hawty haay۔sakht dahylay sy mil kar hay ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh ayk tabkay main tbdylyan dusri klas 123456 kay tarza aml ko mtasar nahin krty hayn۔ yahan azaghr main wrasat ki ayk msaal haay: azaghrklas janwr: dayf __init __ (khwd ، nam)): pasklas kta (janwr): dayf aspyk (khwd): waps "wwf!" klas bly (janwr): dayf aspyk (khwd): waps "myanw!" kta = kta ("fydaw") bly = bly ("srghwshyan") prnt (daagh aspyk ()) # prnts" wwf! "prnt (bly.s aspyk ()) # prnts" myw! "as msaal main ، janwrwn ki klas spr klas hay ، aur kta aur bly ki klasyn sab klas hayn۔jw janwrwn ki klas sy warsa haay۔janwrwn ki klas main ayk __init__ tarykha hay jo nam ki wsaf ko shrwa krta hay ، aur ayk aysa bwlnay wala tarykha hay jo ktay aur bly ki klaswn kay bwlnay kay tarykwn sy awwrda hawta haay۔ktay aur bly ki klaswn kay apnay bwlnay kay tarykay hain jo janwrwn ki aawaza ko lwtatay hayn۔aakhr main ، kta aur bly ki ashyaa tkhlyk ki jati hain aur un kay mtalkha bwlnay kay tarykwn ko kal karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hayn۔ yahan azaghr main tshkyl ki ayk msaal haay: azaghr klas anjn: dayf astart (khwd): prnt ("anjn shrwa") dayf astap (khwd): prnt.CAR () CAR.START () # prnts "anjn nay shrwa kya" kar۔ astap () # prnts "anjn rk ghya" is msaal main ، anjn klas ayk alyhadha klas hay js kay anjn ko shrwa karnay aur rwknay kay apnay tarykay hayn۔kar klas main anjn klas ki ayk msaal mmbr mtghyr ki haysayt sy hawty hay ، jo __init__ tarykha kar main shrwa ki jati haay۔kar klas ka apna aaghaza aur astap tarykay bhi hain jo anjn klas kay aaghaza aur astap tarykwn kay liye tfwyzu karty hayn۔aakhr main ، kar aabjykt ko apnay astart aur astap tarykwn ko kal karnay kay liye tkhlyk aur astamal kya jata hay ، jo is kay ntyjay main anjn ki klas kay aaghaza aur astap tarykwn ko kehty hayn۔

Question: aabjykt par mbny dayzaain main thws asawlwn ki wzuahat karain aur btaiyn keh woh saft wyir sstm kay mayar ko kis tarah bhatr bnasktay hayn۔
Answer: thws asawl panch dayzaain asawlwn ka ayk mjmwaha hain jo 2000 main rabrt sy martn (a.k.a ankl bab) nay mtaarf krwaiay thay ، jn ka mksad aabjykt par mbny dayzaainwn ko zayada kabl fham ، lchkdar aur brkrar rkhnay wala 1234 bnana haay۔thws mkhff ka mtalb mndrjha zayl asawlwn kay liye haay: wahad zamha dary ka asawl (ays aar py): kesi klas kay pas tbdyl hony ki sirf ayk wjha honi chahaiay ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh is ki sirf ayk zamha dary 13 honi chahaiay۔as asawl sy klaswn ko mrkwza aur brkrar rkhnay main mdd mlty hay ، aur klaswn kay mabyn skht jwraay sy bchnay kay l .۔ awpn band asawl (aw sy py): ayk klas twsya kay liye khla lekin trmym kay liye band hona chahaiay ، is ka mtalb hay keh A main niy faalyt shaml karna mmkn hona chahaiay۔as kay mwjwdha kwda 13 ko tbdyl kyay baghair klas۔yha asawl kwda ko mazeed lchkdar aur dwbarha kabl astamal bnanay main mdd krta hay ، aur jab niy khsawsayat ko shaml kya jata hay tou mwjwdha kwda ko twranay sy bchnay kay l .۔ lyskwf mtbadl asawl (ayl ays py): zayly ksmyn un ki bnyad ki aksam kay liye mtbadl hona chahaiay ، is ka mtalb hay keh zayly tabkay ki ashyaa ko tbdyl karnay kay kabl hona chahaiay۔prwghram 123 ki drstghy ko mtasar kyay baghair un kay spr klas kay aabjykt۔yha asawl is bat ko ykyny bnanay main mdd krta hay keh klas achhy tarah sy dayzaain kya gaya hay aur jab woh mkhtlf syak wa sbak main astamal hony par twka kay mtaabk brtaؤ karty hayn۔jtna chhwta aur mmknha had tak mrkwza hony kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔yha asawl klaswn kay mabyn jwraay ko kam karnay aur kwda ko zayada madaywlr aur brkrar rkhnay main mdd krta haay۔ anhasaar alta asawl (DIP): aaly staha kay madaywlza ko kam staha kay madaywl par anhasaar nahin karna chahaiay ، lekin dono ko tjrydwn par anhasaar karna chahaiay ، is ka mtalb hay keh klaswn par anhasaar karna chahaiay۔knkryt kay nfaza 123 kay bjaiay khlasaha۔as asawl sy klaswn kay mabyn jwraay ko kam karnay aur kwda ko zayada lchkdar aur kabl janch bnanay main mdd mlty haay۔ thws asawlwn par aml karty hoey ، dawylprza saft wyir sstm kay mayar ko kiy tarykwn sy bhatr bna saktay hain ، jn main shaml hayn: klas mykngh kwda kay mabyn kwda ko zayada madaywlr aur brkrar rkhnay kay jwraay ko zayada lchkdar aur brkrar rkhnay main mdd mil sakti haay۔dwbarha astamal karnay waly kwda ko zayada kabl amthaan aur kam ghltay ki pysh ksh ka kwda zayada twsya pzayr aur tkazuwn ko tbdyl karnay kay l app mwafkt pzayr ، thws asawl rhanma asawlwn aur bhatryn tarykwn ka ayk mjmwaha fraham karty hain jo dawylprza ko bhatr kwda lkhnay aur zayada mzubwta aur brkrar rkhnay waly saft wyir sstmza bnanay main mdd fraham krsktay hayn۔

Question: "psh ، pap aur jhanknay kay tarykwn kay sath astyk dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza kryn۔"
Answer: yahan ayk azaghr klas ka nfaza hay jo psh ، pap ، aur jhanknay kay tarykwn kay sath astyk dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta haay: paiytwnklas astyk: dayf __init __ (khwd): sylf daat aaitmza = [] dayf psh (khwd ، aaitm).khwd): rytrn lyn (self.items) == 0 is par aml draamd main ، astyk klas main ayk __init__ tarykha hay jo astyk ki ashyaa ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye khaly fharst ko shrwa krta haay۔klas kay pas ayk psh tarykha bhi hay jo astyk kay awpry hasaay main fharst main shaml krkay ، ayk pap tarykha jo astyk ki awpry shay ko hatata hay aur waps krta hay agar astyk khaly nahin hay tou ، ayk jhanknay wala tarykha jo waps krta haay۔aghr astyk khaly nahin hay tou astyk ki sab sy upar ki shay ko hataiay baghair ، aur agar astyk khaly aur ghalat hay tou is ka ayk aysa tarykha hay jo astyk klas ko astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: azaghr astyk = astyk () astyk۔psh (1) astyk۔ psh (2) astyk۔ psh (3) prnt (astyk.pyk ()) # prnt 3 prnt (astyk.pp ()) # prnt 3 prnt (astyk.pp ()) # prnt 2 prnt (astyk۔pap ()) # prnts 1 prnt (astyk.pp ()) # prnts nmbr nahin yeh msaal kay tawr par ، ayk astyk aabjykt tyar kya jata hay aur tyn ashyaa ko astyk par dhkylnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad astyk ki awpry aaitm ko baghair hataiay baghair bazayaft karnay kay liye jhanknay ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay ، aur pap tarykha kar ko ayk ayk krkay astyk ki awpry ashyaa ko hatanay aur waps karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aakhr main ، pap tarykha ko khaly astyk par blaya jata hay ، jo koi bhi nahin lwtta haay۔

Answer: tarykha awwrlwdangh aur tarykha awwr raidangh aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main do tsawrat hain jo isi nam kay sath tarykwn ki wzuahat karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain lekin mkhtlf tarza aml 123456۔tarykha awwrlwdangh aur tarykha awwr raidangh kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh tarykha awwrlwdangh ayk hi klas kay andr anjam di jati hay ، jabky waldyn ki klas aur bchay ki klas 13456 kay mabyn tarykha kar awwr raidangh anjam di jati haay۔ tarykha kar awwrlwdangh aur tarykha awwr raidangh kay mabyn klydy akhtlafat: tarykha awwrlwdangh: tarykha kar: tarykha kar: tarykhaawwrlwdangh mrtb wkty pwlymwrfzam ki ayk khsawsayt hay ، jahan ayk hi tabkay kay mtadd tarykwn main ayk hi nam hawskta hay lekin mkhtlf pyramytrza 13456۔tarykwn main zayada faalyt shaml karnay aur kwda ko zayada prahnay kay kabl aur brkrar rkhnay waly 13456 bnanay kay liye tarykha awwrlwdangh ka astamal kya jata haay۔nwt karain keh azaghr tarykha kar sy zayada bwjh daalnay ki hamayt nahin krta hay ، lekin yeh mmkn hay keh pehlay sy taay shuda dlail ya mtghyr lmbaiy kay dlail 1456 ka astamal karty hoey is ki nkaly mmkn haw۔wha tarykha jo pehlay hi is kay waldyn ki klas 13456 kay zaryaha fraham kya gaya haay۔mwjwdha tarykwn kay tarza aml ko tbdyl karnay aur kwda ko mazeed lchkdar aur kabl twsya 13456 bnanay kay liye tarykha kar awwr raidangh ka astamal kya jata haay۔tarykha awwr raidangh kay liye waldyn aur bchwn ki klaswn kay mabyn wrasat ki zurwrt hawty hay ، aur yeh waldyn ki klas 13456 ki tarah bchwn ki klas main isi nam aur dstkhta kay sath kesi tarykha ki wzuahat krkay kya jata haay۔ yahan azaghr main awwrlwdangh kay tarykha kar ki ayk msaal haay: pythwnklas kylkwlytr.kylkwlytr.aday (1 ، 2 ، 3)) # Question: tabkaty mtghyr aur azaghr main ayk msaal kay mtghyr kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟frk ko wazuha karnay kay liye ayk msaal dyn۔

Question: azaghr main wrasat kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur ayk msaal pysh karain js main wahad wrasat ka mzaaharha kya jaiay۔
Answer: wrasat aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main ayk tsawr hay jo ayk niy klas ko mwjwdha tabkay par mbny hony ki ajazat dyta hay ، jo is ki safat aur tarykwn ko wrasat main haasal krta hay ۔123456۔mwjwdha klas ko pyrnt klas ya bys klas kaha jata hay ، aur niy klas ko chailda klas ya makhwza klas 123456 kaha jata haay۔waldyn ki klas 123456 ka ayk zayada khsawsay wrzen bnanay kay liye chailda klas niy safat aur tarykwn ko shaml krskty hay ، ya mwjwdha tarykwn ko awwr raida krskty haay۔azaghr main ، wrasat ko nhaw klas chailda klas (pyrntklas) ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jata haay: 123456. is ki ayk msaal hay jo azaghr main wahad wrasat ka mzaaharha krty haay: azaghrklas janwr: dayf __init __ (khwd ، nam): sylf daat nam = nam dayf (khwd): prnt("janwr bwlta haay") klas daagh (janwr): dayf __init __ (khwd ، nam ، nsl): spr ()janwrwn ("aam janwr") kta = kta ("fydaw" ، "lybradawr") prnt (janwrwn ka nam) # prnts "jnrk janwrwn" janwr "aspyk () # prnts" janwrwn ki bat "prnt (daagh nam) # prnts"fydaw" prnt (daagh bryda) # prnts "lybradawr" daagh۔ aspyk () # prnts "daagh barks" is msaal main ، janwrwn ki klas main ayk __init__ tarykha hay jo janwrwn kay nam kay wsaf ko shrwa krta hay ، aur ayk bwlnay ka tarykha yeh hay khaayk aam pygham prnt krta haay۔ktay ki klas nhaw klas daagh (janwr) ka astamal karty hoey janwrwn ki klas sy wrasat main mlty hay ، aur ktay ko nsl ki ayk wsaf shaml krty haay۔ktay ki klas ktwn kay liye ayk mkhsawsa pygham prnt karnay kay liye janwrwn ki klas kay bwlnay kay tarykha kar ko bhi zayr krty haay۔janwrwn aur ktay ki klaswn ka astamal karty hoey baltrtyb do chyzayn ، janwrwn aur ktay ko tkhlyk kya gaya haay۔jb janwrwn aur ktay kay nam ki wsaf tak rsaiy haasal hawty hay tou ، yeh mtalkha shay kay nam kay wsaf ki kymt lwtata haay۔jb janwrwn aur ktay kay bwlnay ka tarykha kaha jata hay tou ، yeh janwrwn kay liye aam pygham aur ktwn kay liye mkhsawsa pygham prnt krta haay۔

Question: "andraj ، hazaf karnay aur trywrsl kay tarykwn kay sath mnslk fharst ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza kryn۔"
Answer: yahan ayk azaghr klas ka nfaza hay jo andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur trywrsl kay tarykwn kay sath mnslk fharst ki nmaindghy krta haay: paiythnklas nwda: dayf __init __ (khwd ، dayta): sylf daat dayta = dayta syl۔ nykst = nwn klas lnkda lst: dayf __init __ (khwd): self.head = koi bhi DEF zumymha (khwd ، dayta): new_node = nwda (dayta) agar sylf hayda koi nahin haay: khud nahin haay۔.next mwjwdha۔ nykst = new_node def dakhl (khwd ، dayta): new_node = nwda (dayta) new_node.next = self.head self.head = new_node def daylyt (khwd ، dayta)self.head.data == aadad wa shmar: self.head = self.head.next else: mwjwdha = self.head jabky mwjwdha nhayn۔ nykst koi nahin haay: agar mwjwdha۔ nykst.dayta == dayta: mwjwdha۔ nykst = krnt۔ nykst. nykst rytrn krnt = krnt۔ nykst dayf prnt (khwd): mwjwdha = sylf hayda jabky mwjwdha koi nahin haay: prnt (krnt.dayta) mwjwdha = krnt۔ is nfaza ko ، nwda klas lnkda fharst main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay ،js main dayta wsaf aur aghly wsaf hay jo fharst main aghlay nwda ki taraf asharha krta haay۔lnkda lst klas main ayk sr wsaf hay jo fharst main pehlay nwda ki nmaindghy krta haay۔klas kay pas ayk zumymha ka tarykha bhi hay jo fharst kay aakhr main ayk nya nwda shaml krta hay ، ayk dakhl karnay ka tarykha jo fharst kay aaghaza main ayk nya nwda dakhl krta hay ، ayk hazaf karnay wala tarykha jo fharst sy di hogi kymt kay sath nwda ko hazaf krta hay ، awrayk prnt ka tarykha jo fharst main tamam nwdas ki akdar ko prnt krta haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh lnkda lst klas ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythnl = lnkda lst () ll.append (1) ll.append (2) ll.append (3) LL.insert (0) ll.delete (2) ll.print () # prnts 0 1 3 main is msaal kay tawr par ، ayk lnkda lst aabjykt tyar kya jata hay aur is fharst main char nwdas ko shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، fharst kay aaghaza main ayk nya nwda dakhl karain ،awr fharst sy wylyw 2 kay sath nwda ko hazaf kryn۔aakhr main ، prnt ka tarykha fharst main tamam nwdas ki akdar ko prnt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main tjryd kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: khlasaha aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh ka ayk tsawr hay jo kesi shay ki zurwry khsawsayat ko aml draamd ki tfsaylat 123456 zaahar kyay baghair nmaindghy karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔khlasaha kesi shay ki ghair zurwry tfsaylat ko chhpa kar aur saarf 123456 sy mtalkha malwmat ko bay nkab krkay pychydghy ko kam karnay aur madaywlryty ko brahanay main mdd krta haay۔azaghr main ، tjrydy klaswn aur antrfyss 123456 ka astamal karty hoey khlasaha haasal kya jaskta haay۔ yahan ayk tjrydy klas ka astamal karty hoey azaghr main khlasaha ki ayk msaal haay: azaghr sy aay by sy ampwrt aay by sy ، khlasaha mythda klas janwrwn (aay by sy): @aay by ays ty aym ay ty dayf aspyk (khwd): pas klas daagh (janwr): dayf aspyk (khwd): prnt ("daagh barks") klas bly (janwr): dayf aspyk (khwd): prnt ("bly myiw") kta = kta () bly = bly () ktay۔ aspyk () # prnts"daagh barks" bly۔ aspyk () # prnts "bly myiwza" is msaal main ، janwrwn ki klas ayk tjrydy klas hay jo ayk tjrydy tarykha bwlnay ki wzuahat krty haay۔ktay aur bly ki klasyn janwrwn ki klas sy warsa hawty hain aur ktwn aur blywn kay liye baltrtyb ayk mkhsawsa pygham prnt karnay kay liye bwlnay kay tarykha kar ko nafza krty hayn۔ktay aur bly ki ashyaa baltrtyb ktay aur bly ki klaswn ka astamal karty hoey tkhlyk ki jati hain ، aur un kay bwlnay kay tarykwn ko apnay mtalkha pyghamat prnt karnay kay liye kaha jata haay۔nwt karain keh janwrwn ki klas ko braha rast fwry nahin kya jaskta kywnkha yeh ayk tjrydy klas hay ، aur is ka khlasaha tarykha is ki akhza krdha klaswn kay zaryaha nafza kya jana chahaiay۔

Question: azaghr main khlasaha klas aur antrfys kya hayn؟wha kesay mkhtlf hayn؟
Answer: khlasaha klas aur antrfys azaghr main woh adaray hain jo aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main khlasaha haasal karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔azaghr main tjrydy klaswn aur antrfys kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: khlasaha klas: ayk khlasaha klas ayk aysy klas hay js main ayk ya zayada khlasaha tarykay shaml hain ۔123456. ayk tjrydy tarykha ayk aysa tarykha hay js ka aalan kya jata hay lekin is main koi aml draamd nahin kya jaskta haay۔an kay tjrydy tarykwn ko un kay zayly tabkay kay zaryaha nafza kya jana chahaiay۔khlasaha hain aur un par aml draamd nahin hay ۔13456۔ antrfys main msaal kay tawr par mtghyrat ya knkryt kay tarykay nahin hawtay hain ۔13456۔ antrfys ko braha rast azaghr main braha rast nafza nahin kya jata hay ، lekin khlasaha klaswn ya ghair rsmy antrfys 13456 ka astamal karty hoey nkaly kya jaskta haay۔aay by sy ampwrt aay by sy ، khlasaha mythdaklas aynyml (aay by sy): @aay by ays ty aar aym ty day dayf aspyk (khwd).ayk tjrydy tarykha bwlnay ki wzuahat krta haay۔ktay aur bly ki klasyn janwrwn ki klas sy warsa hawty hain aur ktwn aur blywn kay liye baltrtyb ayk mkhsawsa pygham prnt karnay kay liye bwlnay kay tarykha kar ko nafza krty hayn۔ktay aur bly ki ashyaa baltrtyb ktay aur bly ki klaswn ka astamal karty hoey tkhlyk ki jati hain ، aur un kay bwlnay kay tarykwn ko apnay mtalkha pyghamat prnt karnay kay liye kaha jata haay۔nwt karain keh janwrwn ki klas ko braha rast fwry nahin bnaya jaskta kywnkha yeh ayk tjrydy klas hay ، aur is ka khlasaha tarykha is ki akhza krdha klaswn kay zaryaha nafza kya jana chahaiay۔

Question: "ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain js main ktaar kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki nmaindghy hawty hay js main ankyw ، day kywiw ، aur saiza kay tarykwn sy hawta haay۔"

Question: aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main mrkb kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: mrkb aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main ayk tsawr hay js main aysy ashyaa tyar karna shaml hain jn main dusri ashyaa par mushtamil hawta hay jesay keh mtghyr 1234۔mshtrkha mksad kay hasawl kay liye ashyaa mil kar kam krty hain ، aur bray shay ayk ya zayada chhwty ashyaa 1234 par mushtamil hawskty haay۔mrkb kay pychhay bnyady khyal yeh hay keh ayk pychydha msilay ko chhwtay ، zayada kabl antzaam tkrawn 1234 main twrana haay۔dawylpr chhwty chhwty ashyaa tyar krkay zayada lchkdar aur brkrar rkhnay waly kwda tshkyl dy saktay hain jo bray ashyaa ki tshkyl kay l. mil saktay hayn۔ yahan ayk msaal hay keh hum kis tarah azaghr main kar klas bnanay kay liye tshkyl ka astamal krsktay hayn: azaghr klas anjn: dayf astart (khwd): prnt (prnt (prnt (prnt (khwd)"anjn shrwa hawa") klas transmyshn: dayf shft (khwd): prnt ("transmyshn shft") klas phayay: dayf rwtyt (khwd): prnt ("phayay sy ghhwma") klas kar: dayf __ __init __ (khwd): sylf۔ anjyn =anjn () sylf transmyshn = transmyshn () sylf۔ whaylza = [phayay () kay liye I (4)] dayf astart (sylf): sylf.ynghain۔ astart () dayf shft (khwd)() dayf daraiyw (khwd): khud main phayay kay liay۔ phayay: phayay۔() # prnts "phayay nay ghhwma" is msaal kay tawr par ، anjn ، transmyshn ، aur phayay ki klasyn kar kay ajzaaa ki nmaindghy krty hayn۔kar klas main un klaswn ki msaal kay tawr par msaal kay tawr par mtghyrat hawtay hain ، aur is kay tarykay mtalwbha tarza aml ko haasal karnay kay liye un msaalwn kay tarykwn ka astamal karty hayn۔kar klas ka aaghaza tarykha anjn msaal kay aaghaza kay tarykha kar ko kehty hain ، kar klas ka shft tarykha transmyshn msaal kay shft tarykha ko kal krta hay ، aur kar klas ka daraiyw ka tarykha hr phayay ki msaal kay ghhwmnay waly tarykha ko kal krta haay۔as tarah ، kar klas chhwty chhwty ashyaa par mushtamil hay jo kar kay tarza aml ko haasal karnay kay liye mil kar kam krty haay۔

Question: azaghr ki klas main abtdaiy tarykha ka mksad kya haay؟yha dusray tarykwn sy kesay mkhtlf haay؟
Answer: __init__ tarykha azaghr ki klaswn main ayk khasa tarykha hay jo kesi shay ki safat ko shrwa karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay jesay hi shay ko tshkyl diya jata hay 123456۔__init__ kay tarykha kar ko knstrktr kaha jata hay kywnkha yeh aabjykt ki tamyr krta hay aur is ki safat 123456 shrwa krta haay۔__init__ tarykha ko hamyshha kaha jata hay jab kesi klas ka koi shay tshkyl diya jata hay ، aur yeh khud pyramytr ko apni pehli dlyl kay tawr par lyta hay ، js sy mrad is chyza sy hawta hay js main khud 123456 hawta haay۔sylf pyramytr ko klas 123456 kay andr mwjwd khsawsayat aur tarykwn tak rsaiy kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ __ __init__ tarykha ayk azaghr klas main dusray tarykwn sy mkhtlf hay kywnkha jab klas ka koi shay pyda hawta hay tou isy khud bkhwd kaha jata hay ، jabky dusray tarykwn ko wazuha tawr par 123456 kaha jana chahaiay۔__init__ ka tarykha kesi shay ki safat ko shrwa karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky dusray tarykwn ko aabjykt 123456 par mkhsawsa aamal anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan __init__ tarykha kay sath ayk azaghr klas ki ayk msaal haay: paiytwnklas shkhsa: Def __init __ (khwd ، nam ، amr): self.name = name self.age = Age Def say_hello (khwd): prnt (f "haylw ، mera nam {sylf daat nam} hay aur main {sylf.ayj} sal ki amr main hawn۔") shkhsa = shkhsa ("jan "، 30) shkhsa ۔say_haylw () # prnts" haylw ، mera nam jan hay aur main 30 sal ka hawn۔ "as msaal main ، is shkhsa ki klas kay pas ayk __init__ tarykha hay jo kesi shkhsa kay nam aur amr ki khsawsayat ko shrwa krta haay۔shkhsa klas ka say_hello tarykha ayk mbarkbad kay pygham ko prnt karnay kay liye nam aur amr kay awsaaf ka astamal krta haay۔shkhsa ki klas ka ayk mksad "jan" aur 30 sal ki amr kay sath tkhlyk kya gaya hay ، aur is kay sayllo tarykha ko ayk mbarkbady pygham prnt karnay kay liye kaha jata haay۔

Question: "ghraf dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur amwdy ، knarwn ko shaml karnay aur ghraf trywrsl ko anjam denay kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: yahan ayk azaghr klas ka nfaza hay jo ghraf dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta hay js main amwdy ، knarwn ko shaml karnay kay tarykwn kay sath ، ghraf trywrsl shaml karnay kay tarykwn kay sath: paiytwnklas ghraf: dayf __init __ (khwd): sylf daat ghraf = {} dayf ayda_wrtyks (khwd ، wrtyks): aghr: aghrwrtyks sylf ghraf main nhayn۔wrtyks 1] = [wrtyks 2] dayf day ayf ays (khwd ، astart): mlahazaha karain = syt () astyk = [astyk] jabky astyk: wrtyks = astyk.pp () agar wrtyks main nahin mlahazaha kya ghya: mlahazaha kya ghya۔sell.graph [vertex] - mlahazaha kryn) wapsy ka dwrha Def Bfs (khwd ، start): mlahazaha karain = syt () ktaar = [shrwa]wrtyks) ktaar۔klas kay pas ayk ADD_VERTEX ka tarykha bhi hay jo ghraf main ayk chwty ka azuafha krta hay ، ayk ADD_EDGE ka tarykha jo do amwdywn kay darmiyan ayk knaray ka azuafha krta hay ، ayk DFS tarykha jo ghraf ki ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash ki taraf jata hay ، aur BFS ka tarykha jo ayk chwraaiy anjam dyta haay-ghraf ki pehli tlash trawrsl۔ yahan ghraf klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythwngh = ghraf () g.add_vertex ('a') g.add_vertex ('b') g.add_vertex ('c') g.add_vertex ('d') g.add_edge ('a' ، 'b') g.add_edge ('b' ، 'c') g.add_edge ('c' ، 'd') prnt (g.dfs ('a')) # prnts {' A '،' B '،' C '،' D '} prnt (g.bfs (' a ')) # prnts {' a '،' b '،' c '،' d'} is msaal main ، ayk ghraf aabjykt tyar kya jata hay aur ghraf main char amwdy aur un kay darmiyan tyn knarwn ko shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad ghraf klas kay day ayf ays ka tarykha kar wrtyks 'aay' sy shrwa hony waly ghraf ki ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo mlahazaha shuda amwdy {'A' ، 'B' ، 'C' ، 'D ka syt lwtata haay۔'}.as kay bad ghraf klas ka by ayf ays tarykha astamal kya jata hay takha wrtyks 'aay' sy shrwa hony waly ghraf ki chwraaiy ki pehli tlash kay trywrsl ko anjam diya jaskay ، jo mlahazaha shuda amwdy {'A' ، 'B' ، 'C' ، 'D ka syt lwtta haay۔'} .1tutorialsPoint2plainglish3youtube4bogotobogo5python

Question: wrasat kay drjha bndy kay tsawr aur aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main is kay fwaid ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: wrasat ka drjha bndy aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main ayk tsawr hay js main klaswn ka ayk knbha bnana shaml hawta hay jahan hr tabkay ko apnay waldyn ki klas 123456 sy safat aur tarykay wrasat main mltay hayn۔waldyn ki klas ko bys klas ya spr klas kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، jabky chailda klas makhwza klas ya sbklas 123456 kay nam sy jana jata haay۔chailda klas apnay waldyn ki klas sy dayta aur tarykwn ka warsa hawskty hay aur klas haaiyrarchy 123456 main apnay dayta aur tarykay bhi shaml krskty haay۔wrasat ka drjha bndy kwda ko dwbarha astamal karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، kwda ki nkl ko kam krta hay ، aur kwda ko zayada madaywlr aur brkrar rkhnay wala 123456 bnata haay۔ yahan aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main wrasat kay drjha bndy kay kuch fwaid hayn: kwda dwbarha astamal: wrasat main mwjwdha klaswn sy kwda ko dwbarha astamal karnay ki ajazat mlty hay ، js sy wkt ki bcht hawty hay ، js sy wkt ki bcht hawty haay۔awr kwshsh 123456. kwda kwda ki nkl: wrasat dawylprza ko mtadd klaswn main nkl karnay waly kwda sy bchnay ki ajazat dyty hay ، js sy kwda ki mkdar ko kam kya jata hay js ko lkhnay aur brkrar rkhnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔jw kwda ko zayada madaywlr aur brkrar rkhnay main aasan bnata haay۔azaghr main wrasat ka drjha bndy: azaghrklas janwr: dayf __ __init __ (khwd ، nam): sylf۔ nam = nam dayf aspyk (khwd): prnt ("janwr bwlta haay") klas kta (janwr): dayf __ __init __ (khwd ، nam ، nsl):spr ()self.color = rnghyn Def speak (khwd): prnt ("bly mywza") kta = kta ("fydaw" ، "lybradawr") bly = bly ("srghwshyan" ، "ghray") prnt (daagh nam) # prnts"fydaw" prnt (daagh bryda) # prnts "lybradawr" daagh۔ aspyk () # prnts "daagh barks" prnt (bly۔ nam) # prnts "srghwshyan" prnt (bly.klwr) # prnts "ghray" bly۔ aspyk() # prnts "bly mywza" is msaal main ، janwrwn ki klas waldyn ki klas hay ، aur kta aur bly ki klasyn bchwn ki klas hain jo janwrwn ki klas sy warsa hawty hayn۔ktay ki klas ayk nsl ka wsaf shaml krty hay aur ktwn kay liye ayk mkhsawsa pygham prnt karnay kay liye janwrwn ki klas kay bwlnay kay tarykha kar ko awwr raida krty haay۔bly ki klas rnghyn wsaf ka azuafha krty hay aur blywn kay liye ayk mkhsawsa pygham prnt karnay kay liye janwrwn ki klas kay bwlnay kay tarykha kar ko awwr raida krty haay۔dw ashyaa ، daagh aur bly ، baltrtyb ktay aur bly ki klaswn ka astamal karty hoey tkhlyk ki gain ، aur un ki safat aur tarykwn tak wrasat kay drjha bndy ka mzaaharha karnay kay liye rsaiy haasal ki jati haay۔

Question: "azaghr (awamy ، njy ، mhafwza) main tarykha kar ki nmaish kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur ayk msaal pysh kryn۔"
Answer: azaghr main ، klas 123 kay tarykwn aur safat kay liye mriyt ki koi skht pabndyan nahin hayn۔taham ، aysay knwnshnza hain jo kesi tarykha ya wsaf 1423 ki mtalwbha mriyt ki nshandhay karnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔azaghr main tarykha kar ki nmaish kay liye yahan knwnshnza hayn: awamy tarykay: awamy tarykay aysay tarykay hain jn tak kahain bhi ، klas 123 kay andr aur bahar kahain sy bhi rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔knwnshn kay zaryaha ، awamy tarykwn ko kesi bhi andar skwrza 123 kay sath pysh nahin kya jata haay۔ mhafwza tarykay: mhafwza tarykay aysay tarykay hain jn tak klas aur is kay zayly tabkay 423 kay andr sy rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔knwnshn kay zaryaha ، mhafwza tarykwn ko ayk wahad andar skwr 423 kay sath pysh kya jata haay۔knwnshn kay zaryaha ، njy tarykwn ko dabl andar skwr 5423 kay sath pysh kya jata haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh un knwnshnwn ko azaghr kay trjman kay zaryaha nafza nahin kya jata hay ، aur agar saarf apnay nam 123 ko janta hay tou klas kay bahar sy kesi bhi tarykha ya wsaf tak rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔taham ، un knwnshnwn ki pyrwy kwda ko mazeed prahnay kay kabl aur brkrar rkhnay main mdd mil sakti haay۔ yahan azaghr main tarykha kar ki nmaish ki ayk msaal haay: azaghrklas maiklas: dayf pblk_mythwda (khwd): prnt ("yha awamy tarykha haay") dayf _ prwtyktda_mythwda (khwd): prnt ("yha ayk mhafwza tarykha haay") Def __private_method (khwd): prnt ("yha ayk njy tarykha haay") OBJ = MyClass () obj.public_method () # prnts "yha ayk awamy tarykha haay" OBJ.PROTECT_METHOD () # prnts "yha ayk mhafwza tarykha haay" OBJ .__ praiywyt_mythwda () # ayk antsabyrrn ko athata hay ، is msaal kay tawr par ، maiklas klas main awamy tarykha pblk_mythwda ، ayk mhafwza tarykha _ prwtyktda_mythwda ، aur ayk njy tarykha __PRIVATE_METHOD haay۔maiklas klas ka ayk shay tyar kya jata hay ، aur is kay tarykwn tak un ki mriyt ka mzaaharha karnay kay liye rsaiy haasal ki jati haay۔pblk_mythwda aur _ prwtyktda_mythwda tarykwn ko klas sy bahar sy haasal kya jaskta hay ، lekin __private_method tarykha ayk antsab dhandha ko athata hay kywnkha yeh ayk njy tarykha haay۔

Question: "klydy kdr ki jwray dakhl karnay ، bazayaft aur hatanay kay tarykwn kay sath haysh tybl (lght) ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza kryn۔"
Answer: yahan ayk azaghr klas ka nfaza hay jo haysh tybl (lght) ki nmaindghy krta hay js main klydy kdr ki jwray dakhl karnay ، bazayaft ، aur hatanay kay tarykwn kay sath: paiytwnklas haysh tybl: dayf __init __ (khwd): khwd۔rynj main _ kay liye (khwd۔۔): haysh_wylyw = sylf۔_hash_function (klydy) balty = sylf. tybl [haysh_walyw] I ، (k ، v) kay liye ، (balty) main (balty): agar k == key: dayl balty [i] is aml draamd main klydy ayrr (klydy) ki wapsy ، haysh tybl klasayk saiza ka wsaf hay jo haysh tybl kay saiza aur ayk tybl wsaf ki nmaindghy krta hay jo baltywn ki fharst kay tawr par haysh tybl ki nmaindghy krta haay۔klas main ayk _hash_function ka tarykha bhi hawta hay jo ayk klyd lyta hay aur haysh wylyw lwtata hay ، ayk dakhl karnay ka tarykha jo haysh tybl main klydy kdr ki jwray dakhl krta hay ، ayk aysa tarykha hay jo haysh tybl sy kesi klyd sy wabstha kdr ko bazayaft krta hay ، aur aykhaysh tybl sy klydy kdr ki jwray ko hatanay ka tarykha hata dyn۔ yahan haysh tybl klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiytwn aych ty = haysh tybl () ht.insert ('aypl' ، 1) ht.insert ('kylay' ، 2) ht.insert ('chyry' ، 3) prnt (ht.get ('aypl')) # prnts 1ht.remove ('kylay') prnt (ht.get ('kylay')) # is msaal ko athata hay ،haysh tybl aabjykt bnaiy jati hay aur haysh tybl main tyn klydy kymt kay jwraay daalnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔as kay bad haysh tybl klas ka GET tarykha astamal kya jata hay is kay bad klydy 'aypl' sy wabstha kdr ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo 1 haay۔ is kay bad haysh tybl klas ka hatanay ka tarykha klydy kdr ki jwray ko klydy 'kylay' kay sath hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aakhr main ، haysh tybl klas ka GET tarykha klydy 'kylay' sy wabstha kdr ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo ayk klyrr athata hay kywnkha klyd ab haysh tybl main nahin haay۔

Question: azaghr main jamd tarykay aur msaal kay tarykay kya hayn؟wha kesay mkhtlf hayn؟
Answer: azaghr main ، tarykwn ki tyn aksam hayn: msaal kay tarykay ، klas kay tarykay ، aur jamd tarykay 123456۔yhaan hr ksm ki ayk mkhtsar wzuahat haay: msaal kay tarykay: msaal kay tarykay azaghr main sab sy aam ksm ka tarykha haay۔an ki taryf ayk klas kay andr ki jati hay aur klas ki ayk msaal ki zurwrt hawty hay js ko 123456 kaha jata haay۔msaal kay tarykay khud pyramytr ko apni pehli dlyl kay tawr par lytay hain ، js sy mrad is klas ki msaal hay js ko tarykha 123456 kehty hayn۔msaal kay tarykay msaal kay awsaaf aur klas 123456 tak rsaiy aur is main trmym krsktay hayn۔ klas kay tarykay: klas kay tarykay aysay tarykay hain jo klas kay pabnd hain nah keh klas 123456 ki msaal۔an ki wzuahat @klasymythwda daykwrytr ka astamal karty hoey ki hogi hay aur sy ayl ays pyramytr ko apni pehli dlyl kay tawr par lyn ، jo khud klas 123456 klas sy mrad haay۔tabkaty tarykay klas ki safat tak rsaiy aur is main trmym krsktay hain ، lekin msaal kay tawr par msaal kay tawr par 123456۔ astytk tarykay: jamd tarykay aysay tarykay hain jo klas kay pabnd hain nah keh klas 123456 ki msaal۔an ki wzuahat @astytmytwda daykwrytr ka astamal karty hoey ki hogi hay aur koi khasa pyramytrza 123456 nahin lytay hayn۔jamd tarykay nah tou klas ki safat ya msaal kay tawr par 123456 tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hain aur nah hi is main trmym krsktay hayn۔an ka astamal afadyt kay afaal ki wzuahat kay liye kya jata hay jo tabkay ki haalt ya msaal kay tawr par 123456 par anhasaar nahin karty hayn۔ yahan azaghr main hr ksm kay tarykha kar ki ayk msaal haay: paiythnklas maiklas: class_variable = 0 def __init __ (khwd ، msaal kay tawr pr): khwd. instance_variaber)= msaal kay tawr pr_aarybl dayf msaal kay tawr pr_mythwda (khwd): prnt (ayf "yha ayk msaal ka tarykha haay۔ msaal kay tawr par mtghyr {sylf.aysnstns_waryibl}.mtghyr {cls.class_variable}. ") @astytymytwda dayf jamd_mythwda (): prnt (" yeh ayk msthakm tarykha haay۔ "mtghyr 1 haay۔msaal kay tawr par mtghyr msaal kay tawr par ، ayk klas mtghyr klas_aarybl ، ayk msaal kay tarykha kar msaal kay tawr pr_mythwda ، ayk klas tarykha klas_mythwda ، aur ayk jamd tarykha jamd_mythwda۔maiklas klas ka ayk shay tyar kya gaya hay ، aur is kay msaal kay tarykha kar ko msaal kay tarykwn ko zaahar karnay kay liye kaha jata haay۔maiklas klas kay klas kay tarykha kar aur jamd tarykha ko baltrtyb klas tarykwn aur jamd tarykwn ka mzaaharha karnay kay liye kaha jata haay۔

Question: aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main pwlymwrfk ayswsy ayshn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: pwlymwrfk ayswsy ayshn aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main ayk tsawr hay jo ayk hi tabkay ko ayk sy zayada klasza 12 sy talk rkhnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔jawa jesi msthakm taip shuda zabanwn main ، yeh mtadd klasyn ayk hi spr klas 1 kay zayly tabkat hayn۔mthark tawr par taip shuda zabanwn jesay rwby main ، yeh zurwry nahin keh kys 13 haw۔pwlymwrfk ayswsy ayshn aksar aabjykt sy mtalkha nkshha sazay main ayk tabkay sy ayk sy zayada tabkwn kay talkat ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔kmpywtr sains main ، yeh is tsawr ko byan krta hay keh aap ayk hi antrfys 5 kay zaryaay mkhtlf aksam kay ashyaa tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔har ksm is antrfys 5 par apna aazaadanha nfaza fraham krskta haay۔pwlymwrfzam aaly staha kay dwbarha astamal kay l necessary zurwry hay jo dayzaain kay nmwnwn aur frym wrk 6 ka mksad haay۔aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main pwlymwrfzam kay mtadd zaaikay mwjwd hain ، aur un sab ko tkazua hay keh mtghyrat pwlymwrfk 6 hawsktay hayn۔ yahan azaghr main pwlymwrfk ayswsy ayshn ki ayk msaal haay: azaghrklas tbsarha: dayf __ (khwd ، jsm): Def __init __ (khwd ، anwan ، baday): sylf۔ taitl = anwan khwd۔ baday = baday sylf daat kam = [] dayf ayda_kmmnt (khwd ، tbsarha): sylf daat kam۔ apynda (tbsarha) klas wydayw: dayf __init __ (khwd، anwan ، yw aar ayl): sylf۔ taitl = anwan sylf۔ url = url self.comments = [] def add_comment (khwd ، tbsarha): sylf daat kam۔ apynda (tbsarha) tbsarha 1 = tbsarha ("azaym pwst!") tbsarha 2 =tbsarha ("achha wydayw!") pwst = pwst ("haylw ، wrlda!" ، "yha meri pehli pwst haay۔") wydayw = wydayw ("azaghr ka taarf" ، "https://www.youtube.com/watch؟ v = rfscvs0vtbw ") post.add_comment (tbsarha 1) wydayw.ayda_ kammnt (tbsarha 2) prnt (pwst daat kam [0] .body) # prnt" zabrdst pwst! "prnt (wydayw daat kam [0] .body) # prnts"achhy wydayw! "as msaal main ، tbsarha klas ayk tbsarha ki nmaindghy krta hay ، pwst klas ayk pwst ki nmaindghy krty hay ، aur wydayw klas ayk wydayw ki nmaindghy krta haay۔pwst aur wydayw klas dono kay pas ayk tbsaray ka wsaf hay jo tbsarwn ki fharst haay۔pwst aur wydayw klaswn main bhi dono kay pas ayk ADD_COMMENT ka tarykha hay jo tbsaray ki fharst main ayk tbsarha shaml krta haay۔dw tbsaray ki ashyaa ، tbsarha 1 aur tbsarha 2 ، tshkyl dyiay gaye hain ، aur woh baltrtyb pwst aur wydayw aabjykt ki tbsaray ki fharst main shaml krdyiay gaye hayn۔pwst aur wydayw aabjykt ki tbsaray ki fharst main pehlay tbsaray ki baday wsaf ko phir pwlymwrfk ayswsy ayshn ka mzaaharha karnay kay liye prnt kya jata haay۔

Question: "mytrks kay azuafay ، zurb ، aur transpwzayshn kay tarykwn kay sath mytrks ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza kryn۔"
Answer: yahan ayk azaghr klas ka nfaza hay jo mytrks kay azuafay ، zurb ، aur transpwzayshn kay tarykwn kay sath mytrks ki nmaindghy krta haay: paiythnklas mytrks: dayf __init __ (khwd ، ktaaryn ، kwls): sylf.rwza = ktaaryn khud = kalza sylza۔ daata = [[[[0 rynj (COLs) kay liay] I main rynj (ktaar) kay liay] Def __RER __ (khwd): wapsy '\ n'.join ([' '. join ([str.data [i] [j]) J main rynj (sylf kwlza)]) main rynj (sylf.rwza)] kay liye dayf __add __ (khwd ، dwsra): agar sylf daat aar aw!wylyw ayrr ko brahaؤ ("mytrks main ayk hi jhat shaml hona zurwry haay") ntyjha = mytrks (sylf.rwza ، sylf kwlza) rynj (sylf daat aar aw aarza) kay liay: rynj main jay kay liye (sylf.kwlza): ntyjha۔ dayta dayta[i] [j] = self.data [i] [j] + dyghr.dayta [i] [j] wapsy ka ntyjha Def __mul __ (khwd ، dwsra): agar sylf.kwlza! = dyghr.rwza: wylyw ayrr ("brahaؤ ("phalay mytrks main kalmwn ki tadad ko dusray mytrks main ktaarwn ki tadad sy mlna chahaiay ") ntyjha = mytrks (sylf.rwza ، dyghr.kwl) main rynj (sylf.rwza) kay liay: rynj main jay kay liye (dwsray.kwlza): rynj main K kay liye (self.cols): ntyjha۔ dayta [i] [j] += sylf daat dayta [i] [k] * dwsray.dayta [k] [j] wapsy ka ntyjha dayf transpwza (khwd):ntyjha = mytrks (sylf.kwlza ، sylf.rwza) rynj (sylf.rwza) kay liay: rynj main jay kay liye (sylf۔ kwlza): ntyjha۔ dayta [j] [i] = sylf daat dayta [i] [j] is kay nfaza kay ntyjay main ، mytrks klas main ayk ktaar ka wsaf hay jo mytrks main ktaarwn ki tadad ki nmaindghy krta hay ، ayk COLS wsaf jo mytrks main kalmwn ki tadad ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur ayk dayta wsaf jo mytrks ko fharstwn ki fharst kay tawr par nmaindghy krta haay۔klas main ayk __repr__ tarykha bhi hawta hay jo mytrks ki tar ki nmaindghy krta hay ، ayk __ADD__ tarykha js main do mytrk shaml hawta hay ، ayk __mul__ ka tarykha jo do mytrk ko brahata hay ، aur ayk transpws tarykha jo mytrks ko mntkl krta haay۔ yahan ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah astamal kya jaiaymytrks klas: paiytwnm 1 = mytrks (2 ، 2) m1.data = [[1 ، 2] ، [3 ، 4]] M2 = mytrks (2 ، 2) m2.data = [[5 ، 6] ، [7 ،8]] prnt (M1 + M2) # prnts "6 8 \ n10 12" M3 = mytrks (2 ، 3) M3.Data = [[1 ، 2 ، 3] ، [4 ، 5 ، 6]] M4 = mytrks.) # prnts "1 3 \ n2 4" is msaal main ، mytrks kay azuafay ka mzaaharha karnay kay liye + aaprytr ka astamal karty hoey do mytrks aabjykt ، M1 aur M2 ، bnaiay gaye hain aur shaml kyay gaye hayn۔mytrks ki do ashyaa ، M3 aur M4 ، mytrks zurb ka mzaaharha karnay kay liye * aaprytr ka astamal karty hoey ayk dusray kay sath mil kar aur zurb dyiay gaye hayn۔as kay bad mytrks klas ka transpwza tarykha M1 mytrks ko mntkl karnay aur ntyjha ko prnt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: azaghr main tarykha kis tarah zanjyr haay؟ayk msaal pysh karain js ka mzaaharha karnay waly tarykha kar zanjyrwn kw۔
Answer: tarykha zanjyrwn nay azaghr main ayk prwghramngh ki tknyk hay jo DOT aaprytr 123456 ka astamal karty hoey kwda ki ayk hi lain main ayk hi chyza par mtadd tarykwn ko talb karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ayk tarykha ki aaؤt pt ko aghlay tarykha kar kay un pt kay tawr par mnzawr kya jata hay ، aur isi tarah ، jab tak keh mtalwbha ntyjha 123456 haasal nah hawjaiay۔tarykha ki zanjyr kwda ko zayada jama aur prahnay kay kabl bna sakti hay ، kywnkha is sy hr tarykha kar ki pydawar ko astwr karnay kay liye antrmydayt mtghyr bnanay ki zurwrt khtm hawjaty haay۔ yahan azaghr main zanjyrwn ki zanjyr ki ayk msaal haay: azaghrklas kylkwlytr: dayf __init __ (khwd ، kymt): khwd۔wylyw = wylyw dayf shaml karain (khwd ، x): sylf۔ wylyw += ayks rytrn sylf day ay ayf ghhtaؤ (khwd ، x): khwd۔ wylyw -= ayks rytrn sylf dayf zurb (khwd ، x): sylf۔ wylyw *= ayks rytrnsylf dayf dawyzen (khwd ، x): sylf۔ wylyw /= ayks rytrn sylfklk = kylkwlytr (10) ntyjha = kylk.adada (5)# prnts 4.5 un msaal kay tawr par ، kylkwlytr klas main kesi kdr ko shaml karnay ، ghhtanay ، zurb lghanay aur tksym karnay kay tarykay hayn۔har tarykha kar kylkwlytr aabjykt ko khud lwtata hay ، jo tarykwn ko ayk sath jkraay janay ki ajazat dyta haay۔kylkwlytr klas ka ayk shay 10 ki abtdaiy kymt kay sath tkhlyk kya gaya hay ، aur is kay tarykwn ko 5 shaml karnay kay liye ayk sath jkraa hoa hay ، 2 sy zurb lghaiyn ، 3 ko ghhtaiyn ، aur 4 sy tksym kryn۔tarykha zanjyr

Question: wrasat sy zayada sakht kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur is kay fwaid ki akasy karnay wali ayk msaal pysh kryn۔

Question: azaghr main antrfys kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur btaiyn keh un ka astamal mtadd wrasat kay hasawl kay liye kis tarah kya jata haay۔
Answer: azaghr main ، antrfys zaban ki ayk blt un khsawsayt nahin hain ، lekin inhain ABC madaywl 123 sy khlasaha bys klas (ABCs) ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta haay۔ayk antrfys khlasaha tarykwn ka ayk mjmwaha hay jo tarza aml kay ayk syt ki wzuahat krta hay jsay ayk klas ko 123 par aml draamd karna chahaiay۔ayk klas jo antrfys ko nafza krty hay isy antrfys 123 main byan krdha hr tarykha kar kay liye aml draamd karna chahaiay۔antrfys ka astamal kesi ayk bys klas 1423 sy ayk klas ko mtadd antrfys ko nafza karnay aur warsa hony ki ajazat dy kar azaghr main ayk sy zayada wrasat kay hasawl kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan tak keh azaghr main mtadd wrasat kay hasawl kay liye antrfys astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiytwnympwrt aay by sy sy ayl aay ays sy shkl (mytaklas = aay by sy۔ aay by sy aym ay ty aay):@abc.abstractmethod def ayrya (khwd): pasklas ka rngh (mytaklas = abc.abcmeta): @abc.abstractmethod def rngh (khwd): pasklas askwair (shkl ، rngh): Def __init __ (khwd ، phalw ، rngh): khwd۔saiyda = saiyda sylf۔ kalwr_ wylyw = klr dayf ayrya (khwd): khud waps kryn۔25 prnt (askwair.klr ()) # "srkh" prnts is msaal main ، shkl ki klas ayk shkl ki nmaindghy krty hay ، rngh klas ayk rngh ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur mrba klas ayk mrba ki nmaindghy krta haay۔shkl aur rngh ki klasyn antrfys hain jo baltrtyb alakay aur rnghyn tarykwn ki wzuahat krty hayn۔mrba klas antrfys dono ko nafza krta hay aur nah hi wrasat myn۔askwair klas main ayk rkbha ka tarykha hay jo mrba kay rkbay ko lwtata hay aur ayk rnghyn tarykha jo mrba ka rngh lwtata haay۔mrba klas ka ayk shay 5 ki lmbaiy aur 'srkh' kay rngh kay sath tkhlyk kya gaya hay ، aur is kay rkbay aur rnghyn tarykwn ko mtadd wrasat kay hasawl kay liye antrfys kay astamal ka mzaaharha karnay kay liye kaha jata haay۔

Question: azaghr main spr () fnkshn ka mksad kya haay؟as kay astamal ka mzaaharha karnay wali ayk msaal fraham kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main spr () fnkshn ka astamal waldyn ki klasza 1234 kay tarykwn aur safat tak rsaiy aur tfwyzu kay liye kya jata haay۔yha wazuha tawr par waldyn ki klas ka hawalha denay ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham krta hay aur ayk tabkay ko isi drjha bndy 234 main dusray tabkay kay tarykwn aur khsawsayat tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔spr () fnkshn aam tawr par bay kar kwda sy bchnay aur isy 234 ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye zayada mnzam aur aasan bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ spr () fnkshn ko sbklas 1235 sy waldyn ki klas main kesi tarykha ko kal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yha aksar waldyn ki klas ki safat 1235 ko shrwa karnay kay liye __init__ kay tarykha kar kay sath mil kar astamal kya jata haay۔spr () fnkshn do dlail lyta haay: pehla zayly tabkha hay jo is tarykha kar ko bla raha hay ، aur dusra sbklas 1235 ki msaal haay۔spr () fnkshn ayk aarzuy shay ko lwtata hay jo klydy lfza kay zaryaha pyrnt klas kay hawalay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ yahan spr () fnkshn kay astamal ka mzaaharha karnay wali ayk msaal haay: azaghr klas janwrwn: dayf __ __init __ (khwd ، nam): sylf۔ nam =nmklas daagh (janwr): Def __init __ (khwd ، nam ، nsl): spr ()"prnt (daagh bryda) # prnts" lybradawr "as msaal main ، janwrwn ki klas kesi janwr ki nmaindghy krty hay ، aur ktay ki klas ktay ki nmaindghy krty haay۔ktay ki klas janwrwn ki klas sy wrasat main mlty hay aur is main ayk azuafy wsaf nsl hawty haay۔ktay ki klas ka __init__ tarykha nam wsaf ko shrwa karnay kay liye spr () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey janwrwn ki klas kay __init__ tarykha ko kehty hayn۔daagh klas ka ayk shay 'fydaw' kay nam aur 'lybradawr' ki nsl kay sath tkhlyk kya gaya hay ، aur is kay nam aur nsl ki khsawsayat spr () fnkshn kay astamal ko zaahar karnay kay liye chhpy hui hayn۔

Question: "ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain js main bainry hayp dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy hawty hay js main dakhl ، hazaf karnay aur kamwn ko dahyr karnay kay tarykwn kay sath۔"
Answer: bainry hayp ayk khasa dayta dahanchha hay jo bainry drkht sy mlta hay aur is ki sakht 123 ki bnyad par zayada sy zayada ya mnt ansar haasal karnay kay liye dayta ko mwsar andaza main zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha ayk mkml bainry drkht hay jo dahyr ki praprty ko mtamin krta hay ، jahan koi bhi nwda apnay bchay nwda/s sy zayada hawta hay aur jra nwda ki klyd dusray tamam nwdas 42 main sab sy braa hawta haay۔dahyrwn ki do aham aksam hayn: mnhyp aur myksyp 1۔ayk mynyp main ، hr zayly try ki jra sab sy chhwta ansar hawta hay ، jabky ayk myksyp main ، hr sab try ki jra sab sy braa ansar hawta haay۔ ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay liye jo bainry hayp dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta hay js main dakhl ، hazaf karnay ، aur haypaif aapryshnza kay tarykwn kay sath hawta haay۔، hum azaghr kay mayary laibryry 3 kay zaryaha fraham krdha hayp kyw madaywl astamal krsktay hayn۔yha madaywl lsts 3 par hayp aapryshnza kay liye afaal fraham krta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythwnympwrt haypklas bainry hayp: dayf __init __ (khwd): sylf۔ hayp = [] dayf dakhl karain (khwd ، aaitm): hayp kyw۔ haypsh (sylf ۔hap ، aaitm) dayf daylyt (khwd).bainry hayp klas ka dakhl karnay ka tarykha hayp kyw madaywl kay haypsh fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey bainry hayp main kesi shay ko dakhl krta haay۔bainry hayp klas ka hazaf karnay wala tarykha hayp kyw madaywl kay hayppp fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey bainry hayp sy chhwty chhwty chyza ko hatata hay aur waps krta haay۔bainry hayp klas ka haypaiyf tarykha un pt kay tawr par ayk fharst lyta hay aur isy bainry hayp main hayp kyw madaywl kay haypaif fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey tbdyl krta haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh bainry hayp tabkay ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiytwnbh = bainry hayp () by aych. Question: azaghr main mtadd wrasat main tarykha ryzawlwshn aardar (aym aar aw) kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: mythda ryzawlwshn aardar (aym aar aw) ayk aysa tsawr hay jo is trtyb ka tayn karnay kay liye azaghr ayk sy zayada wrasat main astamal hawta hay js main klas 12345 kay drjha bndy main tarykwn ki tlash ki jati haay۔yha woh trtyb hay js main klas kay drjha bndy main ayk tarykha tlash kya jata hay aur khasa tawr par azaghr main mfyd hay kywnkha azaghr mtadd wrasat 12345 ki hamayt krta haay۔aym aar aw woh trtyb hay js main azaghr klasza 2 kay drjha bndy main ayk tarykha tlash krta haay۔aym aar aw ka tayn rn taim kay wkt hawta hay aur is trtyb par mbny hawta hay js main klaswn ko wrasat ki fharst 2345 main mtayn kya jata haay۔aym aar aw nechay sy upar aur baien sy dien 5 haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh ، pehlay ، is tarykha kar ko aabjykt ki klas main tlash kya jata haay۔aghr yeh nahin mila hay tou ، isy fwry spr klas main tlash kya jata haay۔mtadd spr klaswn ki sawrt main ، is ko baien sy dien tlash kya jata hay ، js trtyb sy dawylpr 5 kay zaryaha aalan kya gaya tha۔ yahan ayk msaal hay jo azaghr main aym aar aw kay tsawr ko zaahar krta haay: azaghr klas A: dayf tarykha (khwd): prnt (prnt (prnt (prnt (prnt (khwd)"A.Method () kaha jata haay") klas B: DEF tarykha (khwd): prnt ("B.Method () kaha jata haay") klas C (A ، B): pask = C () C.Method () # prnts "A.Method () kaha jata hay "as msaal main ، klas main ayk aysa tarykha hay jw" A.Method () namy "prnt krta hay ، by klas ka ayk tarykha hay jw" B.Method () kaha jata hay "prnt krta hay ، aur sy klas wrasat main haay۔aay aur by dono sy sy klas ka ayk shay tyar kya jata hay ، aur is ka tarykha kaha jata haay۔chwnkha aay sy ki wrasat ki fharst main B sy pehlay drj hay ، lhazaa A ka tarykha kaha jata hay ، aur "A.Method () kaha jata haay" prnt kya jata haay۔yha azaghr main mtadd wrasat main aym aar aw kay tsawr ko zaahar krta haay۔

Question: wrasat kay slslay main tarykha kar kay tsawr ko byan karain aur is kay astamal ko wazuha karnay wali ayk msaal fraham kryn۔
Answer: tarykha kar awwr raidangh aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main ayk tsawr hay jo ayk zayly tabkay ya bchwn ki klas ko kesi aysay tarykha kar par ayk mkhsawsa nfaza fraham karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jo pehlay hi is kay kesi spr klas ya waldyn ki klasza 12345 kay zaryaha fraham kya jata haay۔jb kesi zayly tabkay main ayk aysa tarykha hawta hay jo spr klas kay kesi tarykha ko awwr raida krta hay ، tou phir is had sy zayada tarykha kar ko wazuha tawr par kesi zayly tabkay kay tarykha kar kay andr sy mtalwbha alfaza ka astamal krkay talb kya jaskta haay۔sbklas awwr raidas main nfaza (as ki jghha) spr klas main aml draamd ko ayk aysa tarykha fraham krkay js ka ayk hi nam ، ayk hi pyramytrza ya dstkhta ، aur waldyn ki klas 12345 main tarykha kar ki tarah wapsy ki ksm haay۔as tarykha kar ka wrzen js ka astamal kya jata hay is ka tayn is shay kay zaryaha kya jaye ga jo IT12345 ko astamal karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ yahan ayk msaal hay jo azaghr main tarykha kar kay astamal kay astamal ko zaahar krty haay: azaghr klas janwrwn: dayf aspyk (khwd): prnt ("janwr bwlta haay")klas daagh (janwr): dayf aspyk (khwd): prnt ("daagh barks") kta = kta () daagh۔ aspyk () # prnts "daagh barks" is msaal kay tawr par ، janwrwn ki klas main ayk bwlnay ka tarykha hay jo "janwr prnt krta haay"bwlta hay "، aur ktay ki klas janwrwn ki klas sy wrasat main mlty hay aur is kay apnay nfaza kay sath bwlnay kay tarykha kar ko awwr raida krty hay jw" daagh barks "prnt krty haay۔ktay ki klas ka ayk shay tyar kya jata hay ، aur is kay bwlnay ka tarykha kaha jata haay۔chwnkha daagh klas janwrwn ki klas kay bwlnay kay tarykha kar ko zayr krta hay ، lhazaa ktay ki klas kay bwlnay ka tarykha kaha jata hay ، aur "daagh barks" prnt kya jata haay۔yha azaghr main tarykha kar kay tsawr ko zaahar krta hay

Question: wrasat sy zayada mrkb kay asawlwn ki wzuahat karain aur ayk hakyky dnya ka mnzar pysh karain jahan mrkb zayada mnasb hawgha۔
Answer: wrasat sy zayada sakht aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh ka ayk asawl hay js sy ptha chlta hay keh klaswn ko kesi adaay ya waldyn ki klas 123456 sy wrasat ki bjaiay un ki tshkyl kay zaryaha pwlymwrfk slwk aur kwda dwbarha astamal karna chahaiay۔sakht main ، ashyaa ko dahylay sy jwraa jata hay ، is ka mtalb hay keh klas aur ashyaa ko kwda 2 ko twraay baghair aasany sy tbdyl kya jaskta haay۔as sy mrkb ko wrasat 23456 kay mkablay main zayada lchkdar aur brkrar rkhnay main aasany hawty haay۔sakht tabkaty wrasat ka mtbadl hay jo mkhtlf mkasad 2 ko pora krta haay۔as sy dawylprza ko aysy klasyn bnanay ki ajazat mlty hay jo dusray tabkwn par mushtamil hawtay hain jo klaswn kay mabyn mshtrkat ko tlash karnay ki kwshsh karnay aur wrasat 123456 ka drjha bndy pyda karnay ki bjaiay mkhsawsa faalyt fraham karty hayn۔ ayk hakyky dnya ka mnzar namha jahan mrkb zayada mnasb hoga kar haay۔ayk kar mkhtlf ajzaaa par mushtamil hay ، jesay anjn ، phayay ، bryk ، aur astyirngh whayl 123456۔an ajzaaa ka talk wrasat sy nahin hay ، blkha kmpwzayshn 123456 sy haay۔har jzaw mkhsawsa faalyt fraham krta hay ، aur kar mtalwbha tarza aml ko haasal karnay kay liye un ajzaaa par mushtamil hay ۔123456۔msaal kay tawr par ، anjn kar ko mntkl karnay ki taakt fraham krta hay ، phayay rwl karnay ki salahayt fraham karty hain ، bryk rwknay ki salahayt fraham karty hain ، aur astyirngh whayl smt 123456 ko tbdyl karnay ki salahayt fraham krta haay۔sakht ka astamal krkay ، kar ko aasany sy anfrady ajzaaa ki jghha ya ap ghryda krkay apni mrzuy kay mtaabk aur brkrar rakha jaskta hay ، bjaiay is kay keh CAR13456.1Wikeipedia3digitalocean4betterprogramming5javarevisededsided6geeksforgeeks ko CAR13456.1Wikeipedia2adservio3digitalocean4betterprogramming5javarevisededside

Question: "saft wyir ki nshwwnma main dayzaain kay nmwnwn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur tkhlyky ، sakhty aur tarza aml kay dayzaain kay nmwnay ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔"
Answer: saft wyir dayzaain 123456 main pyda hony waly aam msail kay dayzaain kay nmwnay dwbarha kabl astamal hal hayn۔wha mkhsawsa dayzaain kay msail ko hal karnay kay liye ayk saabt nktaha nzar Answer: do astykwn ka astamal karty hoey ktaar ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum ktaar 1234 kay tarza aml ki tklyd kay liye do astykwn kay astamal kay nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn۔phala astyk anasar ko khtm karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، aur dusra astyk anasar 1234 ko day kywi karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔jb kesi ansar ko mnslk kya jata hay tou ، isy pehlay astyk par dhkyl diya jata haay۔jb kesi ansar ko khtm kya jata hay tou ، yeh dusray astyk sy pap hawta haay۔aghr dusra astyk khaly hay tou ، pehlay astyk sy tamam anasar ko pap aur dusray astyk par rywrs trtyb main dhkyl diya jata haay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh anasar ko is trtyb main daykwyda kya jata hay js main woh ankywida 1234 thay۔ yahan ayk msaal kay tawr par aml draamd haay: paiythnklas ktaar: dayf __init __ (khwd): sylf۔ astyk 1 = [] self.stack2 = [] Def enqueue (khwd ، wyl).aml draamd ، ktaar ki klas main ktaar kay tarza aml ki nkaly karnay kay liye do astyk ، astyk 1 aur astyk 2 hayn۔ktaar klas ka enqueue tarykha astyk 1 par ansar ko aaghay brahata haay۔ktaar klas ka daykw tarykha astyk 2 sy kesi ansar ko pap krta haay۔aghr astyk 2 khaly hay tou ، astyk 1 kay tamam anasar ko pap aur astyk 2 par rywrs trtyb main dhkyl diya jata haay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh anasar ko is trtyb sy tabyr kya jata hay js main un ki mdd ki jati thy۔ yahan ktaar ki klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiytwnk = ktaar () Q.enqueue (1) Q.enqueue (2) Q.enqueue (3) prnt (Q.dequeue ()) # Question: azaghr main mtadd wrasat kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur is sy wabstha amkany chylnjwn aur halwn par tbadlha khyal kryn۔
Answer: ayk sy zayada wrasat aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main ayk khsawsayt hay jo ayk klas ko ayk sy zayada bys klas 123456 sy safat aur tarykwn kay warsa hony ki ajazat dyty haay۔azaghr main ، ayk sy zayada wrasat ki taiyd ki jati hay ، aur yeh klas taryf main mtadd bys klaswn ki wzuahat krkay kwma 13456 kay zaryaha alag kya jata haay۔jb ayk klas mtadd bys klaswn sy wrasat main mlty hay tou ، yeh tamam bys klasza 123456 ki safat aur tarykwn tak rsaiy haasal krskta haay۔taham ، mtadd wrasat pychydghy aur abhaam pyda krskty hay ، khasa tawr par jab do ya zayada bys klaswn main ayk hi nam 123456 kay tarykay hawtay hayn۔yha hayray kay msilay kay nam sy jana jata hay ، aur yeh ghair mtwka slwk 123456 ka baasa bn sakta haay۔ mtadd wrasat sy wabstha mmknha chylnjwn main shaml hayn: hayray ka msilha: jab do ya zayada bys klaswn main ayk hi nam kay tarykay hawtay hain tou ، yeh abhaam pyda krskta hay aur ghair mtwka slwk 123456 ka baasa bn sakta haay۔as msilay ko mythda ryzawlwshn aardar (aym aar aw) ka astamal karty hoey hal kya jaskta hay ، jo is trtyb ka tayn krta hay js main klasza 123456..complecity kay ayk drjha bndy main tarykay tlash kyay jatay hayn: ayk sy zayada wrasat kwda main pychydghy pyda krskty hay ، khasa tawr par jab bohat sy bys klasza 123456 mwjwd hayn۔as sy kwda ko smjhnay aur brkrar rkhnay main mshkl tr hawskty haay۔aym aar aw) ko is trtyb kay tayn kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay js main klasza 123456 kay drjha bndy main tarykwn ki tlash ki jati haay۔as sy hayray kay msilay ko hal kya jaskta hay aur is bat ko ykyny bnaya jaskta hay keh tarykwn ko sahayha trtyb main kaha jata haay۔ tshkyl ka astamal karty hawiay: mrkb mtadd wrasat ka mtbadl hay jo kwda ko dwbarha astamal aur pwlymwrfk slwk 123456 haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔as main aysy klasyn shaml hain jo dusray tabkwn par mushtamil hain jo klaswn kay mabyn mshtrkat ko tlash karnay ki kwshsh karnay aur wrasat 123456 ka drjha bndy pyda karnay ki bjaiay mkhsawsa faalyt fraham krty hayn۔mtadd wrasat 123456 kay sath wabstha۔azaghr main ، antrfys ko wazuha tawr par aalan nahin kya jata hay ، lekin koi bhi chyza jo mtalwbha antrfys ko nafza krty hay isy kesi aur aabjykt ki Question: aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main anhasaar anjykshn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main is kay nfaza ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: anhasaar anjykshn aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main ayk dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo ashyaa ko kesi byrwny makhza kay zaryaha fraham krdha un kay anhasaar kay sath tkhlyk karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، bjaiay is kay keh woh aabjykt kay andr pyda hawta haay۔anhasaar anjykshn ka hadf yeh hay keh kesi klas ko is ki anhasaar sy aazaad bnaya jaye ya dahylay dahylay jwraay hoey prwghram 123456 bnana haay۔as sy kwda ki dwbarha astamal ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mlty hay ، jabky kesi klas ko tbdyl karnay ki zurwrt ki tadd ، kesi aabjykt 13456 main tarykwn ya mtghyrat ka nmwnha bhi kam krta haay۔anhasaar anjykshn aksar thws saft wyir dayzaain asawlwn kay sath kwda ko lain rkhnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan azaghr main anhasaar anjykshn ki ayk msaal haay: azaghrklas ay myl syndar: dayf bhyj_ ay myl (khwd ، wsawl knndha ، pygham): prnt (f "{wsawl knndha ko ay myl bhyjna {wsawl knndha)}: {pygham} ") klas saarf: Def __init __ (khwd ، nam ، ay myl_syndar): sylf۔ nam = nam sellas msaal main ، ay myl syndar klas ayk aysy khdmt ki nmaindghy krta hay jo ay myl bhyjta hay ، aur saarf klas ayk aysay klaint ki nmaindghy krta hay jo ay myl syndar srws par mnhasar hawta haay۔saarf klas main ayk ay myl_syndar wsaf hay jo ay myl syndar klas ki ayk msaal haay۔saarf ki klas kay pas ayk bhyj_ myl ka tarykha bhi hay jo saarf kay nam par dyiay gaye pygham kay sath ay myl bhyjnay kay liye ay myl_syndar wsaf ka astamal krta haay۔saarf ki klas ayk anhasaar kay tawr par mnzawr krdha ay myl syndar klas ki ayk msaal kay sath tyar ki hogi hay ، jo saarf aabjykt main anjkshn lghaiy jati haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh anhasaar anjykshn kay sath saarf ki klas ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiytwn myl_syndar = ay myl syndar () saarf = saarf ("jan "، ay myl_syndar) saarf.synda_ ay myl (" haylw ، wrlda! Question: "thryda sy mhafwza snghltn pytrn ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain ، is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh klas ki sirf ayk msaal tshkyl di jaskay۔"
Answer: thryda sy mhafwza snghltn pytrn ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay l the ، is bat ko ykyny bnatay hoey keh klas ki sirf ayk msaal tshkyl di jaskay ، hum is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kesi talay kay astamal kay nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hain keh sirf ayk dhaghha klas 1234 ki msaal tshkyl dy sakta haay۔lak ka astamal ayk sy zayada dhaghwn ko byk wkt 1234 klas ki mtadd msaalwn ko bnanay sy rwknay kay liye kya jata haay۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythwnympwrt thrydanghklas snghltn: __instance = koi bhi nahin __lock = thrydangh۔ lak () dayf __ new __ (CLS): agar sy ayl ays nahin haay۔ agar sy ayl ays nahin haay۔.__ nya __ (sy ayl ays) waps sy ayl ays ۔__ msaal kay tawr par ، is par aml draamd ، snghltn klas thryda sy mhafwza snghltn pytrn ki nmaindghy krta haay۔snghltn klas ki __ anstyns wsaf klas ki wahad msaal ko astwr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur __ lak wsaf ko is bat ka ykyn karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh sirf ayk dhaghha klas ki msaal pyda krskta haay۔snghltn klas ka __new__ tarykha kar ko khtm krdya gaya hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh klas ki sirf ayk msaal tshkyl di hogi haay۔aghr __ anstyns wsaf koi nahin hay tou ، __lock ayk sath klas kay mtadd wakaat pyda karnay sy mtadd dhaghwn ko rwknay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aghr __ anstyns wsaf abhi bhi koi nahin hay tou ، klas ki ayk niy msaal __instance antsab main tkhlyk aur zakhyrha ki hogi haay۔ yahan snghltn klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: azaghr 1 = snghltn () S2 = snghltn () prnt (S1 S1 hay S2 haay) # "sch" prnts is msaal main ، snghltn klas ki do msaalyn tshkyl di gain ، aur un ki shnakht ka mwazanha aai ays aaprytr ka astamal karty hoey kya jata haay۔chwnkha snghltn klas ayk thryda syf snghltn pytrn hay ، lhazaa klas ki sirf ayk msaal tkhlyk ki hogi hay ، aur S1 aur S2 ki shnakht ayk jesi haay۔yha azaghr main thryda syf snghltn pytrn kay astamal ko zaahar krta haay۔

Question: fyktry kay tarykha kar kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main is kay nfaza ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: fyktry kay tarykha kar ka nmwnha ayk tkhlykaty dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo ayk spr klas main ashyaa bnanay kay liye ayk antrfys mhaya krta hay ، lekin sbklas ko is ksm ki ashyaa ko tbdyl karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jo 123456 bnaiay jien ghay۔yha nmwnha mfyd hay jab aysy ashyaa bnanay ki zurwrt ho jo mshtrkha antrfys ka ashtrak karain ، lekin tkhlyk karnay wali mkhsawsa ksm ki chyza ka tayn rn taim 123456 par kya jata haay۔fyktry kay tarykha kar ko spr klas main fyktry kay tarykha kar ki wzuahat krkay nafza kya jata hay jo pyramytr ya knfyghryshn 123456 kay zaryaha taay shuda ksm kay kesi shay ko waps krta haay۔as kay bad fyktry kay tarykha kar ko zayly tabkat main zayrbhasa laya jata hay takha zayly klas 123456 kay zaryaha mtalwbha mkhsawsa ksm ki ashyaa pyda ki jaskyn۔ yahan azaghr main fyktry kay tarykha kar kay nmwnay ka ayk msaal haay: azaghrklas janwr: dayf aspyk (khwd): pasklas daagh (janwr)bwlyn (khwd): waps "wwf!" klas bly (janwr): dayf aspyk (khwd): waps "myanw!aylf aynyml_ taip == "bly": rytrn bly () awr: wylyir ayrr ("ghlta janwrwn ki ksm") fyktry = janwrwn ki fyktry () kta = fyktry۔ kryt_anyml ("kta") bly = fyktry۔dog.speak ()) # prnt "WOOF!" prnt (bly.s aspyk ()) # prnt "myw!" is msaal main ، janwrwn ki klas ayk aysy spr klas ki nmaindghy krty hay jo janwrwn ko bnanay kay liye ayk mshtrkha antrfys ki wzuahat krty haay۔ktay aur bly ki klasyn zayly tabkat ki nmaindghy krty hain jo baltrtyb ktwn aur blywn ko bnanay kay liye janwrwn ki klas kay bwlnay kay tarykha kar ko zayr krty hayn۔janwrwn ki fyktry klas ayk aysy fyktry ki nmaindghy krty hay jo pyramytr ya trtyb par mbny janwrwn ko tkhlyk krty haay۔janwrwn ki fyktry klas ka tkhlyk_anyml tarykha ayk janwrwn ki ksm ka pyramytr lyta hay aur pyramytr kay zaryaha mkhsawsa ksm ka ayk shay lwtata haay۔tkhlyk_anyml tarykha baltrtyb ktwn aur blywn ko bnanay kay liye janwrwn ki fyktry klas kay zayly tabkat main zayr asar haay۔as kay bad janwrwn ki fyktry klas ko kta aur bly bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur un kay bwlnay kay tarykwn ko azaghr main fyktry kay tarykha kar kay astamal ko zaahar karnay kay liye kaha jata haay۔

Question: "srklr sy mnslk fharst ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur andraj ، hazaf karnay aur trywrsl kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: ayk srklr mnslk fharst ayk ksm ki mnslk fharst hay js main pehlay aur aakhry nwdas ayk dusray sy mnslk hawtay hain takha srkl 123456 tshkyl diya jaskay۔srklr sy mnslk fharstwn ki do aksam hayn: srklr akylay lnkda lst aur srklr dwghna mnslk fharst 123456۔ayk srklr wahad mnslk fharst main ، fharst kay aakhry nwda main lst 123456 kay pehlay nwda ka pwaintr hawta haay۔ayk srklr dwghna mnslk fharst main ، do lghatar do anasar pchhlay aur aghlay pwaintr kay zaryaha mnslk ya mnslk hawtay hain ، aur aakhry nwda aghlay pwaintr kay zaryaha pehlay nwda ki taraf asharha karty hain ، aur pehla nwda aakhry nwda ki taraf asharha karty hain jo pchhlay pwaintr 123456 kay zaryaha hawta haay۔azaghr main ayk srklr wahad mnslk fharst ka ayk msaal haay: azaghr klas nwda: dayf __init __ (khwd ، dayta): sylf daat dayta = dayta sylf۔ nykst = nwnyklas srklr lnkda lst: dayf __init __ (khwd)khwd ، aadad wa shmar): nya_nwda = nwda (dayta) agar sylf۔ hayda koi nahin haay: sylf۔hayda = nya_nwda nya_nwda. nykst = syl۔ hayda awr: mwjwdha = sylf hayda jabky mwjwdha۔.next mwjwdha۔ nykst = new_node new_node.next = self.head def daylyt (khwd ، dayta): agar sylf hayda koi nahin haay: waps alyf sylf hayda daat dayta == dayta: mwjwdha = sylf۔= self.head: mwjwdha = mwjwdha۔ nykst krnt۔ nykst = sylf hayda.nykst sylf۔ hayda = syl۔ hayda. nykst۔mwjwdha mwjwdha = mwjwdha۔ nykst agar mwjwdha۔ dayta == aadad wa shmar: prev.next = mwjwdha۔ nykst mwjwdha = krnt۔ nykst dayf trawrs (khwd): agar sylf۔ hayda koi nahin haay: wapsy krnt = sylf hayda prnt (krnt daat dayta، akhttam = "") jabky mwjwdha۔ nykst! = sylf hayda: krnt = krnt۔ nykst prnt (krnt.dayta ، aynda = "") prnt () is nfaza main ، nwda klas srklr lnkda fharst main nwda ki nmaindghy krta haay۔، aur srklr lnkda lst klas srklr mnslk fharst ki nmaindghy krty haay۔srklr lnkda lst klas ka dakhl karnay ka tarykha srklr mnslk fharst main ayk nya nwda dakhl karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔aghr fharst ka srbraha koi nahin hay tou ، nya nwda sr bn jata hay ، aur is ki aghly wsaf khud hi syt haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، fharst kay aakhr main nya nwda dakhl kya jata hay ، aur is ki aghly wsaf sr par syt haay۔srklr lnkda lst klas ka hazaf karnay ka tarykha srklr lnkda fharst sy nwda ko hazaf karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aghr fharst ka srbraha nwda ko hazaf karnay ka hay tou ، sr ko aghlay nwda main ap dayt krdya jata hay ، aur aakhry nwda ki aghly wsaf niay sr par syt haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، nwda ko mwjwdha nwda ki aghly wsaf ko mwjwdha nwda kay aghlay wsaf main ap dayt krkay hazaf krdya gaya haay۔srklr lnkda lst klas ka abwr tarykha srklr mnslk fharst ko abwr karnay aur is kay mndrjat ko prnt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh srklr lnkda lst klas ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythwnklst = srklr lnk lst () klst.nsrt (1) Clist.insert (2) Clist.INSERT (3) clist.insert (4) Clist.travers () # prnts "1 2 3 4" Clist.delete (3) Clist.travers () # prnts "1 2 4" is msaal main ، ayk srklr sy mnslk fharstsrklr lnkda lst klas ka astamal karty hoey tkhlyk kya gaya hay ، aur dakhl karnay kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey char nwdas fharst main dakhl krdyiay gaye hayn۔as kay bad fharst kay mndrjat ko abwr karnay kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey prnt kya jata haay۔as kay bad dayta wylyw 3 kay sath nwda ko hazaf karnay kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey fharst sy hazaf krdya jata hay ، aur fharst kay mndrjat ko trawrs tarykha ka astamal karty hoey ayk bar phir prnt kya jata haay۔

Question: saft wyir dayzaain main aabzarwr pytrn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main is kay nfaza ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: aabzarwr pytrn saft wyir anjynirngh main ayk dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo ashyaa kay mabyn ayk sy zayada anhasaar ki wzuahat krta hay ، jahan ayk shay (mzumwn) main tbdyly khud bkhwd dyghr tamam ashyaa (mbsaryn) ko mtala aur ap dayt krty hay jo aai ty 123456 par mnhasar haay۔aabzarwr pytrn ayk tarza aml ka nmwnha hay jo lchkdar aur dwbarha kabl astamal aabjykt par mbny saft wyir ko dayzaain karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، js sy aysy ashyaa mlty hain jn par aml draamd ، tbdyly ، janch aur dwbarha astamal karnay main aasany hawty haay۔mbsaryn ka nmwnha un haalat main mfyd hay jahan kesi shay ko anhasaar karnay wali ashyaa kya hain ya jab kesi shay main tbdyly ko dwsrwn ko tbdyl karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay is kay baray main kyas aaraiyan karnay kay baghair kesi shay ko dyghr ashyaa ko mtala karnay kay kabl hona chahaiay ، aur aap nahin jantay keh ktny ashyaa ko tbdyl karnay ki zurwrt haay۔.yha azaghr main aabzarwr pytrn ka ayk msaal aml haay: azaghrklas mzumwn: Def __init __ (khwd): self.observers = [] Def register_observer (sylf ، aabzarwr): self.observers.append (mbsaryn) Def hemt_observer (khwd ، mbsar): sell.observers.remove (mbsaryn) DEF nwtyfaiy_bswrza (khwd ، dayta = koi bhi nhayn): khud main mshahadha karnay waly kay liay: aabzarwr. ap dayt (dayta) klas aabzarwr: day ay ayf ap dayt (khwd ، dayta): pas klas knkrytw srwr (aabzarwr):dayf ap dayt (khwd ، dayta): prnt (ayf "mwsawlha dayta: {dayta}") mwzuwa = mzumwn () mshahadha karnay wala = knkrytw aywrwr () sbjykt.ryghstr_bsrwr (mbsar) sbjykt۔ notify_observers ("haylw ، wrlda!") is aml main is aml myn، sbjykt klas is mzumwn ki nmaindghy krta hay jo mbsaryn ki fharst ko brkrar rkhta hay aur inhain kesi bhi ryast ki tbdylywn sy aaghaha krta haay۔aabzarwr klas mbsar ki nmaindghy krta hay jsay ryasty tbdylywn kay baray main mtala kya jata haay۔knkrytw bshr klas mbsar kay thws nfaza ki nmaindghy krta hay jo mwsawlha dayta ko prnt krta haay۔mzumwn klas ka rjstr_bsrwr tarykha is mzumwn kay sath mbsaryn ko rjstr karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔mzumwn sy hatanay waly ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay is mzumwn sy kesi mbsar ko door karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mzumwn ki klas kay nwtyfaiy_bswrza ka tarykha kesi bhi ryast ki tbdylywn kay tamam mbsaryn ko mtala karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mwsawlha dayta ko prnt karnay kay liye knkrytw bshr klas main aabzarwr klas ka ap dayt tarykha kar ko khtm krdya gaya haay۔as kay bad sbjykt klas ka astamal mbsaryn ko rjstr karnay ، ryast ki tbdyly kay mbsar ko mtala karnay ، aur mwsawlha aadad wa shmar prnt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan ayk msaal hay keh azaghr main aabzarwr pytrn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythnswbykjykt = mzumwn () aabzarwr 1 = knkrytw srwwr () aabzarwrwr 2= ConcreteObServer () subject.register_observer (aabzarwr 1) sbjykt۔ ryghstr_bsrwr (aabzarwrwr 2) sbjykt۔ notify_observers ("haylw ، wrlda!") sbjykt۔ rymw_bsrwwr (aabzarwr 2) is msaal main ("ghwday ، wrlda!")sbjykt klas ka astamal karty hoey tkhlyk kya gaya hay ، aur do mbsaryn rjstr_bsrwr tarykha ka astamal karty hoey is mzumwn kay sath rjstrda hayn۔as kay bad is mwzuwa ka astamal nwtyfaiy_brwzar kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kesi ryast ki tbdyly kay tamam mbsaryn ko mtala karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، aur mwsawlha dayta dono mbsaryn kay zaryaha prnt kya jata haay۔as kay bad mbsaryn main sy ayk ko hatanay_bsrwr kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey is mwzuwa sy hata diya jata hay ، aur is mwzuwa ko nwtyfaiy_brwzar kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kesi aur ryast ki tbdyly kay baky mbsaryn ko mtala karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur mwsawlha aadad wa shmar baky mbsaryn kay zaryaha chhapay jatay hayn۔

Question: azaghr main antrfys kay mkablay main khlasaha klas astamal karnay kay fwaid aur khrabywn par tbadlha khyal kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main tjrydy klas kay astamal kay fwaid: ayk tjrydy klas mtalkha klaswn kay ayk ghrwp kay liye ayk mshtrkha antrfys mhaya krskty hay ، js sy kwda 12345 ka antzaam aur brkrar rkhna aasan hawjata haay۔ tjrydy klas is kay zayly tabkat kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda tarza aml ki wzuahat krskty hay ، kwda ki nkl ko kam krskty hay aur bhatr hawskty haay۔kwda dwbarha astamal 12345. ayk tjrydy klas apnay zayly tabkat par kuch kwaad aur rkawtwn ko nafza krskty hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh woh kesi khasa dayzaain ya aarkytykchr 12345 par aml pyra hawn۔haalat 12345. ayk tjrydy klas kesi antrfys kay mkablay main zayada pychydha aur smjhna mshkl hawskta hay ، khasa tawr par agar is main bohat sy tarykay aur awsaaf 12345 hayn۔ tjrydy klas klaswn kay mabyn skht jwraay pyda krskty hay ، jo kwda ko kam lchkdar aur mshkl bna sakti haay۔azaghr main ayk antrfys ka astamal: ayk antrfys un tarykwn aur awsaaf ki ayk wazuha aur jama taryf fraham krskta hay js par kesi tabkay ko nafza karna chahaiay ، js sy kwda 145 ko smjhnay aur astamal karna aasan hawjata haay۔ ayk antrfys kesi bhi tabkay kay zaryaha nafza kya jaskta hay ، ktaa nzar is kay wrasat kay drjha bndy sy ktaa nzar۔، isy khlasaha klas 145 kay mkablay main zayada lchkdar aur mwafkt pzayr bnana۔ ayk antrfys klaswn kay mabyn kesi khasa tarza aml ya maahaday ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnatay hoey keh woh kesi khasa dayzaain ya aarkytykchr 145 par aml pyra hawn۔as kay tarykwn kay liye koi bhi dayfalt slwk ya aml draamd ، jo kwda ki nkl aur kam kwda ryws 145 ka baasa bn sakta haay۔ ayk antrfys ayk tjrydy klas sy kam azahaar hawskta hay ، khasa tawr par agar yeh sirf kuch tarykwn aur awsaaf ki wzuahat krta hay ۔145. ayk antrfys klaswn kay mabyn skht jwraay pyda krskta haay، jo kwda ko kam lchkdar aur trmym karnay kay liye mshkl bna sakta haay۔aghr mtalkha tabkat kay kesi ghrwp kay liye mshtrkha antrfys fraham karnay ya zayly tabkat par kuch kwaad aur rkawtwn ko nafza karnay ki zurwrt hay tou ، ayk tjrydy tabkha zayada mnasb hawskta haay۔aghr un tarykwn aur awsaaf ki wazuha aur jama taryf fraham karnay ki zurwrt hay js par kesi klas ko nafza karna chahaiay ya is bat ko ykyny bnana hay keh klasza kesi khasa dayzaain ya fn tamyr par aml pyra hon tou ، ayk antrfys zayada mnasb hawskta haay۔

Question: "ayk kam sy kam amr tabkay ko nafza karain jo ayk kam sy kam HEAP ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar ki nmaindghy karty hain aur aaly trjyhay ansar ki andraj ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔"
Answer: kam sy kam HEAP ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum Python1234 main hayp kyw madaywl ka astamal krsktay hayn۔hayp kyw madaywl hayp dayta dahanchay ko bnanay aur jwranay kay l functions afaal mhaya krta hay ، jo trjyhay ktaar ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ayk mnt main ، sab sy chhwta ansar hamyshha sab sy upar hawta hay ، aur kesi ansar ki trjyha ka tayn is ki kymt 12354 kay zaryaha kya jata haay۔ is ki msaal hay keh azaghr main ayk kam sy kam ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar ka ayk msaal aml haay: paiytwnympwrt haypkklas ki trjyhay kyw: dayf __init__(khwd): self.elements = [] Def is_empty (khwd): rytrn lyn (sylf aylymnts) == 0 dayf dakhl karain (khwd ، aaitm ، trjyha): hayp kyw.hapsh (sylf.aylymnts ، (trjyha ، aaitm))dayf daylyt (khwd): rytrn hayp kyw۔ hayppp (sylf aylymnts) [1] dayf jhanknay (khwd): khud ko lwtaiyn۔trjyhay klas ka __init__ tarykha dahyr ko shrwa karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔trjyhay tabkay ki klas ka IS_EMPTY tarykha yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh aya dahyr khaly hay ya nhayn۔trjyhay tabkay ki dakhlha ka tarykha astamal kesi dyiay gaye trjyha kay sath dahyr main kesi shay ko dakhl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔trjyhay kwkyw klas kay hazaf karnay ka tarykha astamal shuda ko dahyr sy aaly trjyha kay sath hazaf karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔trjyhay kyw klas ka jhanknay wala tarykha astamal kyay baghair hayp sy aaly trjyha kay sath is shay ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan trjyhay kyw klas ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiytwnpk = trjyhay kywiw () py kyw Insert ("task 1" ،3) PQ.INSERT ("task 2" ، 1) PQ.INSERT ("task 3" ، 2) prnt (PQ.Peek ()) # prnts "task 2" prnt (PQ.Delete ()) # prnts "task" task2 "prnt (pq.peek ()) # prnts" task 3 "as msaal main ، trjyhay ktaar ko trjyhay kyw klas ka astamal karty hoey tshkyl diya jata hay ، aur dakhl karnay kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey mkhtlf trjyhaat kay sath tyn kamwn ko ktaar main dakhl kya jata haay۔aaly trjyha wali shay ko PEEK kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ktaar sy bazayaft kya jata hay ، aur aaly trjyha wali shay ko hazaf karnay kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ktaar sy hazaf krdya jata haay۔niy aaly trjyha wali shay ko jhanknay kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ktaar sy bazayaft kya jata haay۔as sy azaghr main ayk kam sy kam hayp ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar kay astamal ka mzaaharha hawta haay۔

Question: azaghr main daykwrytr pytrn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur is kay astamal ko zaahar karnay wali ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: daykwrytr pytrn azaghr main ayk dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo ayk hi klas 12345 sy dyghr ashyaa kay tarza aml ko mtasar kyay baghair ، mthark tawr par kesi frd ki shay main slwk ko shaml karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔daykwrytr pytrn ayk sakhty nmwnha hay jo kesi shay ki faalyt ko is kay nfaza 12345 ko tbdyl kyay baghair brahanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔daykwrytr ka nmwnha mfyd hay jab rn taim kay wkt kesi shay main niy faalyt shaml karnay ki zurwrt ho ، is kay mwjwdha tarza aml main trmym kyay baghair 12345۔ daykwrytr pytrn ko ayk aysa daykwrytr klas tshkyl dy kar nafza kya jata hay jo asal shay ko lpytta hay aur aai ty 12345 main niy faalyt ko shaml krta haay۔daykwrytr klas main asal shay ki tarah antrfys hawta hay ، lhazaa isy isi tarah astamal kya jaskta hay jesay asal aabjykt 12345۔daykwrytr klas main asal shay ka hawalha bhi hawta hay ، lhazaa yeh kesi bhi ghair trmym shuda tarza aml ko asal aabjykt 12345 par dy sakta haay۔ is ki msaal azaghr main daykwrytr pytrn ki ayk msaal haay: paiythnklas jzaw: dayf aapryshn (khwd): pas klas knkrytykwmprynt (ajzaaa): DEF aapryshn (khwd): waps "CONCRETECOMPOINTOR" klas daykwrytr (jzaw): DEF __INIT __ (khwd ، ajzaaa): sylf۔dayf aapryshn (): wapsy f "concretedecoratora ({self._compointe.operation ()})" klas knkrytdaykwrtrb (daykwrytr): dayf aapryshn (khwd): rytrn f "Concretedecoratorb ({self.component.operation ()})"ajzaaa = knkrytykwmypynt () sjawt_a = knkrytdaykwrytra (jzaw) sjawt_b = knkrytdaykwrtr by (daykwrytr_a) prnt (daykwrytr_b.aypryshn ()) # prnts "asal tsawrat (knkrytykwrtwryta) (ajzaaa ki haysayt say)"sja hawaknkrytkmpynt klas asal shay kay thws nfaza ki nmaindghy krta haay۔daykwrytr klas daykwrytr ki nmaindghy krta hay jo asal shay ko lpytta hay aur is main niy faalyt shaml krta haay۔knkrytdaykwrytra aur knkrytdaykwrtr by klas sjawt kay thws nfaza ki nmaindghy karty hain jo asal shay main niy faalyt ko shaml karty hayn۔knkryt kay jzaw ka nam waps karnay kay liye jzaw klas kay aapryshn ka tarykha kar knkrytkmpynt klas main awwrda kya gaya haay۔daykwrytr klas kay aapryshn ka tarykha kar ko asal shay kay sath tfwyzu karnay kay liye awwrda kya gaya haay۔asal shay main niy faalyt ko shaml karnay kay liye knkrytdaykwrtra aur knkrytdaykwrtr by klaswn kay aapryshn ka tarykha kar ko khtm krdya gaya haay۔as kay bad kantrytkmpynt aabjykt ko do sjawtwn sy sjaya gaya hay ، aur byrwny sjawt kay aapryshn kay tarykha kar ko paiythn main daykwrytr pytrn kay astamal ko zaahar karnay kay liye kaha jata haay۔
