Question: "ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain jo srklr bfr (rngh bfr) ki nmaindghy karty hain js kay tarykwn kay sath ankyw ، day kywiw aur saiza kay kamwn kay tarykwn kay sath۔"
Answer: ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay liye jo srklr bfr (rngh bfr) ki nmaindghy karty hain js kay tarykwn kay sath ankyw ، day kywiw ، aur saiza kay kamwn kay tarykwn kay sath ، hum paiytwn 123456 main pyghtry madaywl sy srklr bfr klas astamal krsktay hayn۔ayk srklr bfr ayk mkrrha saiza ka dayta dahanchha hay jo aam tawr par ryil taim saft wyir ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta hay takha pehlay sy taay shuda anasar 256 ko zakhyrha kya jaskay۔srklr bfr ko ayk rngh kay tawr par nafza kya jata hay ، jahan bfr mkml hony par kdym ansar kay zaryaha sab sy kdym ansar awwr rait kya jata haay۔ yahan srklr bfr klas ka astamal karty hoey azaghr main srklr bfr ki ayk msaal haay: paiythnklas srklr bfr: dayf __init __ (khwd ، zayada sy zayadha_saiza): sylf۔ bfr = [kwiy nhayn] * zayada sy zayadha_saiza syl۔ hayda = 0 sylf۔awwr flawrr ("srklr bfr bhra hoa hay ، aaitm ko khtm karnay sy kasar haay") sylf۔bfr [sylf۔ tyl] = aaitm sylf۔aghr self.size == 0: indexerror ko brahaؤ ("srklr bfr khaly hay ، aaitm ko khtm karnay sy kasar haay") aaitm = khwd+ 1) ٪ sylf۔ myks_saiza sylf۔ saiza -= 1 rytrn aaitm dayf saiza (khwd): khud ko lwtaiyn۔ is par aml draamd ، srklr bfr klas ayk srklr bfr dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔srklr bfr klas ka __init__ tarykha zayada sy zayada saiza kay sath bfr ko shrwa karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔srklr bfr klas ka enqueue tarykha bfr main kesi shay ko shaml karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔srklr bfr klas ka daykw tarykha bfr sy kesi shay ko hatanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔srklr bfr klas ka saiza ka tarykha bfr kay mwjwdha saiza ko waps karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan srklr bfr klas astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiytwnbfr = srklr bfr (3) bfr۔ ankyw (1) bfr.nkyw (2) bfr۔enqueue (3) prnt (bfr.saiza ()) # prnts "3" bfr.nkyw (4) prnt (bfr.daykyw ()) # prnts "2" prnt (bfr.daykyw ()) # prnts "3" prnt.ankyw tarykha ka astamal karty hoey bfr ko ، aur bfr ka saiza chhapta haay۔as kay bad ayk chwthy shay ko bfr main shaml kya jata hay ، js ki wjha sy sab sy kdym shay ko awwr rait kya jata haay۔as kay bad sab sy kdym tyn ashyaa ko bfr sy day kyw kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey hata diya jata hay ، aur bfr ka saiza chhap jata haay۔yha azaghr main srklr bfr kay astamal ka mzaaharha krta haay۔

Question: saft wyir dayzaain main kmanda pytrn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main is kay nfaza ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: kmanda pytrn ayk tarza aml kay dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo kesi aml ki drkhwast ko is chyza sy alag krta hay jo aykshn 123456 anjam dyta haay۔kmanda ka nmwnha mfyd hay jab kesi nzaam ko ghair kabl aml aapryshnza ، laghngh ، ya drkhwastwn ki drkhwastwn ko ktaar main mdd karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔kmanda pytrn kesi shay ki haysayt sy kesi drkhwast ko smyt kar kam krta hay ، js main aykshn 123456 ko anjam denay kay liye zurwry tamam malwmat shaml hayn۔as kay bad is aabjykt ko aas pas mntkl kya jaskta hay aur bad main is ko phansy di jaskty hay ، ya isy bad main astamal karnay kay liye mhafwza kya jaskta hay ۔123456۔ yahan azaghr main kmanda pytrn ki ayk msaal haay: azaghr klas kmanda: day ay ayf ayghzayktw (khwd): pasklas aydakwmnda (kmanda):def __init __ (khwd ، wsawl knndha ، kdr): sylf.ryysywr = wsawl knndha khwd۔ wylyw = wylyw dayf par amldraamd (khwd): sylf rysywr.ada (khwd) klas wsawl knndha: Def __init __ (khwd): sylf۔ wylyw = 0dayf ayda (khwd ، kdr): sylf۔ wylyw += wylywklas anwykr: dayf __init __ (khwd): sylf kamyndaza = [] dayf ayda_kwmnda (khwd ، kmanda): sylf daat kamyndas۔ aay py py ay day (kmanda) day ay ayf ayghzayktw_kwmndas (khwd):khwd kmanda main kmanda kay liay: kmanda۔ ayksykwt () wsawl knndha = wsawl knndha () ADD_COMMAND = ADDCOMMAND (wsawl knndha ، 5) anwykr = anwykr () anwykr.ayda_kmnda (ADD_COMMAND) INVOKER.EXECUTE_COMMANDS () prnt (wsawl knndha۔ wylyw) # prnts "5 "as msaal main ، kmanda klas ki wzuahat ki hogi hay jo kmanda aabjykt ki nmaindghy krty haay۔as kay bad aydakmnda klas ki wzuahat ki hogi hay ، jo kmanda klas ka ayk zayly tabkha hay aur wsawl knndha aabjykt main kdr shaml karnay kay liye kmanda ki nmaindghy krta haay۔wsawl knndha klas ki wzuahat ki hogi hay ، jo is shay ki nmaindghy krty hay jo aml ko anjam dyty haay۔anwkr klas ki wzuahat ki hogi hay ، jo kmandaza ko zakhyrha karnay aur is par aml draamd kay liye zamha dar haay۔wsawl knndha klas ki ayk msaal tshkyl di hogi hay ، aur aydakmnda klas ki ayk msaal wsawl knndha aabjykt aur 5 ki kdr kay sath tshkyl di hogi haay۔as kay bad wsawl knndha aabjykt ki kdr prnt ki jati hay ، jo azaghr main kmanda pytrn kay astamal ka mzaaharha krty haay۔drkhwastwn kay l und ghair kabl aapryshnza ، laghngh ، ya ktaar kay l useful mfyd

Question: "mlty thrydada azaghr prwghramwn main hum aahanghy par kabw panay kay tarykha kar kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain aur talay ، symfwrs aur haalt kay mtghyr jesay mwazanha aur is kay braks nktaha nzar ka mwazanha kryn۔"
Answer: hum aahanghy par kabw panay kay tarykha kar ko mlty thrydada azaghr prwghramwn main astamal kya jata hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh ayk sy zayada thrydaza mhafwza aur mwsar andaza main mshtrkha wsail tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔yha mykanzam nsl kay haalat ، dayda laks aur dyghr hum wkt sazay kay amwr ko rwknay kay liye astamal hawtay hain jo pyda hawsktay hain jab mtadd thrydaza mshtrkha wsail ko byk wkt rsaiy haasal karty hayn۔azaghr main astamal hony waly kuch aam hum aahanghy par kabw panay kay tarykha kar main shaml hayn: talay: talay astamal kyay jatay hain takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh sirf ayk dhaghha ayk wkt main mshtrkha wsail tak rsaiy haasal krskta haay۔jb koi dhaghha lak haasal krta hay tou ، dusray tamam dhaghay is wkt tak msdwd hawjatay hain jab tak keh tala jary nah hawjaiay۔talay ko nsl kay haalat ko rwknay aur is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay keh mshtrkha wsail ko mhafwza aur mstkl andaza main haasal kya jata hay ۔smafwrs: symyfwrza mshtrkha wsail tak rsaiy ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal kyay jatay hain jo thrydaza ki tadad ko byk wkt mhadwd krsktay hayn۔symfwrza ko wsail ki thkn ko rwknay aur is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay keh mshtrkha wsail ko kntrwl aur mwsar andaza main haasal kya jaiay۔ kndayshn mtghyrat: jab mshtrkha wsail tak rsaiy kay liye dstyab ho tou sghnl thrydaza kay liye haalt mtghyrat ka astamal kya jata haay۔mshtrkha wsail dstyab hony tak thrydaza ko rwknay kay liye mshtrkha wsail dstyab hony tak thrydaza ko msdwd krdya jata haay۔0 sylf lak = thrydangh۔ lak () dayf ankrymnt (khwd): khud kay sath= [thrydangh۔ thryda (targht = wrkr) thrydaza main thryda kay liye rynj (10)] kay liay: dhaghwn main dhaghwn main thryda۔ astart () dhaghwn main dhaghwn kay liay: thryda.jwin () prnt (kaؤntr.alyw) # prnts "1000000" inas msaal kay tawr par ، ayk kaؤntr klas ki wzuahat ki hogi hay jo mshtrkha wsail ki nmaindghy krty haay۔kaؤntr klas kay azuafay ka tarykha ayk talay ka astamal karty hoey thryda sy mhafwza andaza main kaؤntr ki kymt ko brahanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as kay bad ds dhaghay bnaiay jatay hain ، jn main sy hr ayk kaؤntr klas 100000 bar kay azuafay kay tarykha kar ko kehty hayn۔as kay bad dhaghwn ko shrwa aur shaml kya jata hay ، aur kaؤntr ki aakhry kymt prnt ki jati hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh azaghr main hum aahanghy kay kntrwl ko nafza karnay kay liye talay kay astamal ka mzaaharha karty hayn۔mhafwza aur mwsar andaza۔talay ، symfwrza ، aur haalt kay mtghyr kuch aam hum aahanghy par kabw panay waly mykanzam hain jo azaghr main astamal hawtay hain ، hr ayk ko apnay fwaid aur nksaanat hawtay hayn۔

Question: aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main kntrwl (IOC) aur anhasaar anjykshn (DI) kay alta kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur btaiyn keh woh kis tarah kwda brkrar rkhnay aur janch ko bhatr bnatay hayn۔
Answer: kntrwl ka alta (IOC) aabjykt par mbny prwghramngh main ayk dayzaain ka asawl hay jo prwghram 123456 ko bnanay wali ashyaa sy kesi prwghram kay kntrwl flw ko alag krta haay۔aaiy aw sy ka astamal aabjykt kay mabyn jwraay ko kam krkay aur prwghram 123456 kay baky hasawn ko mtasar kyay baghair ashyaa ko tbdyl karna ya is main trmym karna aasan bna kar kwda ki dykh bhal aur janch ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔anhasaar anjykshn (day aaiy) aai aw sy ka ayk mkhsawsa nfaza hay js main kesi shay main anhasaar anjykshn karna shaml hawta hay bjaiay is kay keh is chyza ko apni anhasaar 123456 bnaiay۔day aai ka astamal kwda brkrar rkhnay aur janch ki salahayt ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay takha bkyha prwghram 123456 ko mtasar kyay baghair anhasaar ko tbdyl kya jaskay۔mhafwza aur mwsar andaza myn۔yha mykanzam nsl kay haalat ، dayda laks aur dyghr hum wkt sazay kay amwr ko rwknay kay liye astamal hawtay hain jo pyda hawsktay hain jab mtadd thrydaza mshtrkha wsail ko byk wkt 123456 tak rsaiy haasal karty hayn۔talay ka astamal is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kya jata hay keh sirf ayk dhaghha ayk wkt main mshtrkha wsail tak rsaiy haasal krskta hay ، symyfwrs ko mshtrkha wsail tak rsaiy ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo thrydaza ki tadad ko byk wkt mhadwd krsktay hain ، aur haalt kay mtghyrat ka astamal dhaghwn kay asharay kay liye kya jata hay jab thrydaza ka astamal kya jata haay۔ayk mshtrkha wsail rsaiy 123456 kay liye dstyab haay۔prwghram.ham aahanghy par kabw panay kay tarykha kar ، jesay talay ، symfwrs aur haalt mtghyrat ، mlty thrydada azaghr prwghramwn main astamal hawtay hain takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh mshtrkha wsail ko mhafwza aur mwsar andaza main haasal kya jata haay۔

Question: hadayt shuda ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur byl myn fwrda alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: hadayt shuda ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay waly azaghr klas ko nafza karnay aur byl myn fwrda alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham karnay kay l we ، hum paiytwn 12 main nyt wrk ayks madaywl astamal krsktay hayn۔nyt wrk ayks madaywl hadayt shuda ghraf dayta dahanchay ka ayk tyza aur mwsar nfaza fraham krta hay ، jo nwdas aur knarwn kay zakhyrha karnay aur mwsar mkhtsar trien rastha alghwrthmza 12 ko anjam denay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ yahan nyt wrk ayks madaywl ka astamal karty hoey azaghr main hadayt shuda ghraf dayta dahanchay ka ayk msaal aml haay۔: Pythonimport nyt wrk ayks btawr Nxclass hadayt namha: Def __init __ (self): self.graph = nx.digraph () def add_edge (khwd ، u ، V ، wzan): self.graph.add_edge (u ، v ، wzan = wzan) Def mkhtsar tryn_path.hadayt namha klas ka __init__ tarykha hadayt shuda ghraf ko shrwa karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔hadayt namha klas ka ADD_EDGE tarykha astamal shuda wzan kay sath hadayt waly ghraf main ayk knaray shaml karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔daairykt ghraf klas ka mkhtsar tryn_path tarykha hadayt shuda ghraf par byl myn fwrda alghwrthm ko anjam denay aur kesi makhza aur hadf nwda kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha waps karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ daairykt ghraf klas ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: azaghrghraf = hadayt namha () ghraf.add_edge ('a' ، 'b' ، 1) ghraf.ada_j ('b' ، 'c' ، 2) ghraf.day_j ('c' ، 'd' ، 3) ghraf.aday_j ('d' ، 'e '، 4) prnt (ghraf.shwrtst_path (' a '،' e ')) # prnts "[' a '،' b '،' c '،' d '،' e ']" is msaal main ، ahadayt shuda ghraf dayta ka dahanchha daairykt ghraf klas ka astamal karty hoey tshkyl diya gaya hay ، aur char knarwn ko ADD_EDGE kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey hadayt waly ghraf main shaml kya jata haay۔as kay bad mkhtsar_path ka tarykha kar hadayt waly ghraf par byl myn fwrda alghwrthm ko anjam denay aur kesi makhza aur hadf nwda kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha waps karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo tabaat shuda haay۔as sy byl myn fwrda alghwrthm kay sath azaghr main hadayt shuda ghraf dayta dahanchay ka astamal zaahar hawta haay۔ nyt wrk ayks madaywl azaghr main hadayt namha ghraf dayta dahanchay ka ayk mwsar aur aasan astamal aml draamd fraham krta hay ، jsay mkhtlf ayply kyshnza kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔، bshmwl mkhtsar trien rastha alghwrthm

Question: azaghr main adm asthakam kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain aur is kay fwaid ko hum aahanghy aur tksym shuda nzaamwn main byan kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main adm asthakam sy mrad un ashyaa ki jaiydad hay jn main 12 bnaiay janay kay bad un main trmym nahin ki jaskty haay۔ghyr mnkwlha ashyaa tak rsaiy main tyzay sy hawta hay aur isy tbdyl karna mhangha hawta hay kywnkha is main kapy 2 ki tshkyl shaml hawty haay۔as kay braks ، tghyr pzayr ashyaa ko 12 bnanay kay bad tbdyl kya jaskta haay۔adm asthakam mkhtlf hasas kamwn ko bohat sary mfyd ayply kyshnza ki pysh ksh krta hay jo hum nyt wrk par mbny mahawl main karty hain jahan hum mtwazay prwsysngh 1 ki ajazat dytay hayn۔jb mtadd dhaghay ya aml mshtrkha wsail ko byk wkt 34 tak rsaiy haasal karty hayn۔ghyr mnkwlha ashyaa ko talay ya dyghr hum wkt sazay kay tarykha kar ki zurwrt kay baghair dhaghwn ya aml kay mabyn mhafwza tarykay sy shyir kya jaskta hay ، jo karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur kwda 34 ki pychydghy ko kam krsktay hayn۔ anhasaar anjykshn (day aaiy) kntrwl (IOC) ka ayk mkhsawsa nfaza hay js main shaml hawta haay۔ksy shay main anhasaar anjykshn lghanay kay bjaiay kesi shay ko apni anhasaar 134256 pyda karnay ki bjaiay۔day aai ka astamal baky prwghram 134256 ko mtasar kyay baghair anhasaar ko tbdyl karnay ya is main trmym karna aasan bna kar kwda brkrar rkhnay aur janch ki salahayt ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kya jata haay۔ham aahanghy aur tksym shuda nzaamwn main ، day aai ko thrydaza ya aml main nakabl tskhyr ashyaa ko anjykshn denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jo hum wkt sazay kay amwr kay amkanat ko kam krskta hay aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔ham aahanghy aur tksym shuda nzaamwn main karkrdghy۔ghyr mnkwlha ashyaa ka astamal krkay aur anhasaar ko anjykshn lghanay sy ، dawylprza hum wkt sazay kay amwr kay amkanat ko kam krsktay hain aur un kay kwda ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔

Question: "ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain jo srklr ktaar ki nmaindghy karty hain js kay tarykwn kay sath ankyw ، day kywiw ، aur is bat ka tayn karna keh ktaar bhry hui hay ya khaly hay ya nhayn۔"
Answer: ayk srklr ktaar ayk aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo pehlay ، pehli aaؤt bnyad par kam krta hay ، lekin shkl main srklr hay ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh aakhry pwzayshn kay bad ktaar main aghly pwzayshn pehli pwzayshn 12345 haay۔azaghr main ayk fharst ka astamal karty hoey ayk srklr ktaar nafza ki jaskty hay ، aur yeh mkhtlf ayply kyshnza ، jesay kmpywtr aarkytykchr ، dask daraiywr ، wydayw bfrngh ، aur prntr jab shydawlngh 12345 main karaamd haay۔ yahan azaghr main srklr ktaar ka ayk msaal haay: paiythwnklas srklr kwyw.is_full (khwd): wapsy (sylf۔ tyl + 1) ٪ sylf۔is_empty (): self.head = 0 self.tail = 0 self.queue [self.tail] = dayta awr: sylf۔dayta dayf day kywiw (khwd): agar sylf۔ aai ays_pty (): prnt ("srklr ktaar khaly haay") alyf sylf۔ hayda == sylf۔self.tail = -1 rytrn dayta wrnha: dayta = sylf۔ kywiw [sylf hayda] sylf۔ hayda = (sylf ۔hayda + 1) ٪ khwd۔srklr kyw klas ka __init__ tarykha astamal shuda saiza kay sath srklr ktaar ko shrwa karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔srklr kyw klas ka is_empty tarykha is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh aya srklr ktaar khaly hay ya nhayn۔srklr kyw klas ka aai ays_fl tarykha is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh aya srklr ktaar bhry hui hay ya nhayn۔srklr kyw klas ka enqueue tarykha srklr ktaar main ansar shaml karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔srklr kywiyw klas ka daykyw tarykha srklr ktaar sy kesi ansar ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan srklr kyw klas ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay: paiytwnk kyw = srklr kywi (5) sy kyw. aynkyw (1) CQ.Enqueue (2) sy kyw۔enqueue (3) cq.enqueue (4) cq.enqueue (5) cq.enqueue (6) # prnts "srklr ktaar mkml haay" prnt (cq.dequeue ()) # prnts "1" prnt (cq.dequeue (cq.dequeue ()) # prnts "2" cq.enqueue (6) cq.enqueue (7) prnt (cq.dequeue ()) # prnts "3" prnt (cq.dequeue ()) # prnts "4" prnt (cq.dequeue()) # prnt "5" prnt (cq.dequeue ()) # prnts "6" prnt (cq.dequeue ()) # prnts "7" prnt (cq.dequeue ()) # prnts "srklr ktaar khaly haay"as msaal main ، srklr kyw klas ka astamal karty hoey ayk srklr ktaar tyar ki hogi hay js ka saiza 5 haay۔ is kay bad panch anasar ko ankyw kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey srklr ktaar main shaml kya jata haay۔srklr ktaar main chhta ansar shaml karnay ki kwshsh ki hogi hay ، jo ayk pygham prnt krta hay js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh srklr ktaar bhry hui haay۔as kay bad char anasar ko day kyw kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey srklr ktaar sy hata diya jata hay ، aur do aur anasar ko srklr ktaar main shaml kya jata haay۔as kay bad baky anasar ko day kyw kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey srklr ktaar sy hata diya jata hay ، aur ayk pygham js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh srklr ktaar khaly hay prnt haay۔yha azaghr main srklr ktaar kay astamal ko zaahar krta haay۔

Question: "maahaday kay zaryaha dayzaain kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur is ki ayk msaal pysh karain keh kis tarah pyshghy haalt ، pwst kndayshns aur hamlha aawrwn ko azaghr main nafza kya jaskta haay۔"
Answer: maahadha kay zaryaha dayzaain ayk saft wyir dawylpmnt ka tarykha kar hay js main fraham knndha aur ajzaaa 123456 kay mؤklwn kay mabyn maahadha astamal karty hoey saft wyir kay ajzaaa kay tarza aml ki wzuahat shaml haay۔maahadha jzaw ki pyshghy shrta ، pwst kndayshnza aur hamlha aawrwn ki wzuahat krta hay ، jo is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye astamal hawtay hain keh jzaw sahayha aur mstkl tawr par 123456 kay sath brtaؤ krta haay۔pyshghy shrtayn aysy shraita hain jo jzaw ko anjam denay sy pehlay hi drst honi chahaiyn ، pwst kndayshns aysay haalat hain jo jzaw kay aml kay bad drst hona zurwry hain ، aur hamlha aawryn aysy haaltyn hain jo jzaw sy pehlay aur is kay bad drst hona zurwry hayn۔hamlha aawrwn ka astamal karty hoey hamlha aawrwn ko nafza kya jaskta haay۔daway woh byanat hain jo chyk karty hain keh aya koi shrta drst hay ya nahin aur agar koi haalt ghalat hay tou is main koi astsana brahata haay۔pyshghy shraita ko janchnay kay zaryaha nafza kya jaskta hay keh aya kesi fnkshn ka un pt asstyshn 123456 ka astamal karty hoey mtalwbha shraita ko pora krta haay۔pwst kndayshn ko janchnay kay zaryaha nafza kya jaskta hay keh aya kesi fnkshn ki aaؤt pt estrisons123456 ka astamal karty hoey mtalwbha shraita ko pora krty haay۔hamlha aawrwn ko yeh janchnay kay zaryaha nafza kya jaskta hay keh aya kesi shay ki haalt dawy 123456 ka astamal karty hoey mtalwbha shraita ko pora krty haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah pyshghy haalt ، pwst kndayshns ، aur hamlha aawrwn ko azaghr main dawwn ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta haay: paiytwnklas astyk: dayf __init __ (khwd): khwd۔aaitmza = [] Def is_empty (self): rytrn lyn (self.items) == 0 Def Push (khwd ، aaitm): par zawr dyn aaitm koi bhi nahin hay ، "aaitm koi nahin hawskta haay۔(khwd): khud par zawr dyn۔ IS_EMPTY () ، "astyk khaly haay" sylf daat aaitmza.pwp () dayf tap (khwd): khud par zawr nah dyn۔ IS_EMPTY () ، "astyk khaly haay۔1] dayf __len __ (khwd): rytrn lyn (sylf۔ aaitmza) dayf __str __ (khwd): rytrn ays ty aar (sylf۔ aaitmza) astyk = astyk () astyk () psh (1) astyk.psh (2) astyk.psh (3 (3)) lyn (astyk) == 3 par zawr dyn ، "lmbaiy 3 hona chahaiay" astyk ۔pp () == 3 ، "tap aaitm 3 hona chahaiay".top () == 2 ، "tap aaitm 2 hona chahaiay" par zawr dyn lyn (astyk) == 2 ، "lmbaiy 2" astyk hona chahaiay۔ psh (kwiy bhi nhayn) # is msaal main "aaitm nhayn" ayk astsana ko brahata hay ، is msaal main ،ayk astyk klas ki wzuahat ki hogi hay jo astyk dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krty haay۔pyshghy shraita ko psh kay tarykha kar main yeh chyk krkay nafza kya jata hay keh aya un pt koi nahin hay ya nhayn۔pwst kndayshn ko pap aur aaly tarykwn main yeh chyk krkay nafza kya jata hay keh aya astyk khaly nahin hay ya nhayn۔hamlha aawrwn ko astyk ki lmbaiy aur tar ki nmaindghy ki janch krkay __len__ aur __str__ tarykwn main nafza kya jata haay۔an shraita ko nafza karnay kay liye daway ka astamal kya jata hay ، aur agar haalat mtamin nahin hawtay hain tou mstsanyat ko brahaya jata Question: sst tshkhysa kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main is kay astamal ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: sst tshkhysa ayk prwghramngh ki hakmt amly hay jo azahaar ki tshkhysa main takhyr krty hay jab tak keh is ki kymt ko 1234 ki zurwrt nah haw۔as hakmt amly ko aksar un afaal kay sath mil kar astamal kya jata hay jo ashyaa kay mjmwaay tyar karty hain ، aur is main mymwry kay antzaam aur fnkshn rn taim 1234 kay liye karkrdghy kay aham mzumrat hawsktay hayn۔azaghr main ، jnrytrza ka astamal karty hoey sst tshkhysa ko nafza kya jaskta hay ، jo aysay afaal ki tarah kam karty hain jo kesi kdr ko lwtatay hain lekin jnrytr 12 ko ykay bad dyghray kalwn par akdar ki janshyny ko waps karnay kay liye apni dakhly haalt ko yad rkhyn۔jnrytrza fnkshn par mbny rytrn ki wrda 12 kay bjaiay kesi kdr ko aaؤt pt karnay kay liye pydawar kay mtalwbha alfaza ka astamal karty hayn۔ yahan azaghr main sst tshkhysa ka astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythwndaf fbwnyky (): A ، B = 0 ، 1 jabky sch: A A ، B = haasal krynB ، A + BFIB = fibonacci () I IN RAND (10) kay liay: prnt (aghla (FIB)) is msaal main ، ayk jnrytr fnkshn Fibonacci ki wzuahat ki hogi hay jo Fibonacci trtyb pyda krty haay۔pydawar ki mtalwbha alfaza ko A ki kymt ko aaؤt pt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur jnrytr ki dakhly haalt ko trtyb main aghly kymt pyda karnay kay liye ap dayt kya jata haay۔as kay bad ayf aai by jnrytr fbwnyky fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey tkhlyk kya jata hay ، aur trtyb ki pehli 10 akdar aghlay fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey prnt ki jati hayn۔as sy jnrytrza ka astamal karty hoey azaghr main sst tshkhysa kay astamal ko zaahar hawta haay۔jnrytrza sst tshkhysa ko nafza karnay kay liye azaghr main ayk taaktwr twl hain ، aur un ka astamal ashyaa kay zakhyray ko mwsar andaza main aur kam sy kam mymwry kay astamal kay sath tyar kya jaskta haay۔

Question: "mytrks kay azuafay ، zurb ، aur transpwza ka tayn karnay kay tarykwn kay sath mytrks ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza kryn۔"
Answer: mytrks kay azuafay ، zurb ، aur transpwza ka tayn karnay kay tarykwn kay sath mytrks ki nmaindghy karnay waly ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum paiythwn 123456 main nmy madaywl ka astamal krsktay hayn۔nympy madaywl mytrks aur mytrks aapryshnza ka ayk tyza aur mwsar nfaza fraham krta hay ، jo nmbrwn kay zakhyray ko zakhyrha karnay aur mwsar mytrks aapryshnza 123456 anjam denay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ yahan nypy madaywl ka astamal karty hoey azaghr main mytrks klas ka nfaza haay: pythwnympwrt nypkas mtks: Def __init __ (khwd ، dayta): self.data = np.array (dayta) Def __str __ (khwd): rytrn str (self.data) def __add __ (khwd ، dwsray)) dayf __mul __ (khwd ، dwsray): wapsy mytrks (np.dot (self.data ، other.data)) Def transpose (self): rytrn mytrks (self.data.transpose ()) is aml main ، mytrks klas nmaindghy krta haayayk mytrks dayta dahanchha۔mytrks klas ka __init__ tarykha ayk dyiay gaye dayta kay sath mytrks ko shrwa karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mytrks klas ka __str__ tarykha mytrks ki strngh nmaindghy waps karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mytrks klas ka __add__ tarykha do mytrks kay mabyn mytrks kay azuafay ko anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mytrks klas ka __mul__ tarykha do mytrks kay mabyn mytrks zurb anjam denay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔mytrks klas ka transpwza tarykha mytrks par transpwza aapryshn anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan mytrks klas ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay: paiytwnm 1 = mytrks ([[1 ، 2] ، [3 ، 4]]) aym 2 =mytrks ([[5 ، 6] ، [7 ، 8]]) prnt (aym 1) # prnts "[[1 2] \ n [3 4]]" prnt (aym 2) # prnts "[[5 6] \ n.prnt (M1.transpose ()) # prnts "[[1 3] \ n [2 4]]" is msaal main ، mytrks klas ka astamal karty hoey do mytrk M1 aur M2 tkhlyk kyay gaye hain ، aur un ki tar ki nmaindghy chhpy hui haay۔as kay bad mytrks kay azuafay aur zurb ko baltrtyb + aur * aaprytrza ka astamal karty hoey anjam diya jata hay ، aur ntaij prnt hawtay hayn۔as kay bad transpwza aapryshn transpwza kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey M1 par anjam diya jata hay ، aur is ka ntyjha prnt hawta haay۔yha azaghr main mytrks klas kay astamal ko zaahar krta hay js main mytrks kay azuafay ، zurb ، aur transpwza aapryshnza hayn۔mkhtlf ayply kyshnza ، jn main lkyry aljbra aur mshyn lrnngh shaml hain

Question: saft wyir dayzaain main wzaytr pytrn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main is kay nfaza ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: zaairyn ka nmwnha saft wyir dayzaain main tarza aml kay dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo dahanchay 123456 main trmym kyay baghair mwjwdha aabjykt dahanchay main niy karrwaiywn ko shaml karnay ki hawjata haay۔zaairyn ka nmwnha do aham ajzaaa ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jata haay: wzaytr aur ansar 123456۔wzaytr ayk antrfys ya tjrydy klas hay jo ansar aabjykt 123456 par anjam denay wali Answer: rd aml prwghramngh ayk prwghramngh nmwnha hay jo ghair mtzalzal dayta astrymza aur un astrymza 123456 kay zaryaay tbdylywn kay phylaؤ par mrkwza haay۔rd aml prwghramngh kuch aham asawlwn par Question: azaghr main tarykha sjawt kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur is ki msaalyn fraham karain keh un ko tarykwn main tarza aml ko shaml karnay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: tarykha kar daykwrytrza is kay makhza kwda 123456 ko tbdyl kyay baghair azaghr main kesi fnkshn ya tarykha kar kay tarza aml main trmym karnay ya brahanay ka ayk tarykha haay۔sjawt khud aysay kam hain jo dusray afaal ya tarykwn ko lpytnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hain ، un main 123456 main kuch azuafy faalyt shaml karty hayn۔ayk daykwrytr ayk fnkshn ya tarykha kar ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur kesi aur fnkshn ya tarykha kar ko aaؤt pt kay tawr par lwtata hay ، jo asal fnkshn ya tarykha kar ki jghha par astamal kya jaskta hay ، js main daykwrytr 123456 kay zaryaha fraham krdha koi azuafy faalyt haay۔daykwrytrza ko laghngh ، taimngh ، kychngh ، aur twsayk 123456 jesay kamwn kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ yahan azaghr main kesi tarykha kar main tarza aml ko shaml karnay kay liye tarykha kar ko astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythndaf maiy_ daykwrytr (fnk): dayf rypr (*aarghs ، ** kwwrghs): prnt ("fnkshn sy pehlay kaha jata haay۔") ntyjha = fnk (*aarghs ، ** kwwrghs) prnt ("fnkshn kay bad kaha jata haay۔") rytrn rytrn rytrn ryprklas maiklas: @my_decorator def my_method (khwd ، x ، x ،Y): wapsy x + YOBJ = MyClass () prnt (Obj.my_method (1 ، 2)) # Question: dawmyn sy chlnay waly dayzaain (day day day) kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain aur yeh btaiyn keh un ko mzubwta aur brkrar rkhnay waly saft wyir sstm ki tamyr kay liye kis tarah laghw kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: dawmyn sy chlnay wala dayzaain (day day day) ayk saft wyir dayzaain nktaha nzar hay jo is dawmyn kay maharyn 123456 kay un pt kay mtaabk kesi dawmyn sy mlnay kay liye madalngh saft wyir par Question: "ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain js main srklr bfr ki nmaindghy hawty hay js main ankyw ، day kywiw ، aur is bat ka tayn karnay kay tarykwn kay sath bfr mkml ya khaly hay ، ayk mkrrha saiza ki saf ka astamal karty hawiay۔"
Answer: yahan ayk azaghr klas hay jo srklr bfr ki nmaindghy krty hay js main ankyw ، day kywiw ، aur is bat ka tayn karnay kay tarykwn kay sath bfr mkml ya khaly hay ، ayk mkrrha saiza ki saf ka astamal karty hawiay: paiytwnklas srklr bfr: dayf __init __ (khwd ، saiza).bfr = [kwiy nhayn] * saiza sylf۔ hayda = 0 sylf۔ tyl = 0 sylf ۔fl = ghalat dayf aai ays_pty (khwd): waps nah kryn۔ khud nhayn۔self.full def enqueue (khwd ، aaitm): self.buffer [self.tail] = aaitm sylf۔sch khwd1) self self khwd۔yha bfr ko kesi bhi kdr kay sath shrwa krta hay ، sr aur tyl pwaintrza ko 0 par syt krta hay ، aur mkml prchm ko ghalat par syt krta haay۔ agar bfr khaly ya mkml hay tou ، aai ays_pty aur aai ays_fl tarykwn sy baltrtyb drst lwt aata haay۔ankyw ka tarykha bfr main kesi shay ko shaml krta hay aur tyl pwaintr ko ap dayt krta haay۔aghr bfr bhra hoa hay tou ، yeh sab sy kdym shay ko awwr rait karnay kay liye hayda pwaintr ko ap dayt krta haay۔day kyw ka tarykha bfr sy sab sy kdym aaitm ko hatata hay aur lwtata hay aur hayda pwaintr ko ap dayt krta haay۔ srklr bfr klas ka ayk msaal astamal: paiytwn sy by = srklr bfr (5) prnt (sy by۔ aais_pyt ()) # trwpnt (sy by۔ aai ays_fl ()))# falsecb.enqueue (1) cb.enqueue (2) cb.enqueue (3) cb.enqueue (4) cb.enqueue (5) prnt (cb.is_empty ()) # ghalat prnt (cb.is_full ()) # truecb.enqueue (6) prnt (cb.dequeue ()) # 2 prnt (cb.dequeue ()) # 3cb.enqueue (7) cb.enqueue (8) prnt (cb.dequeue ()) # 4 prnt (cb.dequeue (cb.dequeue ()) # 5 prnt (cb.dequeue ()) # 6 prnt (cb.dequeue ()) # 7 prnt (cb.dequeue ()) # 8 prnt (cb.is_empty ()) # trwpnt (cb.is_full ()) # falsys msaal5 kay saiza kay sath ayk srklr bfr aabjykt tyar krta hay ، 5 aaitmza ، daykwza 5 aaitmza ، aur chyk krta hay keh agar bfr khaly ya mkhtlf nkat par bhra hoa haay۔

Question: aabjykt par mbny dayzaain main hakmt amly kay tarza kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main is kay nfaza ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: hakmt amly ka nmwnha ayk tarza aml kay dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo mؤkl ko mkhsawsa kam ko mkml karnay kay liye mkhtlf alghwrthm ya tarykha kar main sy antkhab karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔jb byrwny wsail tak rsaiy haasal ki jati hay tou is tarza ka bnyady mksad lchk ko bhatr bnana haay۔hakmt amly ka nmwnha alghwrthm kay ayk khandan ki wzuahat krta hay ، hr ayk ko ghhyray main la jata hay ، aur rn taim 12 main un ko tbadlha khyal krta haay۔ hakmt amly ka nmwnha tyn aham ajzaaa par mushtamil haay: syak wa sbak ، hakmt amly antrfys ، aur thws hakmt amly۔syak wa sbak woh chyza hay jo is par amldraamd kay liye thws hakmt amly haasal krty haay۔hakmt amly ka antrfys un tarykwn ki wzuahat krta hay jn ko thws hakmt amlywn par aml draamd karna chahaiay۔thws hakmt amly mkhtlf alghwrthm hain jo hakmt amly antrfys 3 ko nafza krty hayn۔ yahan azaghr main hakmt amly kay nmwnay ki ayk msaal haay: azaghr klas syak wa sbak: dayf __init __ (khwd ، hakmt amly): khud .strategy = hakmt amly dayf par amldraamd (khwd ، dayta): wapsyself.strategy.execute (dayta) klas hakmt amly: DEF par amldraamd (khwd ، dayta): pasklas knkrytstryghya (hakmt amly): day ay ayf par amldraamd (khwd ، dayta): rytrn trtyb (dayta) klas knkryt astryt jy ay by (hakmt amly): day ay ayf par amldraamd (khwd ، dayta): wapsy alt (trtyb shuda (dayta)) dayta = [3 ، 1 ، 4 ، 1 ، 5 ، 9 ، 2 ، 6 ، 5 ، 3 ، 5] syak wa sbak = syak wa sbak (knkrytstryghya ()) ntyjha = syak wa sbak۔) prnt (ntyjha) # [1 ، 1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5 ، 5 ، 5 ، 6 ، 9] syak wa sbak = syak wa sbak (CONCRETESTRATEGYB ()) ntyjha = syak wa sbak.Execute_strategy (dayta) prnt (ntyjha) (ntyjha) #[9 ، 6 ، 5 ، 5 ، 5 ، 4 ، 3 ، 3 ، 2 ، 1 ، 1] is msaal main ، syak wa sbak ki klas apnay knstrktr main thws hakmt amly haasal krty hay aur isy ayk msaal kay mtghyr main astwr krty haay۔syak wa sbak ki klas ka phansy_astryj tarykha thws hakmt amly kay amldraamd kay tarykha kar ko kal krta hay aur is ka ntyjha lwtata haay۔ hakmt amly ki klas is antrfys ki wzuahat krty hay js ko knkryt ki hakmt amlywn ko nafza karna hawgha۔knkrytstryghya aur knkrytstryghyb klasza do mkhtlf alghwrthm hain jo hakmt amly kay antrfys ko nafza krty hayn۔knkrytstryghya klas un pt dayta ko chrahtay hoey trtyb main trtyb dyty hay ، jabky knkryt astry jy ay by klas un pt dayta ko nzawl trtyb main trtyb dyty haay۔ dayta lst un pt dayta hay jo hakmt amly kay nmwnha ka astamal karty hoey trtyb di jaye ghy۔syak wa sbak ki klas ko mkhtlf thws hakmt amlywn kay sath do bar fwry bnaya gaya hay ، aur ayk dlyl kay tawr par dayta lst kay sath phansy_astryty tarykha ko blaya jata haay۔dw mkhtlf hakmt amlywn kay ntaij knswl par chhapay gaye hayn۔ is msaal sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh rn taim main mkhtlf alghwrthm kay mabyn klaint kwda ko tbdyl kyay baghair hakmt amly kay nmwnay ko kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: tksym shuda nzaamwn main ghltay rwadary kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain aur kis tarah nkl aur atfak raiay sy alghwrthm jesi tknykwn ko azaghr main astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: falt rwadary tksym shuda nzaamwn main ayk aham tsawr hay jo ghltaywn ya nakamywn ki mwjwdghy main bhi kesi nzaam ki kam ko jary rkhnay ki salahayt sy mrad haay۔tksym shuda nzaamwn main ghltay rwadary zurwry hay kywnkha woh mtadd baham mnslk ajzaaa par mushtamil hain jo khdmt fraham karnay kay liye mil kar kam karty hayn۔yha ajzaaa aksar jghrafyaiy tawr par mntshr hawtay hain aur mkhtlf haarda wyir aur saft wyir plyt farmza par chlatay hain ، js ki wjha sy woh mrkzay nzaam 1 kay mkablay main ghltaywn aur nakamywn ka zayada hasas hawjatay hayn۔ ghltay rwadary kay baghair ، tksym shuda nzaam taim taim ، dayta main kami aur karkrdghy ki kami ka shkar hain ، jo maly ka baasa bn saktay hayn۔nksaanat ، sakh ka nksaan ، aur kstmr trst ka nksaan۔lhazaa ، kesi bhi tksym shuda nzaam kay liye ghltay rwadary ayk klydy zurwrt hay js ka mksad ayk kabl aatmad srws 1 fraham karna haay۔ mtadd tknykyn hain jn ko tksym shuda nzaamwn main ghltay rwadary kay hasawl kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl nkl aur atfak raiay alghwrthm۔nkl main dayta ya khdmat ki mtadd kapyan bnana aur sstm main mkhtlf nwdas main tksym karna shaml haay۔aghr ayk nwda nakam hawjata hay tou ، dusra nwda aktdar snbhal sakta hay aur khdmt ki frahamy jary rakh sakta haay۔dwsry taraf ، atfak raiay alghwrthm ka astamal is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kya jata hay keh sstm main mwjwd tamam nwdas kesi khasa ryast ya fysalay par mtfk hawn۔as sy adm mtaabktwn ko rwknay main mdd mil sakti hay aur yeh ykyny bn sakta hay keh yeh nzaam ghltaywn ki mwjwdghy main bhi kam krta rhata haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، raft laibryry byraay kay atfak raiay alghwrthm ka ayk azaghr ka nfaza hay jsay ghltay sy rwadar tksym shuda nzaamwn ki tamyr kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ray frym wrk ayk aur azaghr laibryry hay jo ghltay rwadary ki khsawsayat fraham krty hay jesay khwdkar ghltay ki bazayaby aur nwda ki nakamy ka ptha lghanay 4۔mzayd braan ، pytwrch main dastry bywtdatapralyl madaywl ghltay rwadary ki khsawsayat mhaya krta hay jesay chyk pwaintngh ، jo ryast ko pchhlay chwky 5 sy ryast ko bhaal krkay nakamywn sy bazayaft karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ghltaywn ya nakamywn ki mwjwdghy main bhi kam krna۔nkl aur atfak raiay sy alghwrthm jesi tknykwn ko ghltay rwadary kay hasawl kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، aur azaghr mtadd laibryrywn aur frym wrk mhaya krta hay jo un tknykwn ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: rd aml kay slslay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh un ko kis tarah azaghr main Asyncio jesay laibryrywn ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: rd aml kay slslay ayk prwghramngh nmwnha hay jo aadad wa shmar kay slslay ko rd aml aur mtzuad andaza main prwsysngh ki ajazat dyta haay۔rd aml kay slslay ko bray mkdar main dayta ko snbhalnay aur dayta par karrwaiy karnay ka ayk tarykha mhaya karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، bjaiay is kay keh IT1 par karrwaiy karnay sy pehlay tamam aadad wa shmar kay dstyab hony ka antzaar kryn۔aysynsyw azaghr kay mayary laibryry ka mtzuad frym wrk hay jo nyt wrk knykshn 2 kay sath kam karnay kay liye aaly stahay ASYNC/antzaar karnay kay liye tyar kdym fraham krta haay۔aioractive asyncio kay liye ayk mtzuad aur rd aml wala azaghr laibryry hay jo Async ka astamal karty hain aur is ka antzaar karty hain jo azahaar fnkshnl laibryry par bnaya gaya hay aur kdrty tawr par azaghr ki
