Question: saft wyir dayzaain main trjman kay nmwnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main is kay nfaza ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: mtrjm ka nmwnha ayk tarza aml kay dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo zaban kay ghraimr ya tasarat ka andazaha karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔yha ghraimr ki nmaindghy kay sath sath ayk mwkl kay liye ghraimr ki trjmany karnay kay liye ayk trjman ki bhi wzuahat krta haay۔trjman ka nmwnha kesi zaban kay liye ghraimykl nmaindghy ki wzuahat kay liye astamal hawta hay aur is ghraimr 12 sy nmtnay kay liye ayk trjman fraham krta haay۔ trjman ka nmwnha kesi zaban main jmlay ki janch kay msilay ko hal karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as main ayk azahaar antrfys ko nafza karna shaml hay jo kesi khasa syak wa sbak ki trjmany karnay ka tarykha btata haay۔as nmwnha ko ays kyw ayl parsngh ، alamt prwsysngh anjnwn ، aur dyghr ayply kyshnza 2 main astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan azaghr main mtrjm kay nmwnay ki ayk msaal aml haay: azaghr klas azahaar: dayf ki tshryha (khwd ، syak wa sbak): pasklas nmbr (azahaar): dayf __ __init __ (khwd ، ، khud ،nmbr): sylf۔ nmbr = nmbr dayf ki tshryha (khwd ، syak wa sbak): wapsy sylf ۔nbrklas pls (azahaar): dayf __init __ (khwd ، baien ، daiyn): sylf۔ lyft = baien sylf۔ rait = dien dayf ki tshryha (khwd ،syak wa sbak main waps kryn۔khwd ، syak wa sbak): khud ko waps kryn۔tadad ، pls ، aur mains klasza azahaar tabkay kay thws nfaza hain jo baltrtyb tadad ، azuafay aur ghhtaؤ ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔ hr knkryt klas ki tshryha ka tarykha ayk syak wa sbak ka pyramytr lyta hay jo trjman ki mwjwdha haalt ki nmaindghy krta haay۔nmbr klas aasany sy is ki nmaindghy krta hay js ki nmaindghy krta haay۔pls aur mains klasza bar bar apnay baien aur dien awpryyndaza ki tshryha kay tarykha kar ko kehty hain aur mnasb aapryshn anjam dytay hayn۔ yahan azahaar ki klaswn ka ayk msaal astamal: paiytwnkwntykst = {} azahaar = pls (nmbr (1) ، mains (nmbr (2)، nmbr (3))) ntyjha = azahaar۔ antrpryt (syak wa sbak) prnt (ntyjha) # 0 is msaal sy ayk syak wa sbak ki lght aur ayk azahaar pyda hawta hay jo azahaar ki nmaindghy krta hay "1 + (2 - 3)"۔azahaar ki tshryha kay tarykha kar ko ayk dlyl kay tawr par syak wa sbak ki lght kay sath kaha jata hay ، aur is ka ntyjha knswl par chhpa jata haay۔ is msaal ki pydawar yeh hay kha: 0 is aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh "1 + (2 - 3)" 0.1 ka jaizaha lyta haay۔wykypydaya 2 jykfwrjyks

Question: wakaha sy chlnay waly fn tamyr (ay day aay) kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain aur yeh btaiyn keh un ko kis tarah azaghr main jyanghw aur flask jesay frym wrk ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: wakaha sy chlnay wala fn tamyr (ay day aay) ayk saft wyir dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo wakaat kay aas pas ayply kyshnza ko tshkyl dyta hay ، jo many khyza wakaat hain jo nzaam kay andr pysh aatay hayn۔ay day aay is khyal par mbny hay keh kesi bhi drkhwast kay tarza aml ko kesi mrkzay kntrwlr ya pehlay sy taay shuda kwaad kay ayk syt kay bjaiay wakaat kay zaryaha chlaya jana chahaiay۔ay day aay kay asawlwn main shaml hayn: daykplngh: ay day aay kesi drkhwast kay ajzaaa kay mabyn dahylay jwraay ko frwgh dyta hay ، js ki mdd sy woh trky ، taynat aur aazaadanha tawr par askyl karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔as sy atalak ko brkrar rkhnay main mazeed lchkdar aur aasan hawjata haay۔ asynchrwwny: ay day aay ftary tawr par mtzuad hay ، is ka mtalb hay keh wakaat par aazaadanha aur byk wkt amldraamd kya jaskta haay۔as sy bhatr karkrdghy aur askyl ayblty kay sath sath aadad wa shmar ki bray mkdar ko snbhalnay ki salahayt ki bhi ajazat mlty haay۔ aywnt sy chlnay wali prwsysngh: ay day aay mrkzay kntrwlr kay zaryaha un par karrwaiy ka antzaar karnay kay bjaiay prwsysngh kay wakaat par twjha mrkwza krta haay۔as sy tyza rftar rdaml kay awkat aur sstm wsail kay zayada mwsar astamal ki ajazat mlty haay۔ azaghr main ، ay day aay ko jyanghw aur flask jesay frym wrk ka astamal karty hoey laghw kya jaskta hay ، jo aywnt sy chlnay wali ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye mdd fraham karty hayn۔yhaan kuch tarykay hain jn ko ay day aay ko un frym wrk ka astamal karty hoey astamal kya jaskta haay: mysj brwkrza ka astamal karty hawiay: rbyt aym kyw aur apachy kafka jesay mysj brwkrza ko ay day aay ko azaghr ki ayply kyshnza main nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha brwkrza ayplykyshn kay mkhtlf ajzaaa kay zaryaha wakaat ko shaia karnay aur astamal karnay ki ajazat dytay hain ، jo ghair mtzalzal prwsysngh aur daykplngh ko kabl bnata haay۔ wakaha sy chlnay waly frym wrk ka astamal karty hawiay: flask aur jyanghw jesay azaghr kay frym wrk aywnt sy chlnay wali ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye maawnt fraham karty hayn۔yha frym wrk dawylprza ko aywnt kay hayndalrza ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dytay hain jo mkhsawsa wakaat ka jwab dytay hain ، jo sstm kay andr saarf kay aamal ya dyghr wakaat kay zaryaha mthark hawsktay hayn۔karkrdghy aur askyl ayblty main bhatry ko faal kryn۔yha CQRs (kmanda astfsar ki zamha dary alag alag krnay) jesi tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey haasal kya jaskta hay ، jo kesi ayply kyshn kay prahnay aur lkhnay waly madal ko alag krta haay۔jyanghw aur flask jesay frym wrk ka astamal krkay ، azaghr dawylprza aywnt sy chlnay wali ayply kyshnza tyar krsktay hain jo jdyd ، tksym shuda fn tamyrat kay mtaabk hayn۔

Question: blwm fltr ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur anasar ko shaml karnay aur mmbrshp ki janch pratal kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: yahan ayk azaghr ki klas hay jo blwm fltr ki nmaindghy krty hay aur anasar ko shaml karnay aur mmbrshp ki janch pratal kay tarykay fraham krty haay: paiythwnympwrt aym aym aych 3 frym btlry ampwrt btlryklas blwmfltr: dayf __init __ (khwd ، saiza ، haysh_kaؤnt): sylf۔ bt_aaraiy = btyray (saiza) khwd_ryry۔0) khwd= 1 def __ contains __ (khwd ، aaitm): rynj main Iklas kay pas ayk __init__ tarykha hay jo thwraa sa srny kay saiza ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ayk saiza ka pyramytr lyta hay aur astamal karnay kay liye haysh afaal ki tadad ki wzuahat karnay kay liye haysh_ kaؤnt pyramytr ki wzuahat krta haay۔yha 0 akdar kay sath bt srny ki abtda krta haay۔ ADD tarykha haysh fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey bt srny main isi bts ko trtyb dy kar blwm fltr main ayk ansar ko shaml krta haay۔bt srny main mtalkha tamam bts syt hayn۔aghr bts main sy koi bhi syt nahin hay tou ، ansar ykyny tawr par blwm fltr ka mmbr nahin haay۔aghr tamam bts mrtb kyay gaye hain tou ، ansar shayad blwm fltr ka mmbr haay۔ blwm fltr klas ka ayk msaal astamal: paiythnbf = blwmfltr (100 ، 3) by ayf۔ ayda ("haylw") by ayf۔ ayda ("dnya" ") prnt (BF main "haylw") # trwpnt ("BF main wrlda") # trwpnt (BF main "fw") # falsytys msaal 100 aur 3 haysh afaal kay saiza kay sath ayk blwm fltr aabjykt tyar krta haay۔as sy blwm fltr main anasar "haylw" aur "wrlda" shaml hawta hay aur agar "haylw" ، "wrlda" ، aur "fw" __contains__ tarykha ka astamal karty hoey blwm fltr kay mmbr hayn۔zaahar krta hay keh "haylw" aur "wrlda" blwm fltr kay mmbr hain ، jabky "fw" nahin haay۔taham ، yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh blwm fltrza ghalat msabt pyda krsktay hain ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh ayk ansar jo hakykt main blwm fltr kay mmbr nahin hawta hay isy ghalat tawr par mmbr kay tawr par shnakht kya jaskta haay۔

Question: "azaghr main hum aahanghy kay madalza ، jesay dhaghwn ، aml aur kwrwtainza kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur un kay tjarty talkat par tbadlha khyal kryn۔"
Answer: hum aahanghy kay madal un mkhtlf tarykwn ka hawalha dytay hain jn main ayk prwghram main mtadd kamwn ko byk wkt aml main laya jaskta haay۔azaghr main ، bohat sy hum aahanghy kay madal dstyab hain ، jn main shaml hayn: dhaghay: dhaghay par aml draamd kay halkay wzan waly ywnt hain jo ayk hi mymwry ki jghha ka ashtrak karty hayn۔wha I/O pabnd kamwn kay liye karaamd hain ، jahan prwghram apna zayada tr wkt un pt/aaؤt pt aapryshnwn kay mkml hony kay mntzar sirf krta haay۔wha sy py yw sy mnslk kamwn kay l useful karaamd hain ، jahan prwghram apna zayada tr wkt ghnty karnay main sirf krta haay۔ kwrwtainza: kwrwtain thrydaza ki tarah hain ، lekin woh bahamy taawn kay sath taay shuda hain ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh woh rzuakaranha tawr par dyghr kwrwtainwn par kntrwl haasal karty hayn۔wha I/O pabnd kamwn kay l useful mfyd hain jn kay liye aaly drjay ki hum aahanghy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ un hum aahanghy kay madalza main sy hr ayk ki karkrdghy ، pychydghy aur astamal main aasany kay maamlay main apni tjarty talkat hayn۔yhaan hr madal kay kuch tjarty talkat hayn: dhaghay: dhaghay astamal main aasan hain aur hum aahanghy kay hasawl ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham karty hayn۔taham ، un ko daybgh karna mshkl hawskta hay aur woh nsl kay haalat aur dayda laks jesay maamlat main mbtla hawsktay hayn۔taham ، woh thrydaza kay mkablay main zayada pychydha hain aur byn prwsys mwasalat ki wjha sy karkrdghy kay awwr hayda sy dwchar hawsktay hayn۔ kwrwtainza: kwrwtainza hum aahanghy kay hasawl kay liye halka phlka tarykha fraham krty hain aur yeh dhaghwn sy zayada mwsar hawskty hayn۔taham ، inhain aywnt lwp kay mhatata antzaam ki zurwrt hawty hay aur daybgh karna mshkl hawskta haay۔ jyanghw aur flask jesay frym wrk azaghr main hum aahanghy kay madalza kay liye mdd fraham karty hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، jyanghw ASYNC aur mtalwbha alfaza ka antzaar karnay waly mtzuad khyalat kay liye maawnt fraham krta hay ، jabky flask ASYNC aur ASYNCIO laibryry aur Asyncio laibryry ka astamal karty hoey ghair mtzalzal drkhwast hayndalrza kay liye mdd fraham krta haay۔ayk prwghram mynazaghr kiy hum aahanghy kay madal mhaya krta hay ، jn main thrydaza ، aml aur kwrwtain shaml hain ، hr ayk ki karkrdghy ، pychydghy aur astamal main aasany kay lhaaza sy apni tjart kay sath۔jyanghw aur flask jesay frym wrk azaghr main hum aahanghy kay madalza kay liye mdd fraham karty hain ، js sy hum aahanghy aur twsya pzayr ayply kyshnza ki tamyr aasan hawjaty haay۔

Question: aabjykt par mbny dayzaain main pl pytrn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main is kay nfaza ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: pl pytrn ayk sakhty dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo tjryd ko nfaza sy alag krta haay۔yha dono ko aazaadanha tawr par mkhtlf hony ki ajazat dyta hay aur is kay nfaza sy tjrydy ko daykpl karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta hay takha un dono ko aazaadanha tawr par tbdyl kya jaskay۔pl ka nmwnha mfyd hay jab aap kesi tjryd aur is kay nfaza kay mabyn mstkl pabnd hony sy bchna chahti hain ، ya jab aap mtadd tjrydwn kay darmiyan aml draamd karna chahti hayn۔khwd ، rdas): pasklas wyktwryndar (ryndarr): dayf ryndar_skl (khwd ، rdas): prnt (ayf "rdas {rdas ka ayk dairha daraingh {rdas} wyktr ryndarr ka astamal karty hawiay") klas rastryndar (ryndarr): dayf ryndar_skl (khwd ، rdas):prnt (ayf "rdas ka dairha daraingh {rdas} rastr ryndarr ka astamal karty hawiay") klas shkl: dayf __ __init __ (khwd ، pysh karnay wala): sylf ryndarr = ryndarr dayf dara (khwd)(shkl): dayf __init __ (khwd ، pysh karnay wala ، rdas): spr (): self.radius *= fyktryn is msaal kay tawr par ، ryndar klas ayk tjrydy klas hay jo ryndar_ srkl kay tarykha kar ki wzuahat krty haay۔wyktwryndar aur rastryndar klasza ryndar klas kay thws nfaza hain jo baltrtyb wyktr aur rastr ghrafks ka astamal karty hoey halkwn ko pysh karty hayn۔ shkl ki klas ayk tjrydy klas hay jo dara aur saiza ka saiza ki wzuahat krty haay۔srkl klas shkl klas ka thws aml hay jo ayk mkhsawsa rdas kay sath dairay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔dairay ko pysh karnay kay liye astamal karnay kay liye ryndarr ki wzuahat karnay kay liye yeh apnay knstrktr main ayk ryndar pyramytr lyta haay۔ halkha klas ka ayk msaal astamal: paiythwn wyktr_skl = srkl (wykwryndar () ، 5) wyktr_skl۔ daryw () wyktr_skl۔.draw () rastr_skl = srkl (rastryndar () ، 10) rastr_skl۔ daryw () rastr_s srkl.rysaiza (3) rastr_skl۔ dara () yeh msaal mkhtlf pysh knndghan aur ryday kay sath do dairay ki ashyaa tkhlyk krty haay۔yha hr dairay kay kraha andazay kay tarykha kar ko mkhsawsa ryndar ka astamal karty hoey pysh karnay kay liye kehty hain aur phir dairay ka saiza tbdyl karnay kay liye saiza ka saiza ka tarykha kehty hayn۔as kay bad is nay dwbarha saiza waly dairay ko pysh karnay kay liye ayk bar phir kraha andazay ka tarykha krar diya haay۔rastr ryndaryrts aaؤt pt ka astamal karty hoey yeh zaahar hawta hay keh halkay mkhsawsa ryndar ka astamal karty hoey pysh kyay jatay hain aur ryndar ko mtasar kyay baghair is ka saiza tbdyl kya jaskta haay۔

Question: mslsl anzumam aur mstkl taynaty (CI/CD) kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain aur yeh btaiyn keh azaghr mnsawbwn main jynknza ya ght lyb jesay twlza ka astamal karty hoey un ka atalak kesay kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: mslsl anzumam (CI) aur mslsl taynaty (CD) saft wyir anjynirngh kay taryk kar hain jn ka mksad saft wyir ki tamyr ، janch aur taynaty kay aml ko khud kar bnana haay۔jdyd saft wyir dawylpmnt tymwn kay liye yeh mshkyn zurwry hain kywnkha woh is bat ko ykyny bnanay main mdd karty hain keh saft wyir ko tyzay sy ، kabl aatmad aur aaly mayar kay sath phanchaya jata haay۔yhaan CI/CD kay kuch asawl hayn: bar bar kwda anzumam: dawylprza apnay kwda ko bar bar wrzen kntrwl rypwzatry main dakhl karty hain ، aksar ، is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye keh nkaisa aur dyghr saft wyir kay mayar kay amwr ki jld shnakht ki jati haay۔ aatwmytyda tystngh: kwdabys par khwdkar tyst chlaiay jatay hayn۔as bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye keh yeh mtalwbha mayar kay mayar par pora atrta haay۔as main ywnt tyst ، anzumam kay tyst ، aur kbwlyt tyst shaml hayn۔ mshtrkha trsyl: mntkhb krdha mahawl main saft wyir ki frahamy ko khwdkar karnay ka aml ، bshmwl pydawar ، trky ، aur janch kay mahawl۔yha tamyr ، tyst ، aur taynaty kay aml ko khud kar tarykay sy anjam dy kar kya jata haay۔ mshtrkha taynaty: saft wyir ko khud bkhwd prwdakshn mahawl main janchnay aur mnzawr hony kay bad khud bkhwd taynat karnay ka aml sy aaiy/sy day tarykwn sy faidha atha sakta hay ، aur bohat sary twlza dstyab hayn۔an ko nafza karnay kay liye ، bshmwl jynknza ، ght lyb ، aur symfwr۔yha twlza blda ، tyst aur taynaty kay aml ko khud kar bnanay ka ayk tarykha fraham karty hain ، js sy saft wyir ko jldy aur aaly mayar kay sath fraham karna aasan hawjata haay۔yha kuch tarykay hain jn ko azaghr prwjykts main astamal kya jaskta haay: khwdkar janch: azaghr prwjykts khud kar tarykay sy janch kay l p ، pytsyst ، ywntst ، aur kwryj jesay twlza astamal krsktay hayn۔janch kay aml ko khud kar bnanay kay liye un twlza ko jynknza aur ght lyb jesay sy aaiy/sy day twlza kay sath mrbwta kya jaskta haay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh kwda ko ksart sy mrbwta kya jata hay aur is nkaisa ki jld shnakht hawjaty haay۔ tay .n ki taynaty: jynknza aur ght lyb jesay sy day twlza taynaty kay aml ko khud kar bnanay kay liye astamal kyay jasktay hayn۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh saft wyir ko tyzay sy aur kabl aatmad tarykay sy pydawary mahawl ko phanchaya jata haay۔ khlasaha main ، jdyd saft wyir dawylpmnt tymwn kay liye sy aaiy/sy day kay taryk kar zurwry hain ، aur azaghr prwjykts un sy faidha athasktay hayn۔jynknza aur ghtlab jesay twlza blda ، tyst aur taynaty kay aml ko khud kar bnanay ka ayk tarykha fraham karty hain ، js sy saft wyir ko jldy aur aaly mayar kay sath fraham karna aasan hawjata haay۔

Question: bainry aspys partyshnngh (by ays py) kay drkht ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur khlaiy tksym aur kryby prawsy ki tlash kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: bainry aspys partyshnngh (by ays py) ayk aysy tknyk hay jo kmpywtr ghrafks aur alghwrthmk jywmytry main astamal hawty hay takha kesi jghha ko chhwtay hasawn main tksym kya jaskay۔by ays py ko haaiprplynza ko btawr partyshn astamal karty hoey do mhadb sytwn main jghha ko mtnazaaha tawr par tksym krkay nafza kya jata haay۔zayly tksym ka yeh aml by ays py try 123 kay nam sy jana jata drkht kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki shkl main jghha kay andr mwjwd ashyaa ki nmaindghy ko jnm dyta haay۔ yahan azaghr main by ays py kay drkht ki ayk msaal haay: azaghr klas nwda: dayf __init __ (khwd ، nktaha ،baiyn = koi nahin ، koi bhi nhayn): sylf pwaint = pwaint khwd۔): agar pwaints nahin hain tw: koi bhi nahin mda = lyn (pwaints) // 2 baien = sylf۔ blda_try (pwaints [: wsta]) dien = sylf۔ blda_try (pwaints [mda+1:]) wapsy nwda (pwaints [mda]، baien ، daiyn) dayf kryb tryn_nyghbr (khwd ، nktaha): sylf۔best_dist dist = self.distance (node.Point ، nktaha) agar dast <best_dist: best_dist = dast byst_nwda = nwda agar node.left and node.left.Point [0]> = nktaha [0] - Best_dist: best_node ، best_dist =sylf۔byst_nwda ، byst_dayst dayf fasalha (khwd ، py 1 ، py 2) wapsas msaal kay tawr par ، nwda klas by ays py kay drkht main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main ayk nktaha aur is kay baien aur dien bchwn ka hawalha hawta haay۔by ays py klas by ays py kay drkht ki nmaindghy krta hay aur drkht ki tamyr aur kesi dyiay gaye nktaha kay kryb trien prawsy ko tlash karnay kay tarykay mhaya krta haay۔ blda_try ka tarykha by ays py kay drkht ko drkht ki jra kay wsta nktaha kay wsta nktaha ko drkht ki jra kay tawr par mntkhb krkay bar bar tamyr krta haay۔baiyn aur dien sbtryza۔ kryb tryn_jybbr ka tarykha drkht ko bar bar abwr krkay aur mwjwdha nwda aur hadf nktaha kay darmiyan fasalha chyk krkay kesi dyiay gaye nktaha ka kryb trien prawsy paya jata haay۔_nearrest_neighber tarykha ayk mddghar tarykha hay jo bar bar chlnay waly trywrsl ko anjam dyta haay۔ yahan by ays py klas ka ayk msaal astamal haay: azaghr pwaint = [(1 ، 2) ، (3 ، 4) ، (5 ، 6) ، (7 ، 8) ، (7 ، 8) ، (7 ، 8) ، (7 ، 8) ، (7 ، 8) ، (7 ، 8) ، (7 ، 8) ، (7 ، 8) ، (7 ، 8)9 ، 10)] by ays py = by ays py (pwaints) kryb trien = bsp.nearrest_neigbor ((4 ، 5)) prnt (kryb tryn۔ pwaint) # (3 ، 4) yeh msaal pwaints ki ayk fharst bnaty hay aur un sy by ays py kay drkht ki tshkyl krty haay۔by ays py klas۔as kay bad is ko kryb trien prawsy (4 ، 5) kryby_nyghbr kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey mil jata hay aur is ka ntyjha knswl par prnt krta haay۔ is msaal ki pydawar yeh hay kha: (3 ، 4) is aaؤt pt sy zaahar hawta hay keh nktaha ka kryb trien prawsy (4، 5) nktaha hay (3 ، 4)

Question: azaghr main mytaprwghramngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur mytaklas ya sjawt karnay walon ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: mytaprwghramngh ayk prwghramngh tknyk hay jo kesi prwghram ko rn taim kay wkt apna kwda main trmym karnay ya pyda karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔azaghr main ، mytaklas ya daykwrytrza ka astamal karty hoey mytaprwghramngh haasal ki jaskty haay۔mytaklass klasza hain jo dusray tabkwn kay tarza aml ki wzuahat karty hain ، jabky sjawt aysay afaal hain jo dusray afaal ya klas 123 kay tarza aml main trmym karty hayn۔*aarghs ، ** kwwrghs): agar sy ayl ays sy ayl ays main nahin haay۔: is msaal kay tawr par ، snghltn mytaklas ki wzuahat is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye ki hogi hay keh klas ki sirf ayk msaal tshkyl di hogi haay۔mytaklas ka __Call__ tarykha yeh jannay kay liye awwrrada hay keh aya klas ki koi msaal pehlay hi tshkyl di hogi haay۔aghr koi msaal nahin bnaiy hogi hay tou ، ayk niy msaal tkhlyk ki hogi hay aur _ anstyns dakshnry main mhafwza haay۔ maiklas klas ki taryf snghltn mytaklas kay sath snghltn sy mytaklas wsaf trtyb dy kar ki hogi haay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh maiklas klas ki sirf ayk msaal tshkyl di hogi haay۔ yahan azaghr main ayk sjawt ki msaal haay: pythwndaf mymwiza (fnk): kyshay = {} dayf rypr (*aarghs): agar aarghs kyshay main nahin hayn: kyshay [aarghs]= fnk (*aarghs) waps kyshay [aarghs] rytrn rypr@mymwizaaizaf fbwnyky (ayn): agar n <2: rytrn ayn rytrn fybwnyky (ayn -1) + fbwnyky (ayn-2) is msaal main ، mymwzaaiza daykwrytr ki wzuahat ki hogi haay۔fibonacci fnkshn kay ntaij ko kysh karnay kay liay.rypr fnkshn ki wzuahat mymwiza fnkshn kay andr ki hogi hay takha hr dlail kay hr syt kay liye fbwnyky fnkshn kay ntaij ko kysh kya jaskay۔ fbwnyky fnkshn ko fnkshn ki taryf kay upar @mymwmaiza daykwrytr rakh kar mymwiza daykwrytr kay sath sjaya gaya haay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh fbwnyky fnkshn kay ntaij dlail kay hr syt kay liye kyshay hoey hayn۔ khlasaha main ، mytaprwghramngh ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo kesi prwghram ko rn taim kay wkt apna kwda main trmym karnay ya pyda karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔azaghr main ، mytaklas ya daykwrytrza ka astamal karty hoey mytaprwghramngh haasal ki jaskty haay۔mytaklass klasza hain jo dusray tabkwn kay tarza aml ki wzuahat krty hain ، jabky sjawt kar woh kam hain jo dusray afaal ya klaswn kay tarza aml main trmym karty hayn۔mytaprwghramngh ko zayada lchkdar aur mthark prwghram bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: hadayt shuda aysaiklk ghraf (day aay jy) ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash (day ayf ays) ka astamal karty hoey twpwlwjykl chhantnay kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: twpwlwjykl chhantna ayk aysy tknyk hay jo hadayt waly aysaiklk ghraf (day aay jy) kay amwdy ko is tarah aardar karnay kay liye astamal hawty hay keh hr hadayt shuda ayj ywwy kay liye ، wrtyks yw aardar main wy sy pehlay aata haay۔yha aardar bohat sy ayply kyshnza main karaamd hay jesay task shydawlngh ، anstrkshn shydawlngh ، aur dayta syrylaizayshn۔twpwlwjykl chhntaiy dono ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash (day ayf ays) aur chwraaiy ki pehli tlash (by ayf ays) alghwrthmza 123456 ka astamal karty hoey ki jaskty haay۔ yahan azaghr main day ayf ays ka astamal karty hoey twpwlwjykl chhantnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiytwnklas day aay jy: dayf __init __ (khwd)}} dayf ayda_j (khwd ، yw ، wy): agar aap sylf ghraf main nahin hayn: sylf ghraf [u] = [] sylf ghraf [u] .append (v) dayf twpwlwjykl_swrt (khwd): mlahazaha karain = syt (syt () astyk = [] dayf day ayf ays (nwda): mlahazaha kya ghya۔ aydada (nwda) main prawsy main khwd۔sylf ghraf myn: agar nwda nahin mlahazaha kryn: day ayf ays (nwda) rytrn astyk [::-1] is msaal main ، day aay jy klas hadayt shuda aysaiklk ghraf ki nmaindghy krty hay aur day ayf ays ka astamal karty hoey twpwlwjykl chhantnay kay l to ayk tarykha twpwlwjykl_swrt fraham krty haay۔ADD_EDGE ka tarykha ghraf main knarwn ko shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ twpwlwjykl_swrt ka tarykha ghraf main hr nwda par day ayf ays anjam dyta hay aur nwdas ko un kay aakhry awkat kay alt trtyb main astyk main shaml krta haay۔as kay bad astyk ko twpwlwjykl aardarngh haasal karnay kay liye alt diya jata haay۔ yahan day aay jy klas ka ayk msaal astamal: azaghrghraf = day aay jy () ghraf.ada_j (5 ، 2) ghraf.aday_j (5 ، 0) ghraf۔ ayda_j (4 ، 0) ghraf.add_edge (4 ، 1) ghraf.aday_j (2 ، 3) ghraf.aday_j (3 ، 1) prnt (ghraf.twpwlwjykl_swrt ()) # [5 ، 4 ، 2 ، 3 ، 1 ، 0] yeh msaal ayk day aay jy tshkyl dyty haaychh nwdas aur chh knarwn kay sath aur twpwlwjykl_swrt kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey twpwlwjykl chhant raha haay۔as msaal ki pydawar []] [4] [2] [3] [1] [0] hay ، jo ghraf kay tapwlwjykl aardar ki nmaindghy krta haay۔

Question: azaghr main hum aahanghy aur hum aahanghy kay tsawr par tbadlha khyal karain aur un kay mabyn akhtlafat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: hum aahanghy aur hum aahanghy do tsawrat hain jo aksar ayk dusray kay sath astamal hawtay hain ، lekin prwghramngh kay tnazar main un kay mkhtlf many hawtay hayn۔azaghr main ، mkhtlf tknykwn ، jesay thrydangh ، mlty prwsysngh aur kwrwtainza ka astamal karty hoey hum aahanghy aur hum aahanghy haasal ki jaskty haay۔yhaan azaghr main hum aahanghy aur hum aahanghy kay mabyn akhtlafat hayn: hum aahanghy: ayk sy zayada kamwn ya aml ko byk wkt snbhalnay kay prwghram ki salahayt sy mrad haay۔ ayk hi wkt main mtadd kamwn ko pyshrft karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، lekin zurwry nahin keh byk wkt۔ mtadd mlazamtwn ko lenay ki ajazat dyta haay۔asy mshtrkha wsail tak rsaiy haasal karnay ka rkh ، jesay dask ، nyt wrk ، ya ayk hi sy py yw kwr۔ thrydangh aur kwrwtainza jesi tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey haasal kya jaskta haay۔ yeh I/O- pabnd kamwn kay liye mfyd hay ، jahan prwghram apna zayada tr wkt un pt kay antzaar main sirf krta haay/aaؤt pt aapryshn mkml karnay kay liay۔ mtwazal azam: ayk sath mtadd kamwn ya aml ko byk wkt anjam denay kay prwghram ki salahayt sy mrad haay۔ haarda wyir wsail kay astamal ko zayada sy zayada astamal karnay kay baray main mtadd kamwn ko aazaadanha tawr par tksym shuda wsail par sath sath chlanay kay liye kiy kamwn ki ajazat dyta haay۔CPU sy mnslk kamwn kay l useful mfyd tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey haasal kya jaiay۔ham aahanghy main mtadd mlazamtwn ko ayk hi mshtrkha wsail tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat shaml hay ، jabky hum aahanghy mtadd kamwn ko aazaadanha tawr par tksym shuda wsail kay sath sath sath chlnay ki ajazat denay kay baray main haay۔azaghr hum aahanghy aur hum aahanghy dono kay liye mykanzam mhaya krta hay ، hr ayk apnay nhaw aur astamal kay maamlat kay sath۔

Question: blwm fltr ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur anasar ko shaml karnay aur kam ghalat msabt shrha kay sath mmbrshp ki janch pratal kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: ayk blwm fltr ayk amkany aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo yeh janchnay kay liye astamal hawta hay keh aya ansar kesi syt ka mmbr hay ya nhayn۔yha ayk khlaiy mwsar dayta dahanchha hay jo mn many tawr par bray tadad main anasar kay sath syt ki nmaindghy krskta haay۔taham ، jo kymt hum karkrdghy kay l pay ada karty hain woh yeh hay keh yeh ftart main amkany hay ، mtalb yeh hay keh is kay kuch ghalat msabt ntaij braamd hawsktay hayn۔jhwtay msabt is wkt paiay jatay hain jab fltr hamain btata hay keh ansar syt ka mmbr hawta hay ، lekin aysa nahin haay۔dwsry taraf ، jhwtay mnfy is wkt paiay jatay hain jab fltr hamain btata hay keh ansar syt ka mmbr nahin hawta hay ، lekin aysa hawta haay۔blwm fltrza kabhi bhi ghalat mnfy ntaij pyda nahin karty hayn۔ kam ghalat msabt shrha kay sath azaghr main blwm fltr ko nafza karnay kay liye ، hum PYPI par dstyab blwm fltr pykyj ka astamal krsktay hayn۔blwm fltr pykyj sy blwmfltr klas ka ayk msaal astamal haay: azaghr sy blwm_fltr ampwrt blwm fltr blwm = blwm fltr (myks_ ay aylymnt = 1000 ، ghltay_ryt = 0.01) blwm.adada ("haylw") blwm daat ("dnya") prnt ("haylw) prnt (" haylw ")"blwm myn) # trwpnt (" wrlda "blwm myn) # trwpnt (" fw "blwm myn) # falsthys msaal main zayada sy zayada 1000 anasar aur 0.01 ki ghltay ki shrha kay sath blwm fltr aabjykt tyar krta haay۔as sy blwm fltr main anasar "haylw" aur "wrlda" shaml hawta hay aur agar "haylw" ، "wrlda" ، aur "fw" blwm fltr kay mmbr hain tou un aaprytr ka astamal karty hawiay۔zaahar krta hay keh "haylw" aur "wrlda" blwm fltr kay mmbr hain ، jabky "fw" nahin haay۔blwm fltr ki ghltay ki shrha 0.01 par syt ki hogi hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh ghalat msabt ntaij ka 1 ٪ amkan mwjwd haay۔ghlta msabt shrha ko kam karnay kay l we ، hum blwm fltr kay saiza ko braha saktay hain ya fltr main dakhl krdha anasar ki tadad ko kam krsktay hayn۔

Question: "azaghr main dayzaain kay nmwnwn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur snghltn ، fyktry ، aur mbsaryn kay nmwnwn ki msaalyn pysh kryn۔"
Answer: saft wyir ki nshwwnma main pyda hony waly aam msail kay dayzaain kay nmwnay dwbarha kabl astamal hal hayn۔wha mkhsawsa dayzaain kay msail ko hal karnay kay liye ayk blyw prnt fraham karty hain ، js sy dawylprza ko zayada mwsar ، brkrar rkhnay aur lchkdar saft wyir bnanay ki ajazat mlty haay۔dayzaain kay nmwnay zaban-aghnwstk hain ، lekin is jwab main ، hum azaghr main dayzaain kay tyn mkbwl nmwnwn ko nafza karnay par twjha dyn ghay: snghltn ، fyktry ، aur mbsaryn kay nmwnay۔ yahan snghltn ، fyktry ، aur mbsaryn ki mkhtsar wzuahatyn hayn: snghltn pytrn: snghltn pytrn:snghltn pytrn ayk tkhlyky dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo ykyny bnata hay keh klas main sirf ayk msaal mwjwd hay aur is msaal tak rsaiy ka aalmy nktaha fraham krta haay۔yha nmwnha mfyd hay jab hamain yeh ykyny bnana hoga keh kesi tabkay ki sirf ayk msaal tshkyl di jaye ، jesay jab hum mshtrkha wsail tak rsaiy ko kntrwl karna chahti hain ya aalmy ryast ko brkrar rkhna chahti hayn۔ fyktry pytrn: fyktry ka nmwnha ayk tkhlykaty dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo fraham krta haay۔ayk spr klas main ashyaa bnanay kay liye ayk antrfys ، lekin zayly tabkat ko is ksm ki ashyaa ko tbdyl karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jo tkhlyk kya jaye gha۔yha nmwnha is wkt mfyd hay jab hum aabjykt ki ayn mtaabk tabkay ki wzuahat kyay baghair ashyaa bnana chahti hain jo tshkyl dyiay jien ghay۔ awzarwr pytrn: aabzarwr pytrn ayk tarza aml ka dayzaain hay jo ashyaa kay mabyn ayk sy zayada anhasaar ki wzuahat krta hay ، takha jab ayk shay jab ayk shaytbdylyan byan krty hain ، is kay tamam mnhasar afrad ko khud bkhwd mtala kya jata hay aur ap dayt hawjata haay۔yha nmwnha is wkt mfyd hay jab hum mtalkha ashyaa kay mabyn mstkl mzaajy ko brkrar rkhna chahti hayn۔ yahan azaghr main snghltn ، fyktry ، aur mbsaryn kay nmwnwn ki msaalyn hayn: snghltn pytrn: hum mytaklas ka astamal karty hoey azaghr main snghltn pytrn ko nafza krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: pythwnklas snghltn (ksm): _ anstyns = {} def __call __ (cls ، *args ، ** Kwargs): agar cls cls._Instances main nahin haay: cls._instances [cls] = spr ()، ** KWARGS) wapsy sy ayl ays۔fyktry fnkshn ka astamal karty hawiay۔yhaan ayk msaal haay: paiytwnklas daagh: dayf __ __init __ (khwd ، nam): sylf daat nam = namyf tkhlyk_dawgh (nam): rytrn daagh (nam) daagh 1 = tkhlyk_dawgh ("fydaw") daagh 2 = tkhlyk_dawgh ("ryt") is msaal main ، is msaal main ،tkhlyk_dawgh fnkshn ayk fyktry fnkshn hay jo ktay ki klas ki msaal pyda krta haay۔ awzarwr pytrn: hum aar ayks pykyj sy mshahadha karnay aur mbsar klaswn ka astamal karty hoey azaghr main aabzarwr pytrn ko nafza krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: azaghr kay aar ayks draamd kay kabl mshahadha ، mbsaryn ، maiyw bshr (aabzarwr): dayf aan_ nykst (sylf ، wylyw): prnt (ayf "mwsawlha: {wylyw}") dayf aan_kmpltda (khwd): prnt ("kya") dayf aan_rwr (khwd، ghltay): prnt (ayf "ghltay: {ghltay}") makhza = mshahadha karnay wala۔akdar jo isy mwsawl hawty hayn۔makhza aabjykt ayk kabl mshahadha hay jo akdar 1 ، 2 ، aur 3 ko kharj krta haay۔ sbskraib ka tarykha makhza ko kabl mshahadha kay liye maiwbsrwr aabjykt ko sbskraib karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔jb makhza kabl mshahadha akdar ko kharj krta hay tou ، maiwbsrwr aabjykt inhain knswl par prnt krta haay۔

Question: azaghr main kchray kay jma karnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur mymwry kay antzaam kay liye astamal hony wali mkhtlf hakmt amlywn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: kwraa krkt jma karnay sy mymwry kay antzaam ki ayk tknyk hay jo prwghramngh zabanwn main khud bkhwd mymwry ko dwbarha dawy karnay kay liye astamal hawty hay jo ab astamal main nahin haay۔azaghr main ، mymwry ki mkhtsa aur dayl lwkyshn khud kar tarykay sy hawty hay ، aur azaghr kay trjman main ayk blt un kchra jma karnay wala hawta hay jo khud bkhwd ayk azaghr prwghram main mymwry ki mkhtsa aur ashyaa kay l det dayl lwkyshn ka antzaam krta haay۔kchra jma karnay wala mymwry ka ptha lghanay aur aazaad karnay kay liye zamha dar hay jo ab prwghram kay zaryaha astamal nahin hawta hay aur yeh azaghr kay mymwry mynjmnt sstm 123456 ka ayk aham hasaha haay۔hawalha ghnty kesi shay kay hawalwn ki tadad par nzar rkhnay ka aml haay۔jb kesi shay kay hawalha ki ghnty safr par ghr jati hay tou ، ab is ki zurwrt nahin hawty hay aur isy mhafwza tarykay sy mymwry sy hataya jaskta haay۔taham ، mymwry mynjmnt kay tamam maamlat ko snbhalnay kay liye tnhaa hawalha ghnty kafy nahin hay ، lhazaa azaghr main kchray kay jma karnay waly ko bhi astamal kya jata hay jo srklr hawalwn ka ptha lghaskta hay aur isy aazaad krskta haay۔kchray kay jma karnay waly ko do tarykwn sy azaghr main nafza kya jata haay: hawalha ghnty aur nsl sazay۔jb kesi shay ki hawalha ghnty 0 tak phanch jati hay tou ، ryfrns ghnty kchra jma karnay kay alghwrthm fwry tawr par is chyza ko saaf krdytay hayn۔nsl kay kwraay dan ka mjmwaha ayk zayada nfys alghwrthm hay jo dahyr ko nslwn main tksym krta hay aur un ki amr 123456 par mbny ashyaa ko jma krta haay۔ khlasaha main ، azaghr ka kwraa krkt jma karnay wala ayk blt un khsawsayt hay jo khud bkhwd mymwry ki mkhtsa aur kesi paiytwn prwghram main aabjykt kay liye dayl lwkyshn ka antzaam krty haay۔as main mymwry mkhtsa karnay kay liye do hakmt amly astamal ki hogi hayn: hawalha ghnty aur kwraa krkt jma krna۔hawalha ghnty kesi shay kay hawalay sy hawalwn ki tadad par nzar rkhnay ka aml hay ، jabky kchra jma karna jab prwghram ki zurwrt nahin hay tou mkhtsa mymwry ki bhaaly ya rhaaiy ka aml haay۔kchra jma karnay wala mymwry ka ptha lghanay aur aazaad karnay kay liye zamha dar hay jo ab prwghram kay zaryaha astamal nahin hawta hay aur yeh azaghr kay mymwry mynjmnt sstm ka ayk aham hasaha haay۔

Question: ayk lahakha drkht ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur mwsar tzaiyn ki tlash kay liye tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: ayk lahakha drkht ki nmaindghy karnay aur mwsar astrytngh tlash kay tarykay fraham karnay waly ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum PYPI par dstyab lahakha lahakha lahakha lahakha lahakha klas astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan lahakha klas ka ayk msaal astamal haay: azaghr sy lahakha_try ampwrt lahakha lahakha، lahakha klas "kylay" kay tar kay liye lahakha drkht bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔tlash ka tarykha lahakha drkht main "ana" aur "fw" ko tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ is msaal ki pydawar yeh hay kha: try falsty aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh "ana" "kylay" ka ayk zakhyrha hay ، jabky "fw" nahin haay.yha lahakha klas lahakha drkhtwn kay sath kam karnay kay l several kiy dusray tarykay mhaya krta hay ، jesay dakhl karain ، hataiyn ، aur ghnty kryn۔an tarykwn ka astamal lahakha drkht main trmym karnay aur drkhtwn main sbstrnghza kay wakaat ko ghnnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، ayk lahakha drkht ayk aysa dayta dahanchha hay jo tar main sbstranghza ko mwsar andaza main tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔azaghr kiy pykyj mhaya krta hay ، jesay lahakha ، jo lahakha drkhtwn ko nafza karty hain aur mwsar astrngh tlash kay liye tarykay mhaya karty hayn۔an pykyjwn ka astamal ayk lahakha drkht ki nmaindghy karnay waly azaghr klas ko nafza karnay aur mwsar astrngh tlash kay liye tarykay fraham karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔

Question: "azaghr main rd aml prwghramngh aur rd aml ki twsya (RX) kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain ، aur yeh btaiyn keh woh wakaha sy chlnay waly nzaam ko kis tarah aasan bnatay hayn۔"
Answer: rd aml prwghramngh ayk prwghramngh nmwnha hay jo ghair mtzalzal dayta astrymza aur aywnt par mbny prwghramwn sy mtalk haay۔ry ayktw prwghramngh ryil taim kmpywtyshnl mhanghay wakaat ko snbhalnay kay liye mfyd hay jo saarf kay liye anthaaiy antrayktw tjrbha ko ahal bnatay hayn۔rd aml prwghramngh aabzarwr pytrn par mbny hay ، jahan ayk mshahadha karnay wala shay apnay mbsaryn ko mtala krta hay jab is ki ryast tbdyl hawty haay۔ry ayktw aykstynshnza (aar ayks) laibryry ka astamal karty hoey ry ayktw prwghramngh ka atalak kya jata hay ، jo paiytwn 123456 main kabl tazayrat aur aywnt par mbny prwghramwn ko mshahadha karnay waly zakhyray aur paip aybl astfsar aaprytrza ka astamal karty hoey aaprytrza ka ayk syt fraham krta haay۔azaghr myn: ghair mtzalzal aur wakaha par mbny prwghramngh: rd aml prwghramngh ghair mtzalzal dayta astrymza aur aywnt par mbny prwghramwn sy mtalk haay۔yha dawylprza ko mshahadat kay sath ghair mtzalzal dayta astrymza ki nmaindghy karnay ، aaprytrza ka astamal karty hoey ghair mtzalzal dayta astrymza sy astfsar karnay ، aur shydawlrza ka astamal karty hoey dayta/aywnt astrymza main hum aahanghy ko pyramytraiza karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔dayta haasal karnay kay liay.mshahadha karnay waly aur mbsaryn rd aml prwghramngh kay bldangh blaks hayn۔ aaprytrza: aaprytrza aysay kam hawtay hain jo mshahadat ko tbdyl ، fltr ya ykja karty hayn۔aaprytrza dawylprza ko sadha bldangh blak ka astamal karty hoey pychydha ghair mtzalzal aur wakaha par mbny prwghram tharyr karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ shydawlrza: shydawlrza aysy chyzayn hain jo mshahadat ki hum aahanghy ko kntrwl krty hayn۔shydawlrza dawylprza ko karkrdghy aur wsail kay astamal ko bhatr bnanay kay liye mshahadha karnay walon ki hum aahanghy ko pyramytraiza karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml prwghramngh ayk prwghramngh nmwnha hay jo ghair mtzalzal dayta astrymza aur aywnt par mbny prwghramwn sy mtalk haay۔ry ayktyw aykstynshnza (aar ayks) laibryry ka astamal karty hoey ry ayktw prwghramngh ka atalak kya jata hay ، jo azaghr main mshahadha karnay waly mjmwawn aur paip aybl astfsar aaprytrza ka astamal karty hoey ghair snjydha aur wakaha par mbny prwghramwn ko kmpwza karnay kay liye aaprytrza ka ayk syt fraham krta haay۔ry ayktw prwghramngh ryil taim kmpywtyshnl mhanghay wakaat ko snbhalnay kay liye mfyd hay jo saarf kay liye anthaaiy antrayktw tjrbha ko ahal bnatay hayn۔rd aml prwghramngh aabzarwr pytrn par mbny hay ، jahan ayk mshahadha karnay wala shay apnay mbsaryn ko mtala krta hay jab is ki ryast tbdyl hawty haay۔

Question: dayta bys main hum aahanghy kay kntrwl kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur alag thlgh staha aur un kay tjarty talkat par tbadlha khyal kryn۔
Answer: dayta bys main hum aahanghy ka kntrwl ayk dayta bys main mshtrkha wsail tak rsaiy ka antzaam karnay ka aml hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh lyn dyn ko sahayha aur mstkl andaza main anjam diya jaiay۔dayta bys main hum aahanghy ka kntrwl aham hay kywnkha ayk sy zayada lyn dyn byk wkt aml main laya jaskta hay ، aur agar un ka sahayha antzaam nahin kya jata hay tou ، woh ayk dusray kay sath mdakhlt krsktay hain aur dayta bys main tzuadat ka sbb bn saktay hayn۔yhaan alag thlgh ki mkhtlf stahayn aur un kay tjarty talkat hayn: ghair mnkwlha prahyn: yeh tnhaaiy ki staha lyn dyn ko dusray lyn dyn sy ghyrmamwly dayta prahnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha staha aaly staha ki hum aahanghy fraham krty hay blkha aadad wa shmar ki mstkl mzaajy ki nchly staha ko bhi fraham krty haay۔yha staha ghair mamwly prahnay kay mkablay main aadad wa shmar ki mstkl mzaajy ki aaly staha fraham krty hay lekin is kay ntyjay main zayada msdwd aur kam hum aahanghy pyda hawskty haay۔ kabl aml prahyn: yeh tnhaaiy ki staha is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh lyn dyn dayta bys ka mstkl snyp shat dykhta hay ، chahaay dusray lyn dyn aadad wa shmar main trmym kar rahay hawn۔yha staha prahnay kay artkab kay mkablay main aadad wa shmar ki mstkl mzaajy ki aaly staha fraham krty hay lekin is kay ntyjay main zayada msdwd aur kam hum aahanghy pyda hawskty haay۔ syrylaiza aybl: yeh tnhaaiy ki staha is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh lyn dyn ko syrylaizangh trtyb main aml main laya jaye ، js ka mtalb hay keh byk wkt mtadd lyn dyn ko anjam denay ka ntyjha ayk hi haay۔jysa keh un ko syrylly tawr par phansy dy rahay hayn۔yha staha aadad wa shmar ki mstkl mzaajy ki aaly staha fraham krty hay lekin is kay ntyjay main zayada msdwd aur kam hum aahanghy pyda hawskty haay۔ khlasaha main ، hum aahanghy ka kntrwl ayk dayta bys main mshtrkha wsail tak rsaiy ka antzaam karnay ka aml hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh lyn dyn ko sahayha aur mstkl tawr par aml main laya jaiay۔mkhtlf tnhaaiy ki staha aadad wa shmar main mstkl mzaajy aur hum aahanghy kay mabyn mkhtlf tjarty talkat mhaya krty haay۔ksy dyiay gaye drkhwast kay l the mnasb tnhaaiy ki staha ka antkhab karna zurwry hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh dayta bys mstkl aur mwsar haay۔

Question: "ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain js main khud twazan bainry tlash kay drkht ki nmaindghy ki jaye ، jesay aay wy ayl ka drkht ya srkh rngh ka drkht۔"
Answer: bainry tlash kay drkht ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum PYPI par dstyab khud twazan bainry srch try pykyj ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ays by by ays ty klas ka ayk msaal astamal haay: azaalha khwd_blansngh_bainry_srch_try draamd sbbsttree = sbbsttree = sbbsttree () drkht. insert (5) drkht. insert (3) insert (7) drkht (7) drkht (2) drkht (4) drkht. insert(6) try.nsrt (8) prnt (drkht.charch (5)) # trwpnt (drkht۔ srch (9)) # falyn is msaal kay tawr par ، ays by by ays ty klas ko khud twazan bainry srch try bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dakhl karnay ka tarykha drkht main anasar dakhl karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، aur drkht main anasar ki tlash kay liye tlash ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔ is msaal ki pydawar yeh hay kha: tryflsthys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh ansar 5 drkht main mwjwd hay ، jabky ansar 9aysa nahin haay۔ khud twazan bainry srch try pykyj khud twazan bainry tlash kay drkhtwn kay sath kam karnay kay l several kiy dusray tarykay mhaya krta hay ، jesay hazaf ، kam sy kam ، zayada sy zayada aur pyshrw۔an tarykwn ka astamal drkht main trmym karnay aur drkhtwn main anasar kay kam sy kam ، zayada sy zayada aur pyshrw tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha yeh keh ayk khud twazan bainry tlash ka drkht ayk bainry srch drkht hay jo khud bkhwd kam awnchaiy aur mwsar ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye khud ko mtwazan krta haay۔tlash kay awkatazaghr kiy pykyj mhaya krta hay ، jesay khud twazan bainry srch try ، jo khud twazan bainry tlash kay drkhtwn ko nafza karty hain aur drkht ki mwsar tlash aur trmym kay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔an pykyjwn ka astamal ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay liye kya jaskta hay js main bainry tlash kay drkht ki nmaindghy hawty haay۔

Question: "flask-dy ya pyynjykt jesay azaghr main kntrwl (IOC) kntynrza aur anhasaar anjykshn (DI) frym wrk kay alta kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔"
Answer: kntrwl ka alta (IOC) kntynrza aur anhasaar anjykshn (DI) frym wrk aysay tsawrat hain jo madaywlr aur brkrar rkhnay waly saft wyir sstm ki trky ko aasan bnatay hayn۔azaghr main ، bohat sy aai aw sy kntynrza aur day aai frym wrk dstyab hain jo un tsawrat ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔azaghr main aai aw sy kntynrza aur day aai frym wrk kay baray main smjhnay kay liye yahan kuch klydy nkat hayn: aai aw sy kntynr saft wyir kay ajzaaa hain jo ashyaa ki zandghy aur un ki anhasaar ka antzaam karty hayn۔wha baky ayply kyshn sy ashyaa ki tkhlyk aur nzam wa nsk ko dawpl karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham karty hayn۔ day aai frym wrk ayk ksm ka aai aw sy kntynr hay jo rn taim kay wkt ashyaa main anhasaar anjykshn lghanay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔wha dawylprza ko knfyghryshn fail ya kwda main kesi shay ki anhasaar ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dytay hain ، aur day aai frym wrk anhasaar bnanay aur anjykshn lghanay ka khyal rkhta haay۔ day aai frym wrk ajzaaa kay mabyn jwraay ko kam krkay aur saft wyir sstm ki lchk aur brkrar rkhnay main nmayan tawr par bhatry lasktay hayn۔sstm ko janchnay aur is main trmym karna aasan haay۔ azaghr kay liye dstyab kiy day frym wrk dstyab hain ، jesay flask day ، pyynjykt ، aur anhasaar anjyktr۔yha frym wrk anhasaar ki tshkyl aur anjykshn kay l different mkhtlf khsawsayat aur nhaw mhaya karty hayn۔ azaghr main day frym wrk ka astamal atna aam nahin hay jtna dusri zabanwn main jawa ya. nyt jesay ، lekin yeh mkbwlyt haasal krrhaa hay kywnkha dawylprza daykplngh anhasaar kay fwaid ko phachantay hain aur amthaan ko bhatr bnatay hayn۔. khlasaha main ، aai aw sy kntynrza aur day aai frym wrk aysay tsawrat hain jo madaywlr aur brkrar rkhnay waly saft wyir sstm ki trky ko aasan bnatay hayn۔azaghr main ، bohat sy day aai frym wrk dstyab hain jo un tsawrat ko nafza karnay aur saft wyir sstm ki lchk aur brkrar rkhnay ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔

Question: "azaghr main dayta syrylaizayshn aur daysyrylaizayshn kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain ، aur JSON ، XML ، aur prwtwkwl bfr jesay mkhtlf farmyts ka mwazanha kryn۔"
Answer: syrylaizayshn aur daysyrylaizayshn prwghramngh main do aham tsawrat hain jo ashyaa ko aasany sy zakhyrha karnay ، mntkl karnay aur dwbarha tshkyl denay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔syrylaizayshn sy mrad dayta aabjykt ko kesi farmyt main tbdyl karnay kay aml sy mrad hay jo hamain dayta ko astwr karnay ya mntkl karnay ki ajazat dyta hay aur phir jab daysyrylaizayshn kay alt aml ko astamal karty hoey zurwrt ho tou is chyza ko dwbarha bnaiyn۔azaghr main ، aadad wa shmar kay syrylaizayshn kay liye mtadd farmyts hain ، jesay JSON ، XML ، HDF5 ، aur azaghr kay achar ، mkhtlf mkasad 12345.json (jawa askrpt aabjykt nwtyshn) dayta kay tbadlay kay liye wsya pymanay par astamal shuda shkl haay۔yha ansany prahnay kay kabl aur zaban sy aazaad hay ، aur yeh XML sy halka haay۔JSON madaywl ka astamal karty hoey ، hum mtadd mayary azaghr ki aksam jesay bwl ، dakt ، ant ، flwt ، lst ، strngh ، tywpl ، koi bhi nahin ، wghyrha ko syrylaiza aur daysyrylaiza krsktay hayn۔XML dayta aykschynj kay liye ayk aur wsya pymanay par astamal shuda shkl haay۔yha ayk mark ap zaban hay jo ansany prahnay kay kabl aur khud sakhtha haay۔XML ko pychydha dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay aur aksar wyb khdmat aur API main astamal hawta haay۔azaghr XML kay sath kam karnay kay l several kiy laibryryan mhaya krta hay ، jesay ansar try aur LXML1.Python ka achar madaywl syrylaizayshn aur azaghr ashyaa ki daysyrylaizayshn kay liye ayk bhatr antkhab haay۔aghr hamain ansany prahnay kay kabl farmyt ki zurwrt nahin hay ya agar hamain kstm aabjykt ko syrylaiza karnay ki zurwrt hay tou phir achar kay madaywl ko astamal karnay ki sfarsh ki jati haay۔achar ka madaywl azaghr kay mayary laibryry ka ayk hasaha hay aur syrylaiza (achar) aur daysyrylaiza (anpklngh) azaghr ashyaa kay liye tarykwn ko nafza krta haay۔achar ka antrfys char tarykay mhaya krta haay: damp ، damp ، bwjh aur bwjh۔damp () ka tarykha khly fail (fail nma aabjykt) par syrylaiza krta haay۔damp () ka tarykha ayk tar ko syrylaiza krta haay۔bwjh () ka tarykha khly fail nma aabjykt 24 sy daysyrylaiza krta haay۔ prwtwkwl bfrza ghwghl kay zaryaha tyar krdha zaban-aghnwstk bainry syrylaizayshn farmyt haay۔prwtwkwl bfrza ko XML aur JSON sy chhwta ، tyza ، aur aasan bnanay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔prwtwkwl bfrza aksar aaly karkrdghy waly nzaamwn main astamal hawtay hain jahan karkrdghy aham hawty hay ، jesay tksym shuda nzaam aur mwbail ayply kyshnza۔azaghr prwtwbwf namy ayk laibryry mhaya krta hay jsay prwtwkwl bfrza 1 main syrylaiza aur daysyrylaiza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، syrylaizayshn aur daysyrylaizayshn prwghramngh main aham tsawrat hain jo mkhtlf nzaamwn kay mabyn ashyaa ko aasany sy zakhyrha karnay aur mntkl karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔azaghr main ، mkhtlf mkasad kay liye aadad wa shmar ko syrylaizayshn ، jesay JSON ، XML ، HDF5 ، aur azaghr kay achar kay liye mtadd farmyts hayn۔JSON aur XML dayta aykschynj kay liye braay pymanay par farmyts astamal kyay jatay hain ، jabky azaghr ka achar ka madaywl syrylaizayshn aur azaghr ashyaa ki daysyrylaizayshn kay liye ayk bhatr antkhab haay۔prwtwkwl bfrza ko XML aur JSON sy chhwta ، tyza aur aasan bnanay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay aur aksar aaly karkrdghy waly nzaamwn main astamal kya jata hay jahan karkrdghy aham haay۔

Question: hadayt shuda ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur trjn kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mzubwtay sy mnslk ajzaaa tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: ayk hadayt namha ki nmaindghy karnay waly ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay aur trjan kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mzubwtay sy mnslk ajzaaa tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham karnay kay l we ، hum PYPI par dstyab trjn pykyj ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan trjn tabkay ka ayk msaal astamal haay: azaghr sy trjan draamd trjan ghraf = {0: [1] ، 1: [2] ، 2: [0 ، 3] ، 3: [4] ، 4: [5 ، 7] ، 5.ayk hadayt namha ghraf bnanay aur trjn kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey is kay mzubwtay sy mnslk ajzaaa tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ghraf kay mzubwtay sy mnslk ajzaaa ko tlash karnay kay liye skhty say_kwnykytda_kmpyntynts ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔ is msaal ki pydawar yeh hay kha: [[4 ، 5 ، 6] ، [7 ، 8 ، 9] ، [0 ، 1 ، 2] ، [3]] is aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh ghraf kay mzubwtay sy jraay hoey ajzaaa [4] [5] [6] ، [7] [7] [8] [9] ، [0] [1] [2] ، aur [1] hayn۔ trjnpykyj hadayt waly ghrafwn kay sath kam karnay kay liye kiy dusray tarykay mhaya krta hay ، jesay ADD_NODE ، ADD_EDGE ، hataiyn_nwda ، aur hat_j۔an tarykwn ko ghraf main trmym karnay aur is kay mzubwtay sy mnslk ajzaaa ko tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، trjan ka alghwrthm hadayt shuda ghraf main mzubwtay sy mnslk ajzaaa tlash karnay kay liye ayk mkbwl alghwrthm haay۔azaghr kiy pykyj mhaya krta hay ، jesay trjn ، jo trjn kay alghwrthm ko nafza karty hain aur hadayt shuda ghraf kay mzubwtay sy mnslk ajzaaa tlash karnay kay tarykay mhaya karty hayn۔an pykyjwn ko hadayt shuda ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay waly azaghr klas ko nafza karnay aur trjan kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mzubwtay sy mnslk ajzaaa tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: "azaghr main fnkshnl prwghramngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur aaly aardar kay afaal ، lymbdaa kay tasarat ، aur nkshha/km/fltr aapryshnza ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔"
Answer: fnkshnl prwghramngh ayk prwghramngh nmwnha hay jo khalsa afaal kay astamal par zawr dyta hay ، jo aysay afaal hain jo mkml tawr par un kay aadanwn par mbny aaؤt pt tyar karty hain aur un kay koi mzur asarat nahin hawtay hayn۔azaghr main ، aaly aardar kay afaal ، lymbdaa azahaar ، aur nkshha/km/fltr aapryshnza ka astamal karty hoey fnkshnl prwghramngh haasal ki jaskty haay۔ haaiydar aardar kay afaal aysay kam hawtay hain jo dusray kamwn ko dlail kay tawr par lytay hain ya wapsy kay afaal ko ntaij kay tawr par lytay hayn۔wha fnkshnl prwghramngh ki ayk aham khsawsayt hain aur zayada lchkdar aur dwbarha kabl astamal kwda bnanay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hayn۔azaghr main ayk aaly aardar fnkshn ki ayk msaal yeh haay: pythwndaf aplyt_twais (fnk ، aargh): rytrn fnk (fnk (aargh)) dayf ayda_faiyw (ayks): wapsy ayks + 5 prnt (atalak_twais (ayda_faiyw ، 10)) # 20 main is msaal، applay_twice fnkshn ayk aaly aardar ka fnkshn hay jo fnkshn fnk aur dlyl aargh lyta hay ، aur do bar aargh par fnk ka atalak krta haay۔add_five fnkshn ayk sadha fnkshn hay jo is ki dlyl main 5 ka azuafha krta haay۔as msaal ki pydawar 20 hay ، jo 10 bar 10 par ADD_FIVE ka atalak karnay ka ntyjha haay۔ lambdaa azahaar ghmnam afaal hain jn ki un lain ki wzuahat ki jaskty haay۔wha chhwtay ، ayk wkty astamal kay afaal pyda karnay kay liye karaamd hayn۔yhaan azaghr main lymbdaa azahaar ki ayk msaal haay: paiythwnadada_faiyw = lymbdaa ayks: ayks + 5 prnt (ayda_faiyw (10)) # 15 is msaal kay tawr par ، lymbdaa ki wrda ko ayk chhwty sy tkryb ki wzuahat kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo is ki dlyl main 5 ko shaml krta haay۔as kay bad add_five mtghyr ko is lymbdaa azahaar kay liye tfwyzu kya jata hay ، aur lymbdaa azahaar ko 10 ki dlyl kay sath kaha jata haay۔btawr fharst ya tpls۔wha fnkshnl andaza main dayta ko tbdyl karnay ، mjmway karnay ya fltr karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔azaghr main nkshha ، kam karnay aur fltr kay astamal ki ayk msaal yeh haay: paiythnwnmbrza = [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] chwkwn = fharst (nkshha (lymbdaa ayks: ayks ** 2 ، nmbr)) prnt (askwairza) # [1 ، 4 ، 9 ، 16 ، 25] prwdakt = kam karain (lymbdaa ayks ، waiy: ayks*waiy ، nmbrza) prnt (prwdakt) # 120 aywns = fharst (fltr (lymbdaa ayks: ayks ٪ 2 == 0 ، nmbr)) prnt.km fnkshn lymbdaa azahaar ko laghw karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo nmbrwn ki fharst main mwjwd tamam nmbrwn ko ayk sath brahata haay۔fltr fnkshn lymbdaa azahaar ko laghw karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay jo nmbrwn ki fharst main mwjwd tamam ajyb nmbrwn ko fltr krta haay۔as msaal kay aaؤt pt hr aapryshn kay ntaij ko zaahar krta haay۔ khlasaha main ، fnkshnl prwghramngh ayk prwghramngh nmwnha hay jo khalsa afaal kay astamal par zawr dyta hay ، jo aysay afaal hain jo mkml tawr par un kay aadanwn par mbny aaؤt pt tyar karty hain aur un kay koi zumny asarat nahin hawtay hayn۔azaghr main ، aaly aardar kay afaal ، lymbdaa azahaar ، aur nkshha/km/fltr aapryshnza ka astamal karty hoey fnkshnl prwghramngh haasal ki jaskty haay۔yha khsawsayat zayada lchkdar aur dwbarha kabl astamal kwda ki ajazat dyty hain js kay baray main astdlal aur janch karna aasan haay۔

Question: "azaghr main wakaha ki swrsngh aur sy kyw aar ays (kmanda astfsar ki zamha dary ko alag krnay) kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain ، aur yeh btaiyn keh woh sstm askyl ayblty aur aadaytyblty ko kis tarah bhatr bnasktay hayn۔"
Answer: aywnt swrsngh ayk saft wyir dayzaain ka nmwnha hay js main ayplykyshn ki ryast main tamam tbdylywn ko wakaat ki trtyb kay tawr par astwr karna shaml haay۔as nmwnha ko laibryrywn jesay wakaat swrsngh 12 ka astamal karty hoey azaghr main nafza kya jaskta haay۔aywnt ki swrsngh kay baray main smjhnay kay liye kuch aham nkat yeh hayn: wakaat kesi drkhwast ki haalt main tbdylywn kay nakabl tskhyr rykarda hayn۔wha is hakykt ki nmaindghy karty hain jo waka hoa hay aur isy tbdyl nahin kya jaskta haay۔ aywnt swrsngh main tamam wakaat ko ayk trtyb main rkhna shaml hay ، bjaiay is kay keh drkhwast ki mwjwdha haalt ki bjaiay۔as sy ayplykyshn ko kesi bhi mwka par wakaat ko dwbarha chlanay kay zaryaha dwbarha tshkyl denay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ aywnt swrsngh prwghramwn ki askyl ayblty aur aadaytyblty ko bhatr andaza main nkl wa harkt aur tksym ki ajazat dy kar ، aur drkhwast ki haalt main tamam tbdylywn ka mkml aadat tryl fraham krkay sstm askyl ayblty aur aadaytyblty ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔kmanda astfsar ki zamha dary alyhadghy (sy kyw aar ays) ayk aur saft wyir dayzaain ka nmwnha hay js main swalat ko snbhalnay ki zamha dary (jw drkhwast ki haalt ko bazayaft karty hayn) ki zamha dary sy kmanda (jw drkhwast ki haalt ko tbdyl karty hayn) ko snbhalnay ki zamha dary ko alag karna shaml haay۔as nmwnha ko jyanghw-sy kyw aar ays 3 jesi laibryrywn ka astamal karty hoey azaghr main nafza kya jaskta haay۔CQRs kay baray main smjhnay kay liye yahan kuch klydy nkat hayn: CQRS main prahnay waly madal (jw kmandaza ko snbhalta haay) ko prahnay waly madal (jw swalat ko snbhalta haay) sy alag karna shaml haay۔as sy prahnay aur lkhnay kay kamwn ko zayada mwsar tarykay sy hayndal karnay ki ajazat mlty hay ، kywnkha inhain alag sy bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔ sy kyw aarza prahnay aur lkhnay kay kamwn ko zayada mwsar hayndal karnay ki ajazat dy kar ، aur is kay liye mkhtlf dayta astwrza kay astamal ki ajazat dy kar sstm askyl ayblty aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔prahyn aur lkhyn madal۔aywnt swrsngh main wakaat ki trtyb kay tawr par kesi ayply kyshn ki ryast main tamam tbdylywn ko astwr karna shaml hay ، jabky sy kyw aar ays main swalat ko snbhalnay ki zamha dary sy kmandawn ko snbhalnay ki zamha dary ko alag karna shaml haay۔dwnwn nmwnwn ko laibryrywn jesay wakaat swrsngh aur jyanghw-sy kyw aarza ka astamal karty hoey azaghr main nafza kya jaskta haay۔

Question: ayk lahakha srny ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur mwsar tzaiyn ki tlash aur pytrn mmasalt kay liye tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: ayk lahakha srny ki nmaindghy karnay waly ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay aur mwsar astrngh srch aur pytrn mmasalt kay tarykay fraham karnay kay l we ، hum PYPI par dstyab lahakha_ray pykyj ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan lahakha klas ka ayk msaal astamal haay: paiytwn sy lahakha_ray ampwrt asfksrry tykst = "kylay" lahakha_ray = lahakha (mtn) prnt (lahakha_arry۔) # [1 ، 3] is msaal main ، "kylay" kay tar kay liye lahakha srny bnanay kay liye lahakha klas ka astamal kya jata haay۔tlash kay tarykha kar ko lahakha srny main "ana" ki tlash kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur pytrn_mchngh ka tarykha lahakha srny main pytrn kay tamam wakaat ko tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ is msaal ki pydawar yeh hay kha: [1 ، 3] [1 ، 3] is aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh "ana" "kylay" ka ayk zakhyrha hay aur lahakha srny main 1 aur 3 pwzayshnwn par paya jata haay۔asy tarah ، nmwnha "ayk" lahakha srny main pwzayshn 1 aur 3 par hawta haay۔ lahakha_ ary pykyj lahakha srnywn kay sath kam karnay kay liye kiy dusray tarykay mhaya krta hay ، jesay get_suffix_array ، get_lcp_array ، aur get_suffix_tree۔an tarykwn ka astamal lahakha srny ، sab sy tawyl aam pryfks srny ، aur mtn kay lahakha drkht ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، ayk lahakha srny ayk aysa dayta dahanchha hay jo kesi tar main sbstrnghza ko mwsar andaza main tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔azaghr kiy pykyj mhaya krta hay ، jesay lahakha_yry ، jo lahakha srnywn ko nafza karty hain aur mwsar astrngh srch aur pytrn mmasalt kay liye tarykay mhaya karty hayn۔an pykyjwn ka astamal ayk lahakha srny ki nmaindghy karnay waly azaghr klas ko nafza karnay aur mwsar astrngh tlash aur pytrn mmasal kay liye tarykay fraham karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔

Question: "saft wyir tystngh kay asawlwn aur janch kay mkhtlf asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain ، jesay ywnt tystngh ، anzumam ki janch ، aur sstm tystngh۔"
Answer: saft wyir ki janch kesi saft wyir ayply kyshn ya sstm ki janch karnay ka aml hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh yeh mkhsawsa zurwryat ko pora krta hay aur twka kay mtaabk kam krta haay۔saft wyir tystngh kay mtadd asawl hain ، bshmwl abtdaiy janch ، mkml janch nammkn hay ، aur tystngh nkaisa ki mwjwdghy ko zaahar krty haay۔saft wyir ayply kyshnza ki janch kay liye mkhtlf ksm kay tystngh kay nktaha nzar ka astamal kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl: ywnt tystngh: is ksm ki janch saft wyir dayzaain ki sab sy chhwty ywnt ، jesay anfrady afaal ya tarykwn par mrkwza haay۔yha aksar prwghramr kay zaryaha nmwnha un pt ka astamal karty hoey aur is sy mtalkha ntaij ka mshahadha karty hoey kya jata haay۔ antyghryshn tystngh: is ksm ki janch ki tsadyk hawty hay keh mkhtlf madaywl ya khdmat jo kesi ayply kyshn kay zaryaha astamal hawty hain woh mil kar kam krty hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، yeh dayta bys kay sath taaml ki janch kar sakta hay ya is bat ko ykyny bna sakta hay keh maikrwsrwaisza twka kay mtaabk mil kar kam kryn۔ sstm ki janch: is ksm ki janch janch kay liye faal aur ghair faal dono zurwryat ka andazaha krty haay۔yha ajzaaa ki mjmway taaml ki janch krta hay aur is main bwjh ، karkrdghy ، wshwsnyyta ، aur sykywrty tystngh shaml haay۔ kbwlyt ki janch: is ksm ki janch ki janch pratal krty hay keh aya is ki frahamy kay mtaabk kesi tsaryha ya maahaday ki zurwryat pori hawty hayn۔mwkl kay zaryaha yeh ykyny bnanay kay liye kya jata hay keh khsawsayat un ki zurwryat kay mtaabk hain jo un ki fharst main hayn۔ ays aym aw sy ay tystngh: is ksm ki janch ayk tyza aur atly amthaan hay jo janch pratal krta hay keh aya saft wyir ki ayply kyshn mazeed janch kay sath aaghay brahnay kay liye kafy msthakm hay ya nhayn۔as ksm ki janch is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye ki jati hay keh saft wyir ayply kyshn main tbdylyan niay kyraay ya msail ko mtaarf nahin krwaty hayn۔ karkrdghy ki janch: is ksm ki janch mkhtlf haaltwn kay that saft wyir ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ka andazaha karnay kay liye ki jati hay ، jesay aaly bwjh ya tnaؤ۔sykywrty tystngh: is ksm ki janch saft wyir ayply kyshn ki hafazat ka andazaha karnay aur kesi bhi kmzawrywn ya kmzawrywn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye ki jati haay۔ khlasaha yeh keh saft wyir ki janch saft wyir ki trky main ayk aham aml hay jo is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh saft wyir ki ayply kyshn mkhsawsa zurwryat ko pora kray aur twka kay mtaabk kam kray۔saft wyir ayply kyshnza ki janch kay liye mkhtlf ksm ki janch kay tarykwn ka astamal kya jaskta hay ، js main ywnt tystngh ، anzumam ki janch ، sstm tystngh ، kbwlyt ki janch ، dhwan ki janch ، ryghryshn tystngh ، karkrdghy ki janch ، aur sykywrty tystngh shaml hayn۔har ksm ki janch kay nktaha nzar ka apna mksad hawta hay aur saft wyir ayply kyshn main mkhtlf ksm kay msail ya kyraay ki nshandhay karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: "tksym shuda nzaamwn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main mstkl mzaajy ، dstyaby ، aur tksym rwadary (sy aay py thywrym) kay chylnjwn par tbadlha khyal kryn۔"
Answer: tksym shuda nzaam kmpywtr sstm hain jo mtadd baham mrbwta kmpywtrza par mushtamil hain jo mshtrkha mksad kay hasawl kay liye ayk dusray kay sath bat chyt aur hum aahanghy karty hayn۔kyp thywrym ayk aysa tsawr hay jo tksym shuda nzaamwn ki tamyr kay chylnjwn ko byan krta hay jo mstkl ، dstyab aur tksym ko rwadar hayn۔kyp thywrym kay mtaabk ، tksym shuda nzaam main byk wkt un tynwn praprtyza ko haasal karna nammkn haay۔as kay bjaiay ، dayzaainrza ko yeh antkhab karna hoga keh sstm ki mkhsawsa tkazuwn ki bnyad par trjyha denay kay liye kon sy do khsawsayat ko trjyha dyn۔ yahan azaghr main kyp thywrym aur tksym shuda nzaamwn kay baray main smjhnay kay liye kuch aham nkat hayn: mstkl mzaajy sy is zurwrt ka mtalb hay keh tksym shuda nzaam main mwjwd tamam nwdas dykhyn۔ayk hi wkt main ayk hi dayta.mstkl mzaajy ka hasawl kesi tksym shuda nzaam main chylnj hawskta hay kywnkha nyt wrk main takhyr ya nakamywn ki wjha sy nwdas kay aadad wa shmar kay mkhtlf nzaryat hawsktay hayn۔ dstyaby sy mrad is zurwrt sy mrad hay keh tksym shuda nzaam nakamywn ya nyt wrk partyshnwn kay bawjwd bhi aapryshnl aur zamha dar rhata haay۔tksym shuda nzaam main dstyaby ka hasawl chylnj hawskta hay kywnkha nyt wrk kay msail ki wjha sy nwdas nakam ya nakabl rsaiy hawsktay hayn۔ partyshn rwadary sy mrad is zurwrt sy mrad hay keh jab tksym shuda nzaam kam krta rhata hay yahan tak keh jab nyt wrk partyshnza paiay jatay hayn۔tksym shuda nzaam main tksym rwadary ka hasawl mshkl hawskta hay kywnkha nyt wrk kay msail ki wjha sy nwdas ayk dusray sy alag thlgh hawsktay hayn۔ mkhtlf ksm ki janch kay nktaha nzar ko tksym shuda nzaamwn ki janch kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، js main ywnt tystngh ، anzumam ki janch ، sstm ki janch ، kbwlyt ki janch ، dhwan shaml haay۔janch ، rjat tystngh ، karkrdghy ki janch ، aur sykywrty tystngh۔ khlasaha main ، tksym shuda nzaam kmpywtr sstm hain jo ayk sy zayada baham mrbwta kmpywtrza par mushtamil hain jo mshtrkha mksad kay hasawl kay liye ayk dusray kay sath bat chyt aur hum aahanghy karty hayn۔kyp thywrym tksym shuda nzaamwn ki tamyr kay chylnjwn ki wzuahat krta hay jo mstkl ، dstyab aur tksym rwadar hayn۔azaghr kiy laibryrywn aur frym wrk mhaya krta hay ، jesay pairw 4 aur ajwain ، jo tksym shuda nzaamwn ki tamyr kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔janch tksym shuda nzaamwn ki tamyr ka ayk aham hasaha hay ، aur mkhtlf ksm kay tystngh kay nktaha nzar ko tksym shuda nzaamwn ki janch kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، js main ywnt tystngh ، anzumam ki janch ، sstm ki janch ، kbwlyt ki janch ، dhwan ki janch ، ryghryshn tystngh Question: "askyp lst ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur awsta kys kay mwsar wkt ki pychydghy kay sath dakhl ، hazaf karnay aur tlash kay tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: askyp lst ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay aur awsta kys kay mwsar wkt ki pychydghy kay sath andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur tlash kay tarykay fraham karnay kay l we ، hum PYPI par dstyab askyp_ lst pykyj ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan askyplst klas ka ayk msaal astamal haay: paiytwnfrm askyp_ lst draamd askyplstskyp_ lst = askyplst () askyp_ lst.nsrt (1) askyp_ lst.nsrt (2) askyp_lst.nst (3) prnt (askyp_lst.srch (2)) # tryskpp_lyst۔) prnt (askyp_ lst.sarch (2)) # flaha wa bhabwd is msaal kay tawr par ، askyplst klas ko askyp lst bnanay aur is main tyn anasar dakhl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔tlash kay tarykha kar ko askyp lst main ansar 2 ki tlash kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur daylyt ka tarykha ansar 2 ko askyp lst sy hazaf karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ is msaal ki pydawar yeh hay kha: try falsty aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh ansar 2 main mwjwd haayas ko hazaf karnay sy pehlay is ki fharst chhwra dyn ، aur isy hazaf karnay kay bad ghair haazur hawn۔ askyp_ lst pykyj askyp lstwn kay sath kam karnay kay l several kiy dusray tarykay mhaya krta hay ، jesay ghyt ، syt ، aur is par mushtamil haay۔an tarykwn ko askyp lst main anasar ki mwjwdghy ، trmym karnay aur janchnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha yeh keh askyp lst ayk amkany aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo mwsar tlash ، andraj aur hatanay kay kamwn ki ajazat dyta haay۔azaghr kiy pykyj mhaya krta hay ، jesay askyp_ lst ، jo askyp lstwn ko nafza karty hain aur mwsar azuafay ، hazaf karnay ، aur mwsar awstaa wkt ki pychydghy kay sath tlash kay tarykay mhaya karty hayn۔an pykyjwn ko askyp lst ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay aur mwsar azuafay ، hazaf karnay ، aur mwsar awsta kys taim pychydghy kay sath tlash karnay kay tarykay fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: saft wyir ryfyktrngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main kwda ki bw aur ryfyktrngh tknyk ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: saft wyir ryfyktrngh kwda kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay ka aml hay js ko is ki faalyt ko tbdyl kyay baghair isy zayada prahnay kay kabl ، brkrar rkhnay aur mwsar bna diya gaya haay۔ryfyktrngh saft wyir dawylpmnt ka ayk lazmi hasaha hay jo kwda kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay aur tknyky krzu ko kam karnay main mdd krta haay۔azaghr main kwda ki bw aur ryfyktrngh ki tknyk ki kuch msaalyn yeh hayn: lmbay tarykay: lmbay tarykwn ko prahna aur smjhna mshkl haay۔ryfyktr lmbay tarykwn kay l we ، hum nchwra kay tarykha kar ko ryfyktrngh tknyk ka astamal karty hain takha inhain chhwtay ، zayada kabl antzaam tarykwn main twra daalyn۔ mtnasb kwda: daplykyt kwda naksa dayzaain ki alamt hay aur bhaaly kay msail ka baasa bn sakta haay۔ryfyktr daplykyt kwda kay l we ، hum dwbarha astamal kay kabl kwda bnanay kay liye nchwra ka tarykha kar ya nkalnay waly klas ryfyktrngh tknyk ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ klasza ko wsya klas: bray klaswn ko brkrar rkhna mshkl hay aur karkrdghy kay msail ka baasa bn saktay hayn۔ryfyktr bray klaswn kay l we ، hum aykstrykt klas ya aykstrykt antrfys ryfyktrngh tknyk ko chhwtay ، zayada kabl antzaam klaswn main twranay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔ryfyktr ghair mwsar alghwrthm kay l we ، hum tbdyl alghwrthm ko astamal krsktay hain ya un ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye pyramytr aabjykt ryfyktrngh ki tknyk ko mtaarf krasktay hayn۔ pythwn kiy twlza aur laibryry fraham krta hay jo ryfyktrngh kay liye astamal hawsktay hain ، jesay paichrm ، baؤlr aur rsy۔yha twlza dawylprza ko un kay kwda kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay main mdd kay liye khwdkar ryfyktrngh ، kwda tjzayha ، aur kwda nywyghyshn jesi khsawsayat mhaya karty hayn۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh saft wyir ryfyktrngh kwda kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay ka aml hay js ko mazeed prahnay kay kabl ، brkrar rkhnay aur mwsar bna kar isy bhatr bnaya jaiay۔as ki faalyt ko tbdyl krna۔azaghr mtadd twlza aur laibryrywn ko mhaya krta hay jo ryfyktrngh kay liye astamal hawsktay hain ، aur kwda kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kwda ki bw aur ryfyktrngh ki mtadd tknykyn hain jo astamal ki jaskty hayn۔mstkl tawr par ryfyktrngh kwda kay zaryaha ، dawylprza tknyky krzu ko kam krsktay hain aur apnay saft wyir ayply kyshnza kay mayar ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔

Question: dawmyn sy mtalk mkhsawsa zabanwn (DSLs) kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain aur yeh btaiyn keh un ko PYDSL ya ANTLR jesi laibryrywn ka astamal karty hoey azaghr main kesay nafza kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: dawmyn sy mtalk zabanyn (DSLs) prwghramngh ki zabanyn hain jo ayk mkhsawsa dawmyn main msail ko hal karnay kay liye tyar ki gain hayn۔day ays ayl ko ayk mkhsawsa tabkay ki pryshanywn aur fylda ya dawmyn sy tsawrat aur kwaad astamal karnay kay liye bhatr bnaya jata haay۔azaghr jesi amwmy mksad ki zabanwn kay mkablay main ، day ays ayl kam nfys hain aur aksar ghair rwayty prwghramrza astamal karnay ka aradha rkhtay hain jo day ays ayl kay liye tyar krdha dawmyn main rwany rkhtay hayn۔day ays ayl aam tawr par andastry kay pyshha wr afrad kay sath kryby taawn sy tkhlyk kya jata hay js kay liye woh bnaiay jarhaay hayn۔azaghr main day ays ayl ka nfaza PYDSL ya antlr jesay laibryrywn ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔ yahan dawmyn sy mtalk mkhsawsa zabanwn kay kuch asawl hain aur azaghr main kwda ki bw aa rahi hain aur ryfyktrngh tknyk ki msaalyn: DSLs ko ayk mkhsawsa dawmyn main msail hal karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay aur is dawmyn kay liye bhatr bnaya gaya hay aur is dawmyn kay liye bhatr bnaya gaya haay۔.DSLs is dawmyn sy tsawrat aur kwaad ka astamal karty hain js kay liye woh dayzaain kyay gaye hayn۔ day ays ayl aam mkasad ki zabanwn sy kam pychydha hain jesay azaghr۔ day ays ayl ka mksad aksar ghair prwghramrza kay zaryaha astamal karna hawta hay jo dawmyn main rwany rkhtay hayn۔ day ays ayl kay liye bnaya gaya haay۔aam tawr par andastry kay pyshha wr afrad kay sath kryby taawn sy pyda hawtay hain jn kay liye woh bnaiay jarhaay hayn۔ kwda kay msaal kay tawr par azaghr main bdbw aur ryfyktrngh tknyk jo DSLs main kwda kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hayn: lmbay tarykay: lmbay tarykay mshkl hayn۔prahyn aur smjhyn۔ryfyktr lmbay tarykwn kay l we ، hum nchwra kay tarykha kar ko ryfyktrngh tknyk ka astamal karty hain takha inhain chhwtay ، zayada kabl antzaam tarykwn main twra daalyn۔ mtnasb kwda: daplykyt kwda naksa dayzaain ki alamt hay aur bhaaly kay msail ka baasa bn sakta haay۔ryfyktr daplykyt kwda kay l we ، hum dwbarha astamal kay kabl kwda bnanay kay liye nchwra ka tarykha kar ya nkalnay waly klas ryfyktrngh tknyk ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ klasza ko wsya klas: bray klaswn ko brkrar rkhna mshkl hay aur karkrdghy kay msail ka baasa bn saktay hayn۔ryfyktr bray klaswn kay l we ، hum aykstrykt klas ya aykstrykt antrfys ryfyktrngh tknyk ko chhwtay ، zayada kabl antzaam klaswn main twranay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔ryfyktr nakarha alghwrthm kay l we ، hum un ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye tbdyl alghwrthm ka astamal krsktay hain ya pyramytr aabjykt ryfyktrngh ki tknyk ko mtaarf krasktay hayn۔ pythwn kiy twlza aur laibryry fraham krta hay jo DSLs ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hain ، jesay PYDSL aur ANTLR۔yha twlza dawylprza ko apnay kwda kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay main mdd kay liye khwdkar ryfyktrngh ، kwda tjzayha ، aur kwda nywyghyshn jesi khsawsayat mhaya karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، dawmyn sy mtalk mkhsawsa zabanyn prwghramngh zabanyn hain jo ayk mkhsawsa dawmyn main msail ko hal karnay kay liye tyar ki gain hayn۔azaghr main DSLs ko nafza karna PYDSL ya ANTLR jesi laibryrywn ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔aykstrykt tarykha ، aykstrykt klas ، aur alghwrthm ko tbdyl karnay wali tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey mstkl tawr par ryfyktrngh kwda kay zaryaha ، dawylprza tknyky krzu ko kam krsktay hain aur apnay
