Question: "mysj ki ktaar kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main nmwnwn ko shaia karain ، aur is par tbadlha khyal karain keh un ko ghair mtzalzal mwasalat aur wakaha sy chlnay waly fn tamyr kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔"
Answer: mysj ki ktaaryn aur shaia sbskraib pytrn do aam nmwnay hain jo tksym shuda nzaamwn main astamal hawtay hain takha mtzuad mwasalat aur wakaha sy chlnay waly fn tamyr ko kabl bnaiyn۔yhaan hr ayk ki ayk mkhtsar wzuahat haay: mysj ki ktaaryn: pygham ki ktaaryn bhyjnay waly ko daykpl karnay aur kesi pygham ko wsawl karnay ka ayk tarykha haay۔ksy wsawl knndha ko braha rast pygham bhyjnay kay bjaiay ، bhyjnay wala pygham ko ktaar par rkhta hay ، aur wsawl knndha tyar hony par pygham ko ktaar sy bazayaft krta haay۔as sy tksym shuda nzaam kay ajzaaa kay mabyn ghair mtzalzal mwasalat ki ajazat mlty haay۔ pblsh sbskraib pytrn: shaia karain sbskraib karnay waly nmwnay mtadd saarfyn ko pyghamat nshr karnay ka ayk tarykha hayn۔as tarza main ، pblshr mkhtlf zamrwn main pyghamat tyar karty hain ، aur saarfyn mkhtlf ksmwn kay pyghamat astamal karty hain jn ki woh sbskraib ki jati haay۔pwaint tw pwaint mysjngh kay braks ، ayk pygham sirf is sawrt main hazaf hawjaiay ga jab is ko zamrha main tamam saarfyn kay zaryaha khaya jaiay۔ pythwn kiy laibryrywn aur frym wrk mhaya krta hay jo mysj ki ktaar ko nafza karnay aur shaia karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay paiydas ayl ، aynt ayl aar ،awr rbyt aym kyw۔yha laibryryan dawylprza ko apnay kwda kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay main mdd kay liye khwdkar ryfyktrngh ، kwda tjzayha ، aur kwda nywyghyshn jesi khsawsayat mhaya krty hayn۔ khlasaha ، pygham ki ktaaryn aur shaia sbskraib pytrn tksym shuda nzaamwn main astamal hony waly do aam nmwnay hain takha mtzuad mwasalat aur wakaha ko kabl bnaiyn۔karfrma fn tamyr۔azaghr mtadd laibryrywn aur frym wrk mhaya krta hay jo mysj ki ktaar ko nafza karnay aur shaia karnay waly nmwnwn ko shaia karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay PYDSL ، ANTLR ، aur RABITMQ۔an nmwnwn aur laibryrywn ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza zayada twsya pzayr aur lchkdar tksym shuda nzaam tyar krsktay hayn۔

Question: rydaks try ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur mwsar strngh pryfks tlash aur bazayaft kay liye tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: rydaks try ki nmaindghy karnay waly azaghr klas ko nafza karnay aur mwsar strngh pryfks tlash aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham karnay kay l we ، hum PYPI par try pykyj main dstyab try klas ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan try klas ka ayk msaal astamal haay: azaghr sy try ampwrt traitrry = try () try۔ anrt ("aypl") try.srt ("kylay") traiy.srt ("awrnj") prnt (try۔ srch ("ayp")) # trwpnt (try۔ srch ("nashpatyan")) # fals prnt (try.pry fkss ("aay")) # ['aypl'] is msaal main ، try klas ko rydaks try bnanay aur tyn anasar dakhl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as myn.tlash ka tarykha traiy main mwjwd "ayp" ki tlash kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur khtawta "A" kay sath shrwa hony waly tamam sabkwn ko bazayaft karnay kay liye pryfks ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔ is msaal ki aaؤt pt yeh haay: try fals ['aypl']aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh try main "ayp" ka sabkha mwjwd hay ، try main sabkha "nashpatyan" mwjwd nahin hay ، aur wahad sabkha jo "A" "aypl" haay۔ try pykyj kiy dusray tarykay mhaya krta haay۔rydaks ki kwshshwn kay sath kam karnay kay liye ، jesay hazaf ، ashyaa aur chabyan۔an tarykwn ka astamal try sy anasar ko hazaf karnay ، try main mwjwd tamam anasar ko bazayaft karnay ، aur try main tamam chabyan bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، ayk rydaks try ayk aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo tarwn kay ayk syt main sabkha sabkha tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔azaghr kiy pykyj mhaya krta hay ، jesay try ، jo rydaks ki kwshshwn ko nafza krta hay aur mwsar strngh pryfks tlash aur bazayaft kay liye tarykay mhaya krta haay۔an pykyjwn ko rydaks try ki nmaindghy karnay waly azaghr klas ko nafza karnay aur mwsar strngh pryfks tlash aur bazayaft kay tarykay fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: dayta kmpryshn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur azaghr main haf myn kwdangh ya lympl zayw wylch (LZW) jesay kmpryshn alghwrthm ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: dayta kmpryshn astwryj ki jghha aur transmyshn kay wkt ko bchanay kay l data dayta kay saiza ko kam karnay ka aml haay۔azaghr mtadd laibryrywn aur frym wrk mhaya krta hay jo dayta kmpryshn kay liye astamal hawsktay hain ، jesay ZLIB ، GZIP ، BZIP2 ، LZMA ، aur tarfail۔yhaan kmpryshn alghwrthm ki kuch msaalyn hain jo azaghr main astamal ki jaskty hayn: haf myn kwdangh: haf myn kwdangh ayk bay nksaan dayta kmpryshn alghwrthm hay jo pygham main alamtwn ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye mtghyr lmbaiy kay kwdaza ka astamal krta haay۔jtny bar ayk alamt hawty hay ، is ka kwda jtna chhwta ho gha۔ lympl zayw wylch (ayl zayda dablyw): ayl zayda dablyw ayk lchkdar dayta kmpryshn alghwrthm hay jo mkhtsar kwdaza kay sath pygham main bar bar nmwnwn ko tbdyl karnay kay liye lght ka astamal krta haay۔lght mthark tawr par tamyr ki hogi hay kywnkha pygham ko kmprys kya jata hay ، aur yeh daykmpryshn kay doran pygham ko day kwda karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ arytmytk ankwdangh: ryazuy ka ankwdangh ayk lazawal dayta kmpryshn alghwrthm hay jo kesi pygham ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye ayk jzawy nmbr astamal krta haay۔jzawy nmbr mysj main is ki frykwinsy ki bnyad par pygham ko sbyntrwlza main tksym krkay aur hr sbyntrwwl ko ayk amkan tfwyzu krkay tyar kya jata haay۔yha laibryryan khwdkar ryfyktrngh ، kwda tjzayha ، aur kwda nywyghyshn jesi khsawsayat mhaya krty hain takha dawylprza ko un kay kwda kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mlay۔ khlasaha main ، dayta kmpryshn astwryj ki jghha aur transmyshn kay wkt ko bchanay kay liye dayta kay saiza ko kam karnay ka aml haay۔azaghr mtadd laibryrywn aur frym wrk mhaya krta hay jo dayta kmpryshn kay liye astamal hawsktay hain ، jesay ZLIB ، GZIP ، BZIP2 ، LZMA ، aur tarfail۔bhat sy kmpryshn alghwrthm hain jo azaghr main astamal hawsktay hain ، jesay haf myn kwdangh ، lympl zayw wylch (ayl zayda dablyw) ، aur ryazuy ankwdangh۔an alghwrthm aur laibryrywn ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza zayada mwsar aur twsya pzayr saft wyir ayply kyshnza tyar krsktay hayn۔

Question: "tksym shuda nzaamwn main ghltay rwadary aur ghltay sy nmtnay kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain ، aur azaghr main faltw pn ، nkl ، aur ghltay ki bazayaby jesi tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔"
Answer: falt rwadary aur ghltay sy nmtna tksym shuda nzaamwn main aham tsawrat hain ، jo ayk sy zayada baham mnslk ajzaaa par mushtamil hain jo khdmt fraham karnay kay liye mil kar kam karty hayn۔tksym shuda nzaamwn main ghltay rwadary aur ghltay sy nmtnay kay kuch asawl yeh hayn: ghltay rwadary kesi nzaam ki ahalyt hay jo ayk ya zayada ajzaaa nakam hawjaty hay yahan tak keh ayk sstm main ghltaywn sy ptha lghanay aur bazayaft karnay ka aml haay۔ksy sstm kay aham ajzaaa ki nkl kay zaryaha ghltay rwadary ko haasal karnay kay liye astamal hony wali ayk tknyk۔ ryplykyshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo kesi sstm main mkhtlf nwdas main dayta ya khdmat ki mtadd kapyan bna kar ghltay rwadary ko haasal karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔ ayrr ki bazayaby ayk nzaam ko aay main bhaal karnay ka aml haay۔nakamy ya ghltay kay bad fnkshnl ryast۔yha laibryryan dawylprza ko apnay kwda kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay main mdd kay liye khwdkar ryfyktrngh ، kwda tjzayha ، aur kwda nywyghyshn jesi khsawsayat mhaya krty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، ghltay rwadary aur ghltay sy nmtnay kay nzaam main aham tsawrat hain ، jo ayk sy zayada baham mnslk ajzaaa par mushtamil hain jo mil kar kam karty hayn۔ayk khdmt fraham karnay kay liay.azaghr mtadd laibryrywn aur frym wrk mhaya krta hay jo tksym shuda nzaamwn main ghltay rwadary aur ghltay sy nmtnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay PYDSL ، ANTLR ، aur RABITMQ۔an tknykwn aur laibryrywn ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza zayada kabl aatmad aur lchkdar tksym shuda nzaam tyar krsktay hayn۔

Question: "azaghr main saft wyir prwfailngh aur karkrdghy ki asalaha kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain ، aur rkawtwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye CProfile ya mymwry_prwfylr jesay twlza par tbadlha khyal kryn۔"
Answer: saft wyir prwfailngh main rkawtwn aur bhatry kay shabwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye kesi prwghram ki karkrdghy ka tjzayha karnay ka aml haay۔prwfailngh karkrdghy ki asalaha ka ayk lazmi hasaha hay ، js ka mksad kesi prwghram ki rftar aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔azaghr mtadd twlza aur laibryrywn ko mhaya krta hay jo prwfailngh aur karkrdghy ki asalaha kay liye astamal hawsktay hain ، jesay CProfile aur memery_profiler. yahan azaghr main saft wyir prwfailngh aur karkrdghy ki asalaha kay kuch asawl hayn: prwfailngh main rkawtwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye kesi prwghram ki karkrdghy ka tjzayha karnay ka aml aur prwfailngh haay۔bhatry kay shabay۔ karkrdghy ki asalaha kesi prwghram ki rftar aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ka aml haay۔ bwtlynyks kwda kay aysay hasaay hain jo aksar ksart sy amldraamd karty hain aur sab sy zayada amldraamd ki ghnty karty hayn۔prwfailrza۔ tyknyks jesay faltw pn ، nkl ، aur ghltay ki bazayaby ko tksym shuda nzaamwn main ghltay rwadary aur ghltay sy nmtnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha laibryryan dawylprza ko apnay kwda kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay main mdd kay liye khwdkar ryfyktrngh ، kwda tjzayha ، aur kwda nywyghyshn jesi khsawsayat mhaya krty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، saft wyir prwfailngh rkawtwn aur bhatry kay shabwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye kesi prwghram ki karkrdghy ka tjzayha karnay ka aml haay۔azaghr mtadd twlza aur laibryrywn ko mhaya krta hay jo prwfailngh aur karkrdghy ki asalaha kay liye astamal hawsktay hain ، jesay CProfile aur mymwry_prwfylr۔an twlza aur tknyk jesay faltw pn ، nkl ، aur ghltay ki bazayaby ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza apnay saft wyir ayply kyshnza ki rftar ، karkrdghy aur ghltay rwadary ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔

Question: ayk mhadwd astyt mshyn (ayf ays aym) ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain aur ryastwn kay mabyn mntkly aur wakaat ko snbhalnay kay tarykay fraham kryn۔
Answer: ayk mhadwd astyt mshyn (ayf ays aym) ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay aur ryastwn kay darmiyan mntkly aur wakaat ko snbhalnay kay tarykay fraham karnay kay l we ، hum PYPI par dstyab FSM pykyj ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan bain astytytymchyn klas ka ayk msaal astamal haay: azaghr ayf ays aym ampwrt fainlstytytymchynyklas maiy ayf ays aym (bainyt astyt mychyn): dayf __init __ (khwd): spr ()۔.# state1fsm.handle_event ("aywnt 1") prnt (fsm.current_state ()) # state2fsm.handle_event ("aywnt 2") prnt (fsm.current_state ()) # astyt 1 un msaal kay tawr par ، ayk fainstytytymchyn klas ko ayk fainstytyt mychyn klas bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dw ryastwn aur do tranzayshn kay sath۔mwjwdha_styt tarykha FSM ki mwjwdha haalt ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur un pt aywnt ki bnyad par ryastwn kay mabyn mntkly kay liye hayndal_ aywnt ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔ is msaal ki aaؤt pt yeh hay kha: astyt 1 astyt 2 astyt 1 is aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh ayf ays aym tranzayshn sy ryast 1 sy ryast 2 main mntkly hawty haay۔snbhala jata hay ، aur astyt 2 sy astyt 1 tak jab aywnt 2 ko snbhala jata haay۔ ayf ays aym pykyj mhadwd ryasty mshynwn kay sath kam karnay kay liye kiy dusray tarykay mhaya krta hay ، jesay ADD_STATE ، ADD_TRANSITION ، aur SET_START_STATE۔an tarykwn ka astamal ayf ays aym main ryastwn aur tranzayshn ko shaml karnay aur astart astyt ko trtyb denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha yeh keh ayk mhadwd ryast mshyn hasab ktab ka ayk ryazuy ka nmwnha hay jo ayk trtyb mntak ka nmwnha bnata haay۔azaghr mtadd pykyjza mhaya krta hay ، jesay ayf ays aym ، jo mhadwd ryasty mshynwn ko nafza karty hain aur ryastwn aur hayndalngh aywnts kay mabyn mntkly kay tarykay mhaya karty hayn۔an pykyjwn ko ayk mhadwd ryasty mshyn ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay aur ryastwn kay mabyn mntkly aur wakaat ko snbhalnay kay tarykay fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: "braay dayta prwsysngh kay l data dayta dahanchay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain ، jesay blwm fltrza ، haaiprlwghlagh ، ya ghnty mn khakha ، aur azaghr main un ki drkhwastwn par tbadlha khyal kryn۔"
Answer: bgh dayta prwsysngh kay liye dayta dahanchay khsawsay dayta dahanchay hain jo dayta ki bray mkdar ko mwsar andaza main snbhalnay kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hayn۔yha dayta dahanchay braay dayta prwsysngh ayply kyshnza main braay daytasyts ko zakhyrha karnay ، mnzam karnay aur un main hayra phyry karnay kay liye astamal kyay jatay hayn۔yhaan braay dayta prwsysngh kay liye dayta dahanchay ki kuch msaalyn aur azaghr main un ki ayply kyshnza: blwm fltrza: blwm fltrza amkany aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay hain jo janchnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain keh aya ansar kesi syt ka mmbr hay ya nhayn۔wha dayta ki mkdar ko kam karnay kay liye braay dayta prwsysngh ayply kyshnza main astamal hawtay hain js par ghair mtalkha dayta ko fltr krkay karrwaiy karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔azaghr blwm fltrza ko nafza karnay kay liye mtadd laibryryan mhaya krta hay ، jesay paiy blwmfltrm myp aur btyray۔ haaiyprlwghlagh: haaiprlwghlagh ayk amkany aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo kesi syt ki kardanylty ka andazaha lghanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha braay daytasyts kay saiza ka andazaha lghanay kay liye braay dayta prwsysngh ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta haay۔azaghr haaiprlwghlagh ko nafza karnay kay liye mtadd laibryrywn ko mhaya krta hay ، jesay dayta askytch aur haaiprlwghlagh۔ kaؤnt-mnda askych: kaؤnt-mnda askych ayk amkany aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo kesi syt main anasar ki tadd ka andazaha lghanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha braay daytasyts main anasar ki mwjwdghy ko ghnnay kay liye braay dayta prwsysngh ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta haay۔azaghr ghnty kay mnky khakay ko nafza karnay kay liye mtadd laibryrywn ko mhaya krta hay ، jesay sy aym askych aur kaؤnty mynskych۔ pythwn kiy laibryrywn aur frym wrk mhaya krta hay jo braay dayta prwsysngh kay liye astamal hawsktay hain ، jesay pyyspark ، daask ، aur apachy bym۔yha laibryryan tksym shuda kmpywtngh ، mtwazay prwsysngh ، aur dayta astrymngh jesi khsawsayat mhaya krty hain takha dawylprza ko braay daytasyts par mwsar andaza main amldraamd karnay main mdd mlay۔ khlasaha main ، braay dayta prwsysngh kay liye dayta dahanchay khsawsay dayta dahanchay hain jo dayta ki bray mkdar ko mwsar andaza main snbhalnay kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hayn۔azaghr mtadd laibryrywn aur frym wrk mhaya krta hay jo un dayta dahanchay ko nafza karnay aur braay daytasyts ko mwsar andaza main prwsys karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔an dayta dahanchay aur laibryrywn ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza zayada mwsar aur twsya pzayr bgh dayta prwsysngh ayply kyshnza ki tshkyl krsktay hayn۔

Question: rd aml maikrwsrwaisza fn tamyr kay asawlwn par tbadlha khyal karain aur yeh btaiyn keh fast py aai ya kwart jesay frym wrk ko kis tarah azaghr main twsya pzayr aur lchkdar nzaam ki tamyr kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: rd aml maikrwsrwaisza fn tamyr tksym shuda nzaamwn ki tamyr ka ayk nktaha nzar hay jo rdaml ، lchk aur lchk par zawr dyta haay۔yhaan rd aml maikrwsrwaisza fn tamyr kay kuch asawl hayn: jwabdha: agar mmkn ho tou nzaam brwkt jwab dyta haay۔rdaml astamal aur afadyt ka sngh bnyad hay ، lekin is sy bhi zayada ، rdaml ka mtalb yeh hay keh msail ka jld ptha chl sakta hay aur mؤsar tarykay sy nmta jaskta haay۔rd aml kay nzaam un pt ki khdmt kay liye mkhtsa wsail ko braha ya kam krkay un pt ryt main tbdylywn par rd aml zaahar krsktay hayn۔as sy aysay dayzaain ka mtalb hay js main koi tnazaaha kay nkat ya mrkzay rkawtyn nahin hain ، js kay ntyjay main ajzaaa ko tyza karnay ya nkl karnay aur un kay darmiyan un pt tksym karnay ki salahayt hawty haay۔karfrma: rd aml kay nzaam ajzaaa kay mabyn ayk hadwd ko kaim karnay kay liye ghair mtzalzal pygham par anhasaar karty hain jo dahylay jwraay ، tnhaaiy ، aur mkam ki shfafyt ko ykyny bnata haay۔yha frym wrk dawylprza ko twsya pzayr aur lchkdar nzaamwn ki tamyr main mdd kay liye asynkrwns prwghramngh ، wakaha sy chlnay waly fn tamyr ، aur pygham ghzarnay jesi khsawsayat fraham karty hayn۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، rd aml maikrw srwsza fn tamyr tksym shuda nzaamwn ki tamyr ka ayk nktaha nzar hay jo rdaml ، lchk aur lchkdar par zawr dyta haay۔azaghr kiy frym wrk mhaya krta hay ، jesay fastpy aur kwart ، jo rd aml maikrwsrwaisza ki tamyr kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔an frym wrk ka astamal krkay aur rd aml maikrwsrwaisza fn tamyr kay asawlwn par aml karty hoey ، dawylprza zayada mwsar aur twsya pzayr tksym shuda nzaam tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔

Question: "ayk amkany aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karain ، jesay blwm fltr ، haaiprlwghlagh ، ya ghnty kay mnky khakha ، aur mwsar andazaay kay mtaabk syt mmbrshp kay swalat kay liye tarykay fraham kryn۔"
Answer: amkany aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas ko nafza karnay kay l ، ، jesay blwm fltr ، haaiprlwghlagh ، ya ghnty mnky khakha ، aur mwsar andazaa set syt mmbrshp kay astfsarat kay tarykay fraham karnay kay l we ، hum PYPI par dstyab paiprwbybl laibryry ka astamal krsktay hayn۔blwm fltr klas ka ayk msaal astamal haay: azaghr kay amkany amkanat blwmfltr by ayf = blwmfltr (EST_ELEMENTS = 1000 ، false_positive_rate = 0.01) bf.add ("aypl") bf.add ("kylay") bf.add ("sntry") prnt ("sntry") prntBF main "aypl") # trwpnt ("nashpatyan" BF myn) # falyn is msaal kay tawr par ، blwm fltr klas ayk tkhmynha shuda 1000 anasar aur 0.01 ki ghalat msabt shrha kay sath blwm fltr bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔blwm fltr main tyn anasar shaml kyay jatay hain ، aur un aaprytr ko syt mmbrshp kay liye janchnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ is msaal ki aaؤt pt yeh hay kha: try falsty aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh blwm fltr syt kay mmbr ki haysayt sy "aypl" ko sahayha tawr par shnakht krta hay aur "nashpatyan"jysa keh syt ka mmbr nahin haay۔ pyprwbyblza laibryry amkany aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ، jesay haaiprlwghlagh aur kaؤnty mynskych ko nafza karnay kay liye kiy dyghr klasyn mhaya krty haay۔an klaswn ko kesi syt ki kardanylty ka andazaha lghanay aur ayk syt main anasar ki mwjwdghy ko baltrtyb ghnnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، amkany aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay hain jo ayn mtaabk jwabat kay bjaiay kesi braay daytasyt kay baray main swalat kay baray main lgh bhgh jwabat fraham karty hayn۔azaghr mtadd laibryrywn aur frym wrk mhaya krta hay jo amkany aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ، jesay paipwbyblza ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔an laibryrywn aur klaswn jesay blwm fltr ، haaiprlwghlagh ، aur kaؤnty mynskych ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza braay daytasyts par tkryba syt mmbrshp kay swalat ko mwsar andaza main anjam dy saktay hayn۔
